- Golden Macchiato Skin & Avatar
- Golden Coco Skin & Avatar

name: Paw Patrol the Movie: Adventure City Calls
summary: So long, Adventure Bay! PAW Patrol is on a roll…to Adventure CITY! When the pups learn that Humdinger has become mayor of a buzzing metropolis, they must race into action to save Adventure City from his selfish scheming. Play as your favorite pups on exciting rescue missions. Explore new locations, level up with vehicles and gadgets, play minigames, and save the day!

name: Papa's Pizzeria Deluxe
summary: Top, bake, and serve delicious pizzas in Papa's Pizzeria Deluxe! Craft pizzas for Papa Louie's loyal customers while earning tips, points, and Special Recipes. Unlock holiday ingredients for seasonal pies, and take a trip in the Food Truck to serve your own unique creations!

name: Paper Pilgrim: The Crystal Case
summary:
You and your brother have another Detective Case to solve. More and more citizens of the “Crystal City” are disappearing without a trace.

Experience a strange Adventure and bring the truth to light. Is the pickpocket party involved? Or is it the king with his robotic police force? And what’s up with the cursed swamp?

Get to the bottom of the case by solving tricky riddles, gaining information from peculiar inhabitants and collecting various items throughout your journey that can open up new doors and ways for you to succeed in your quest!

name: Pantheion
summary: A single-player deck-building card game where mythologies unite. Construct your deck with deities, followers, artifacts, and blessings from Greek, Norse, and Japanese legends. Overcome each site's threshold through clever strategy, powerful combos, and unique card synergies.

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs
summary: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs is an online-only Pac-Man eating competition! Eat your way through multiple interconnected mazes using Power Pellets and a variety of Power Items to chomp the Ghosts and opponent PAC-MAN players! Be the last Pac standing at the end of each match in this 64-player Battle Royale to be the Chomp Champ!

name: Panama Canal Clash
summary: Who will become the master of the Panama Canal? Everything will be decided in the game Panama Canal Clash!

name: Paranoid
summary: Paranoid is a horror that tells the story of Patrick who has been living in isolation from the outside world for many years. One day he receives a phone call from his sister, who announces her visit more than a dozen years after she disappeared.

name: Path of Mystery: A Brush with Death
summary:
A completely new title from Imagineer and Toybox Inc., Mystery Walk is the first in a three-part serial drama series!

The game is set in Narumisawa, a charming, fictional summer getaway town that feels familiar, as though you have seen it somewhere before…

The story alternates between the present and the past to uncover the truth behind an unsolved case from 30 years ago.

Told through a prologue, 10 episodes, and a mysterious “?” episode, the mysteries deepen with each chapter.

The fully voiced dialogue, brought to life by a talented cast, will make you eager to continue to the next episode. And there are some unexpected names among the voice actors…

Please immerse yourself in the world of Mystery Walk to the fullest!

name: Papa Louie: When Pizzas Attack!
summary:
Liberate Papa Louie's customers today!

The adventure that started it all! While Papa Louie was hosting a party at Papa's Pizzeria, the Infamous Onion Ring infiltrated all the orders. Delicious pizzas were transformed into gooey Pizza Monsters that kidnapped all of Papa Louie's customers, teleporting them to far off lands. Armed with his trusty pizza paddle and loads of Pepper Bombs, Papa Louie must rescue all his loyal customers and put an end to the Infamous Onion Ring.

name: Papa's Freezeria
summary: A game where you play as a worker for Papa Louie serving sundaes to customers.

name: Paranoia
summary:
Paranoia (or Half-Life: Paranoia) — A single-player total conversion mod for the Half-Life game, was released on December 3, 2007 by a group of Russian enthusiasts. It has been released for both PC and the Sega Dreamcast (keep in mind this port is not official).

The rendering of the modification uses OpenGL, which allowed for the use of modern visual effects such as bump mapping, reflections, detailed textures, 3D graphics, 3D skyboxes, and an improved model lighting system.

The final version of the modification was released on April 9, 2008. The modification is based on the Half-Life (GoldSrc) engine and is distributed for free. After the release of version 1.1, the modification received a large number of positive reviews, and in January 2008, the ModDB portal named the Paranoia project the best single-player modification of 2007.

name: Paddle Master VR
summary: A casual cross between a breakout-style game and racquetball.

name: Park Life: Circuit of Happiness
summary: Be the Jissouseki in the Park!! Survive in the Park and make your own Family. Build Your own House, army, and Find your enemy that take your families life. Be Clever. Human's are Dangerous.

name: Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory
summary: Lead a team of four Troubleshooters of dubious loyalty, who (mostly) obey orders from Friend Computer, a paranoid and irrational artificial intelligence. Inspired by the classic games of the CRPG genre, experience the first official adaptation of the cult role-playing game!

name: Party in my Dorm
summary: Party in My Dorm is a social game set on a college campus where you meet people, join clubs, and party with friends. Customize your experience by collecting avatars, items, and gifts. Explore campus stories, find romance, and chat with others as you enjoy the college lifestyle.

name: Palette: Cards & Chaos
summary: Bullet hell meets deckbuilder. Stack cards, blend colors, and break everything with screen-shattering chaos as you descend into an endless, shifting labyrinth.

name: Pandemonium: Merge!
summary: Cozy up by the campfire and merge ingredients in a sizzling pan to cook tastier creations! This silly physics-based merge game is easy to play, difficult to beat - Can you merge your way to the ultimate campfire feast?

name: PatchCon! Defend the Library
summary: This game is real-time strategy game where the player must choose 5 Touhou characters to create an army from and defend Patchouli's library from swarms of oncoming attackers that are after the books.

name: Parcel Simulator
summary: Inspect and dissect parcels and packages in this parcel inspection simulator! Examine labels for mistakes, contents for contraband and hone your parcel reviewing skills. Build, upgrade and expand your warehouse to take your parcel inspections to the next level!

name: Pavlov's House
summary: Take control of the valiant defenders of a Soviet strongpoint in Stalingrad as they hold out against constant German attacks for almost two months. Can you rise to the challenge of mounting odds and hold Pavlov’s House?

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Paint of War
summary: This free DLC includes additional options for customizing the character's appearance: new types of tattoos, and body art, and the ability to change eye color.

name: Parliament
summary: Play as an owl in the world's first "owl-like". Eat prey, fight predators and grow stronger to fight the fearsome Brown Bear! How long can you survive?

name: Pawnbroker Simulator
summary: Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!

name: Paragnosia: Museum
summary: Watch over the Duskheath Museum with a rail-mounted camera. Closed following a series of disturbing disappearances, your mission is to photograph the anomalies and exorcise the spirits that have taken possession of the premises. Can you survive the 8 rounds through these mysterious exhibition halls?

name: Panmorphia: Enchanted
summary: A room escape game set in the magical world of Panmorphia. Wield the four elements and upgrade the amulet!

name: Parables of the Set Apart: The Pursuit of Wisdom
summary: Embark on the journey of the Set Apart One, a faithful warrior equipped with an arsenal of Weapons of Warfare and a divine array of Gifts. Guided by Wisdom, on a quest to battle the forces of darkness, topple the Adversary’s strongholds, and answer the call to be set apart.

name: Paper Lily: Chapter 1
summary:
Something terrible has happened. You can’t bear to think about it - but you can’t live like this anymore. You stopped attending school, you haven’t left your house in months, you have no reason to get out of bed anymore. There are no choices left.

No choice except... that strange golden letter.

It’s time to get your life back together.

One last try.

name: Parking in Tight Spaces
summary: Test your skills in this relaxing parking game! Park cars, trailers, and buses in tight spaces. Each level pushes your precision and control - can you master every tricky spot?

name: Pazuru in Airou
summary: Airu village has been rather quiet these days, and the elder is feeling lonely. To bring energy and activities back to the village, he uses the gem stones the Airus found in the mines to create a puzzle game. Welcome to the puzzle festival. The victor is getting his wish granted, so all the cats and even some of the monsters, such as Jingaoh and Iiankuk drop everything that they are doing to play. The rules are simple, just line up the gem stones around the bomb and blast them away before the screen chokes up. Every time you blast the stones away, you'll get a chance to send your opponents the annoying Donguri blocks. This is the chance where even the smallest of cats can defeat the big bad dragon.

name: Parsector
summary: In Parsector, you play the role of a starship captain at the outer rim of the galaxy. Begin the game in your own fighter ship, accept missions, mine space metal, and build your way up to a capital flagship while you dodge Imperial blockade drones & avoid the Starshadow Guild's harvester crews.

name: Pac Pack
summary:
A collection of Pac-Guy games, a series of pac-man clones and parodies with elements of shooters.
There is a disc that has 6 games, but also a disc that has 10. The latter includes the otherwise standalone game ''Pacula's Curse''. Some of these games could be downloaded standalone from the Astral Entertainment Website. Many of the games included on the disc have to be installed separately.

The 10 game version includes:

Pac-Guy: Ressurection (a remake of the first Pac-Guy)
Pac-Guy: Atomic Edition (A side story/Sequel)
Pac-Guy: Christmas Edition (A Christmas special)

Pac Guy 2: First Contact (the main sequel)
Pac-Guy 2: Pagoon (Part 2 of the pac-guy 2 series)
Pacula's Curse (Part 3 of the pac-guy 2 series, otherwise sold standalone)

Pac-Gal (Simila in concept to Ms. Pac-man)

It had 4 extra ''minigames'', though some of them might as well be considered full games.

-The original Pac-Guy (The original version of Pac-Guy 1).
-Pixel-Guy (A 1 screen spin-off where everything is really pixelated)
-Pac-Guy 2: The lost levels (cut content for Pac-Guy2 )
-Pac-Guy Scrambler (A remix of various early Pac-Guy games in which a family retells the story of pac-guy but completely misremembers what happened, making the events ''scrambled''
)

It also included some extras, Screen savers, Wallpapers and Icons.

name: Path: Through the Forest
summary:
In this puzzle game you controll a girl by taping on the blocks you want her to move on and have to collect all gems and get to the gate to finish a level.
Levels are organized in five times of day, each with there own unique mechanic.

name: Path of the Ninja Bundle
summary:
More ninjas, more action, more incredible gameplay. Two iconic ninja franchises, SHINOBI and NINJA GAIDEN, come together in this bundle, proving you can never have too much ninja action. Whether embracing your rage or showing the art of your vengeance, play as two legendary ninjas and challenge yourself in these thrilling 2D platformer games.

SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance

The iconic SHINOBI returns in an all-new 2D action platformer with a unique hand-drawn look. Play as the legendary Shinobi Joe Musashi, master of the ninja arts. After finding your village burned to the ground and your clan turned into stone, you must set off on a quest for vengeance, ready to face an unparalleled evil and avenge your clan.

NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound

A brand-new side-scrolling entry to the NINJA GAIDEN series from the team behind Blasphemous, NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound redefines the classic platformer saga in a spectacular, thrilling and challenging ninja adventure.

name: Party Party Time + Master Pack Set
summary:
It's time to get this party started! Endless fun in a bash everyone can join!
A party game with simple controls anyone can enjoy!
Experience a whole variety of intuitive, easy-to-play minigames.
Try to find your new favorite!

name: Paleo Playground
summary: Paleo Playground is the beginning of an open-world, multiplayer-based, Mesozoic ecosystem where players can take the role of several creatures of their choice and attempt to survive.

name: Pac-Man's Arcade Party
summary:
Includes Galaxian, Pac-Man, Rally-X, Galaga, Bosconian, Dig Dug, Xevious, Mappy, Pac-Mania, Galaga '88, Dragon Spirit and Rolling Thunder.
A home version was released that included Ms. Pac-Man.

name: Paccarat
summary: The 10-rats-in-a-trenchcoat roguelike deckbuilder. Recruit a rag-tag team of rats, craft a curated deck for each, and discover devastating multi-deck combos. Build your team & masterfully pilot multiple unique decks to take down increasingly difficult enemies.

name: ParaLegends
summary: Para Legends is a fast-paced third-person hero shooter featuring unique characters, tactical teamplay, and explosive abilities. Choose your legend and join the fight in competitive online matches.

name: Panzer War: Definitive Edition
summary: Panzer War delivers intense tank combat, featuring a realistic damage system where every hit counts. Skip the grind—access all tanks instantly and dive into battle. Unleash your creativity with the Tank and Map Designer, crafting custom scenarios for endless gameplay possibilities.

name: PancitoMerge
summary: Drop, merge, and stack colorful pan dulce to create bigger, tastier treats. Master the art of sweet combos while avoiding a crumbling mess! With charming visuals and simple gameplay, this cozy puzzle adventure celebrates the joy of Mexican baking. Perfect for quick sessions or beating high scores.

name: Paratopic
summary:
Smuggle contraband VHS tapes across the border. Discover the remnants of illicit industry. Prepare for an assassination.
This is Paratopic, an atmospheric retro-3D horror adventure through a cursed fever dream.

name: Paranormal Tales
summary: Paranormal Tales is a next-gen horror game based on found footage built in Unreal Engine 5. You experience and play through each tragic tale of those who went missing from the viewpoint of bodycams, phones, and VHS cameras. Do you have what it takes to play through the end of the footage?

name: Parking Garage Rally Circuit DX
summary: Parking Garage Rally Circuit DX doubles the content of the original release with the addition of the new European Tour, adding eight multistorey car parks to drift through on top of the original eight American parking garages to make a total of 16 tracks.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Moscow'42
summary:
The last great push of Operation Barbarossa began on Nov 15th, 1941 when Heeresgruppe Mitte tried to bring Operation Typhoon to a successful conclusion with the capture of Moscow. Two weeks after it was launched, it was obvious that the German forces were spent and little more could be achieved. On December 5th, 1941 aided by plummeting temperatures the Soviets launched what were first limited attacks, but quickly grew into front wide offensives that would last for close to three months. By the end of the Soviet offensives, Moscow was saved, but at what cost? 
 
Moscow '42 is two games in one. Following on from the German Operation Typhoon portrayed in Moscow '41, Moscow '42 includes the historical Soviet 1941/42 winter counter offensive that almost destroyed Heeresgruppe Mitte in front of Moscow. 
 
In addition the hypothetical Fall Kreml (Operation Kremlin in English) is included. Operation Kremlin was an extensive deception campaign that the Axis enacted to distract from Fall Blau (Operation Blue) the German 1942 summer offensive in the Ukraine and Caucasus. What if Fall Kreml was real? What if the Axis attempted to capture Moscow again using the historical forces available in the summer of 1942? A range of campaigns & scenarios are included to allow players to investigate this historical possibility.

name: Paddle Together
summary: Physics-based chaotic co-op adventure game where communication and teamwork are your only hope and also your biggest threat. Paddle in sync, blame each other at every turn, crash into obstacles and try not to drown (yes, it's optional) while questioning your friendship, together.

name: Package Pirates
summary: Play as a Package Pirate stealing and loading packages into your 'Scaly Wagon'. Keep your eyes open for the Neighborhood Watch – They’re top priority is stopping plunderers! If someone suspects you of being the Pirate, you could be placed under citizens arrest - or worse, behind bars!

name: Paper Dolls 2: Escape
summary: Ghosts and spirits will prowl the mansion on All Hallows' Eve! Within the new game mode you will act as an exorcist, slaying spirits aplenty! Make sure to explode each wine jar at the opportune moment to blow up as many enemies as possible.
developers: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.
publishers: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1939
summary: Take command of Wehrmacht forces in this second chapter of the overarching Axis Operations Campaign for Panzer Corps 2. Whiles the Allies attempt to pursue their strategy of Appeasement, Germany moves to secure more and more lost territory. Once again, your Wehrmacht forces are called to action...

name: Paging Dr. Floppy!
summary: Paging Dr. Floppy is an arcade-style test of your reflexes, will, and aptitude as a medical professional. Catch organs as they fly across the operating room to increase your score and save Dr. Floppy's job!

name: Pathologic 3: Quarantine
summary: Pathologic 3: Quarantine is a narrative-driven adventure about a young scientist in search of immortality and a mysterious plague outbreak in a small town. Learn how your story began and what drove a celebrated academic to leave his acclaimed lab. Examine patients, uncover strange secrets, and make first steps towards defeating Death.

name: Patolino
summary: A handheld game based on Daffy Duck.

name: Parkour Simulator 2026
summary: Jump, flip, and run across rooftops to become the ultimate parkour master.

name: Passenger: Gone
summary: Based on the mechanics of trading card games and roguelike elements, we have incorporated charming heroines from different worlds along with a variety of relics and equipment. Players can freely choose between battling or gathering resources in a cyclical world where each loop consists of 30 steps.

name: Parking Frenzy
summary:
Parking Frenzy brings the ultimate drive ‘n’ park experience!

Get ready for hours of gameplay with 200+ levels, backed with 4 different weather situations: Autumn, Winter, Rain and Fog! Crazy huh? We’re not done just yet!
Parking Frenzy 2.0 offers driving in 50 different, gorgeously designed cars, around two of the most beautiful cities in the world - New York City and London!

Are you skilled enough to master the parking process? Will you be able to control your ride through realistic driving physics, and navigate it smoothly and precisely into the tiny parking spots?

name: Pagliaccionautas
summary: This mechanism now in your hands is not exactly a game. I'm not going to say it isn't a game; who am I to deny you the right to play? What I call a "cursed tool" is a synthetic studio. You take on the role of The Clown, an inquisitive and scathing fellow, determined to fulfill his mission: to form the perfect team of Paglaccionautas.

name: Pako 2
summary: Arcade drive-by shooting action with heist game mechanics

name: Pathologic 3
summary: Save a town from a mysterious plague in this in narrative first-person RPG. Learn the stories of its unusual inhabitants. Shape their lives with your decrees. Diagnose patients. Face the Plague. Connect the dots. Find out who killed the immortal man. Correct your mistakes in the past.

name: Paper io 2
summary:
Welcome to Paper.io 2, the ultimate conquest game from Voodoo! Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition with a smooth drawing experience!

Are you ready to become the champion of township and take over the game? With Paper.io 2, you can draw your way to victory and claim your space before your opponents beat you to it.

name: Panorama Toh
summary:
Panorama Toh (ぱのらま島 "Panorama Island"), released by Nihon Falcom for the NEC PC-8801 computer in 1983, departed from the standard RPG formula in various ways. It combined RPG gameplay with real-time combat, combined fantasy with sci-fi elements, and introduced survival mechanics.

The game was designed by Yoshio Kiya, this was possibly the first action RPG. These innovative ideas about RPG design departed significantly from the turn-based norm at the time. It introduced real-time combat, sci-fi elements, a persistent open world with day-night cycle, and survival mechanics. This was a precursor to Falcom's seminal action RPG franchise, Dragon Slayer. In 1984, he would go on to create Nihon Falcom's Dragon Slayer franchise, which laid the foundations for the real-time, action RPG genre.

name: Pangemic
summary: Collect all the gems while avoiding enemies and hazards, do it in the time limit or face the 'Red Skull'. panGEMic is a retro inspired platform game requiring quick reflexes and quick thinking.

name: Palace of a Thousand Curses
summary:
Palace of a Thousand Curses is a 2.5D narrative swashbuckling adventure set in an Andalusian fairy tale.

You play as a desperate beggar that has been trapped in an old storybook, where you will duel strange creatures, avoid deadly traps, and confront that most unexpected of enemies: the Spanish Inquisition.

name: PacketStorm
summary: In PacketStorm, you play an AI developing a new Internet Service Provider. Each game takes place over a few second of game-time, but potentially many hours of realtime. Buy up routers, upgrade cable networks and deal with packet jams as you earn money to research new and better upgrades.

name: Paperboy
summary:
Paperboy is a 1985 arcade game by Atari Games originally developed in 1984 . The players take the role of a paperboy who delivers newspapers along a suburban street on his bicycle. The game was ported to numerous video game consoles and personal computers. Paperboy was innovative for its theme and novel controls.

The player controls a paperboy on a bicycle delivering newspapers along a suburban street which is displayed in a cabinet perspective (or oblique projection) view. The player attempts to deliver a week of daily newspapers to subscribing customers, attempts to vandalize non-subscribers' homes and must avoid hazards along the street. Subscribers are lost by missing a delivery or damaging a subscriber's house.

name: Pac-Man
summary: Port of Pac-Man for MZ-1500 computers.

name: Path Zero
summary: Choose a correct path to walk the target amount of steps. Once the direction is chosen, the character will walk until a wall or an obstacle stops it. Don't overshoot!

name: Pawfish Bay
summary: Fish, grill and serve your feline bosses!

name: Path to Serenity
summary: Guide Jim on a heartfelt journey to find peace and balance amidst life's struggles. In Path to Serenity, a cozy walking simulator, explore levels with interactive and soothing elements, accompanied by calming sounds. Walk alongside Jim as he begins a new path towards calm and serenity.

name: Paint Rumble
summary: Paint Rumble is a fast-paced party game where strategy and reflexes matter! Cover the most area in 2-minute battles, playing solo, in teams, or against friends locally or online. Choose Wolfy, Quacky, Tigro, or Lucky, grab power-ups, and use your agility to dominate the battlefield!

name: PASS
summary: PASS, People Are Seriously Slow! The endless driving game where the only goal is to overtake every slow driver in your way. How many cars can you PASS? You'll be saying "I can make that gap!" as you just barely swerve back over!

name: Palace of Cards
summary: Play cards online with other players from around the world and choose from 6 unique games: Rummy, Solitaire, Mau-Mau (Crazy Eights), Skat, Sheepshead & Doppelkopf. Each game comes with its own community, league systems, clubs, statistics & insights, and much more. Play now, for free!

name: Pahtkest!
summary: Fight back against a variety of creatures in Pahtkest, a game from a far off land! Draw a path in the grid to attack enemies, and defeat them to survive longer. How much gold can you earn before the game ends?

name: Pandamonium
summary: A panda who stumbles into the Lost Capital of Hell. Explore a beautiful and dangerous world with hand drawn crisp pixel art and 2.5D graphics. Face perilous foes, bosses and friendly allies. Customize yourself with abilities and outfits that will help you conquer your way through this doomed land.

name: Packing Up the Rest of Your Stuff on the Last Day at Your Old Apartment
summary: It's a hot, hot August 31st in Chicago. You've got both fans going on you. The bare mattress feels so cool on your back... A train rumbles by. At least you won't have to do this again for another year. And it will be fall soon. The playlist on your Ogg Player repeats.

name: Pain 'n Dave: The Maze of Malice
summary: Escape the Maze of Malice in this frantic 2D top-down shooter!

name: Paper Mario: TTYD - Tower of Trials
summary:
Tower of Trials is a mod of Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door created by jdaster64 which pits Mario and his partners against a Rogue-like series of random battles, with a choice of different rewards after clearing each floor.

The mod also reworks a number of existing moves and badges, adds multiple new moves to each partner's moveset, and has an expanded Journal menu with logs for achievements completed, and moves, items and badges encountered.

name: Parlor
summary: Parlor is an interactive party game that can be played with your Twitch chat! Each round you give clues to your chat and they try to guess the answer by typing it to your chat, competing with each other.

name: Pay Your Crimes
summary: Pay Your Crimes is a Tactical Management game with elements of real time strategy, you play as a mafia boss where you need to upgrade your drug dealers, buy dealers, and play with them to sell drug to the people, earn as much money as you can and bribe the cops maintain your freedom

name: Pacification Light
summary: Pacification Light is an exciting 2D platformer that takes us back to a time when spirits and ghosts inhabited our world. During this period, there lived a brave hero who decided to confront the darkness and cleanse the earth of sinister supernatural entities.

name: Pawns of War
summary: Dark parallel world in which humanity has destroyed itself. And only small colonies have survived the last centuries holding on to power at the expense of the totalitarian regime of government. You were thrown here after your death, is this how you were given a second chance?

name: ParaLily
summary:
ParaLily is one little girl’s adventure to retrieve her dear stuffed dinosaur Patches, who in the middle of the night sprung to life and took off through a mysterious door. This strange journey will take Lily through a set of dangerous and terrifying parallel universes, as she attempts to retrieve her little stuffed runaway. Lily can shift between the parallel universes at will; which will help her avoid danger, and solve puzzles while traversing the paranormal universes.

Each universe has is its own space with unique themes, enemies, and attributes. A single level cannot be traversed by only interacting with one universe, so the relative spatial relationship of each universe is critical to gameplay. When Lily changes universes her momentum carries with her, allowing her to continue a jump from one universe to the next. This combination of parallaxing parallel universes, and momentum; creates a special blend of precision and puzzle platforming, that makes ParaLily both challenging and thoughtful.

Help Lily survive the paranormal and rescue a friend, on her strange journey through a series of parallel universes, in this special blend of precision and puzzle platforming. Avoid horrifying enemies, collect magical glyphs, and discover the connection between Lily and the parallel universes.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1943
summary: The critical hour where the fate of Germany on the Eastern Front will be decided has arrived! Though the Battle of Stalingrad has ended, the Axis forces in Russia remain in turmoil.

name: Paperback Adventures
summary: Combine word wizardry and superior strategy in this roguelike deckbuilding adventure. Craft a unique deck of letter cards throughout each journey, collect rewards from your victories, and each adventure unlocks new cards.

name: Pantufa the Cat
summary: This hack reimagines the game as a generic 90s mascot platformer to satirize the era's competition with Sonic.

name: Paper.Void
summary:
PAPER.VOID is a minimalist, abstract flight game set in an endless monochrome dimension known as the VOID. Players pilot a fragile paper plane through infinite space, collecting VOID CUBES to distort the world around them.

As more cubes are gathered, the environment shifts — speed increases, perspective warps, and the sense of direction fades into chaos. Trails left behind by the player intertwine endlessly, turning the empty world into a sprawling, self-made labyrinth of light.

PAPER.VOID combines arcade-style progression with a meditative, atmospheric experience. Unlock new planes, uncover secrets hidden within the VOID, or enter creative modes like “Free Draw,” where flight becomes art.

How far will you go before the VOID consumes itself?

name: Paper Cannon
summary: Paper Cannon is an addictive casual shooting game where you destroy balls with simple controls. Face off against bosses at the end of each stage, and power up your cannon to destroy everything raining down from the sky! Wow!

name: Party on Hallow Grove
summary: Talk to kooky guests, trade party items, and explore Death’s mansion as you throw him the spookiest birthday party ever.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Game of the Year Edition
summary: Enjoy the ultimate adventure in the Best RPG of 2021 with all six premium expansions. Lead a band of unique companions, forge alliances, and rise as a Mythic Hero to decide the fate of mortals and gods alike.

name: Pac & Pal
summary: Pac & Pal is an arcade game that was released by Namco on July 30, 1983 exclusively in Japan. It runs on Namco Super Pac-Man hardware, and the object of the game is for Pac-Man to eat all the items before he is caught by the ghosts. Most of the items are fruits from the original Pac-Man game, with a few new additions. Their value varies, starting with cherries at 50 points, and ending with keys from 700 to 5000 points. The items had to first be unlocked by turning over cards distributed around the maze (instead of eating keys like in Super Pac-Man). Very few cabinets still exist today, and this is possibly one of the rarest Pac-Man titles to find in playable format outside Japan.

name: Paper Flight: Relic Hunter
summary: Paper Flight – Relic Hunter is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. Jump into the role of a little paper plane and rescue the world from evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Panic in Sweets Land
summary: Crushing combos and beat up enemies! No complicated controls, just fun with a variety of fighting actions! The joy and faults of a pretty magical girl knocking down her enemies? Yes, please! A delicious and crazy action game with bright and colorful sweet action!

name: Pac-Man Museum+
summary: A compilation of 14 Pac-Man titles. Players can earn coins by playing the games to purchase items to decorate an in-game arcade.

name: Patterns of the Oak
summary: The first roguelike deckbuilder where your skill is your mana. Patterns Of The Oak is a deckbuilding roguelike with turn-based combat. Cast spells in powerful combinations to defeat the ruthless invaders and bring back peace to the homeland of the sacred oak groves.

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Definitive Edition
summary:
The Definitive Edition will have all of the DLC from the PC version of the game, including Beneath the Stolen Lands, Varnhold's Lot, and Royal Ascension.

The console version will include a turn-based mode, which has been present in the PC version via mods.

name: Party Harvest
summary: A farm management game where you grow crops, raise animals, fish, mine, cook, and take care of the townspeople alongside your friends.

name: Paper Shakespeare: Loves Labor(s) Lost
summary: What happens when stick figures based on Shakespeare fall in love? Let's find out! Loosely based on Shakespeare's Love's Labour's Lost, play as some cool archeologists forsaking love to explore some awesome ruins!

name: Paradoxical Heat
summary: An android's body reported it was freezing to death on a perfectly temperate day, look over our recreation of the error.

name: Path of the Bogatyr
summary: The Slavic land is under attack! Take on the role of a mighty bogatyr and help vanquish the enemy lizards in epic battles. Forge items, arm your hero, and become a folk legend!

name: Paper Mario: The Origami King Refolded
summary: This is a modpack that builds upon the existing world of Paper Mario The Origami King by adding new characters, enemies, items and more while keeping the existing charm of the original game.

name: Pathless Maze TD
summary: A tower defense game that blends strategic depth with labyrinthine design. Construct mazes to block enemy advances, fuse advanced towers to obliterate monsters, and adapt your tactics to counter unique foes.

name: Paws and Leaves: A Last Tale
summary: Life flashes before your eyes when you die. Help Me Fox by finding his memories beyond life and experiencing a touching, cute, and scary tale.

name: Papa's Pancakeria
summary:
Rise and Shine with Papa's Pancakeria!

After searching high and low for your pet, you get a surprise call from Papa Louie. He's been taking care of your pet at his latest restaurant, Papa's Pancakeria. You quickly drive to Maple Mountain only to find your pet and a note from Papa Louie. Soon you find yourself knee deep in batter as you try to run the shop until Papa Louie returns.

This latest game features pancakes, waffles and french toast along with a variety of new and returning customers in search of the best breakfast around. The time-management and hands-on gameplay of the series is back, with new challenges related stacking, arranging toppings and pouring syrup. Closers, badges, and tons of furniture are back and better than ever. New to the series, is a traveling game-show hosted by the Great Foodini! He stops by at the end of every day with a new mini-game to play. However Foodini only accepts special tickets that are earned throughout the day. Each ticket gives you a chance to play his daily game and possibly win over 95 unique prizes. Also new to the series is a very special Drink Station that can be unlocked that will add to the growing challenge of juggling your customers orders.

name: Pass Problems
summary: Puzzle game for the Playdate with a basketball theme.

name: Packing House
summary: Start your own online store! Buy products from wholesalers and list them profitably on the Internet. Increase your shipping capacity and assortment. Ensure timely delivery to customers and that everyone receives the goods they ordered. Beware of negative reviews as they can spoil your reputation!

name: Paradise Beach Simulator
summary: Paradise Beach Simulator is a first-person management simulation game where you transform an abandoned island into a successful business. Welcome your guests, maintain your equipment, manage your staff, and explore your island, all while restoring the beauty of a lost paradise.

name: Palace of Poetry
summary: A visual novel based on The Tale of Genji. The protagonist is a young woman who is thrust into a noble palace. She must make aquantince with the girls that live there and decide her future.

name: Pantry Raid
summary: A cooking-themed dungeon-lite game

name: Palworld
summary: Palworld is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you can befriend and collect mysterious creatures called "Pal" in a vast world! Make your Pals fight, build, farm, and work in factories.

name: Parking Tycoon 2
summary: Return to the world of parking business! In Parking Tycoon 2, you're not only building your empire — you're defending it. With a new combat system, skill upgrades, and security guards, your parking lot becomes a fortress!

name: Paper Trail
summary: Fold corners and edges of the screen to open new pathways and solve puzzles in the super charming Paper Trail, with a soundtrack that'll melt your heart.

name: Path Of Balls
summary: Help a God recover his sacred balls! Capture them, solve puzzles and embark on a journey full of adventures, challenges and collections in a stylized world.

name: Pac-Manic Miner Man
summary: Pac-Manic Miner Man was written in 2012 by Jim Bagley to run the classic ZX Spectrum Game Manic Miner on Pac-Man Arcade hardware, a long time ambition of his was to write an arcade game on arcade hardware but little did he know he would eventually write a game that would run on Pac-Man hardware. After finding the memory map for Pac-Man he decided the opportunity was too good to miss and as a tribute to the classic ZX Spectrum game he wrote Pac-Manic Miner Man as it fit the constraints of the hardware.

name: Paper Mario: Black Pit
summary: Paper Mario: Black Pit is a ROM hack/mod of Paper Mario 64, developed by elDexter. It adds a new level layout to the game, based on roguelike mechanics.

name: Pan-Arcade Airlines
summary: Calling all flight enthusiasts! Arcade style flight simulator based on real physics. Fly airplanes through the history of civil aviation. Buy new aircraft, upgrade your fleet, establish new routes and try to keep your passengers happy.

name: Pandora: First Contact
summary: The ancient Messari return to Pandora with all their might, deploying portals and terrifying ion storms. From these portals come forces never before seen by mankind, and an infestation spreads across Pandora. The strongest factions are the ones that have to fear them most, but they will spare no one.About the GamePandora: First Contact is a science fiction 4X turn-based strategy game on a planetary scale.

name: Panopticon
summary: Panopticon is a mystery adventure game set in a café part-time job. Uncover the truth under the pressure of surveillance and experience a thrilling story with realistic graphics and immersive interactions.

name: Panoptic
summary: Panoptic is a local multiplayer VR game that pits you against a friend, where you play as either the giant Overseer or tiny Challenger in a stealthy game of cat and mouse. Will the Challenger slip away undetected through the crowds, or will the Overseer track them down with their powerful laser eye?

name: Paradise Island: Exotic
summary: "Paradise Island: Exotic" is the game for all sun and sea lovers! Tear yourself away from work and build your own sunny island! Is it time to make your own business? Just have some practice! Reach tourists are just about getting to your warm beaches! Entertain them in casinos and entertainment centers, restaurants and discos! Build your own empire of entertainment!

name: Pac's Revenge
summary: Pac's Revenge is a retro-style FPS game. Strap on your boots, grab the nearest gun, and blast your way through countless demonic creatures before they can corrupt your whole world.

name: Pac-Man 4K
summary:
The definitive home version of the arcade classic!

Gobble your way through the maze of Pac-Land, chomping on dots and avoiding the four hungry monsters, Blinky, Pinky, Inky and Clyde. But if you can manage to eat an energizer, turn the tables on those monsters by feasting on them for bonus points!

Dennis Debro sought to create an adaptation of Pac-Man more faithful than Atari's 1982 version for the VCS. Utilizing the same 4K memory limit as the original, Dennis' game is a feat of programming that finally brings Pac-Man to the Atari 2600 as it was intended.

name: Parallax
summary: A lone traveler drifts through deep space on a mission that has lasted far longer than it should. When an unexpected message breaks the silence, familiar voices begin to feel strangely out of place.

name: Pasture Palette
summary: Pasture Palette is a living art piece where your field becomes the canvas. Shape colors by painting objects, growing flowers, and raising sheep in vibrant hues, as loyal dogs help turn wool into goods and discover the palette hidden in your pasture.

name: Parasocial! Paranoia! Paradise!
summary: You just got yourself a new girlfriend! She's everything you could have ever wanted! Now just be sure she doesn't escape.

name: Palworld: Palfarm
summary: Enjoy a farming life with mysterious creatures known as Pals! Team up with them to grow your farm at your own pace in this brand new creature-collecting farming sim, fully playable in multiplayer!

name: Paper Dash: City Hustle
summary: Start an adventure as a courageous paper plane hunts evil ghosts across vibrant worlds. Soar through mystical forests and scary mansions, utilizing your flying skills and reflexes to shoot the ghosts.

name: Party Hard 2
summary:
It's the Holiday Season, and you don't get your Christmas Bonus. The only logical solution is to start a killing spree at a corporate party.

Welcome to Party Hard 2, the sequel to 2015's stealth strategy hit.

name: Panoptia
summary: Panoptia is a narrative-driven atmospheric exploration game about a strange building called Panoptia that has mysteriously appeared in town. No one knows what secrets hides in its depths. Uncover these secrets if you hope to ever escape...

name: Papetura
summary: Papetura is an atmospheric point & click, adventure game, handcrafted entirely out of paper. Little creatures Pape and Tura will face monsters that will try to burn down their beloved paper world. The game is being developed by Polish developer Tomasz Ostafin

name: Pacific Drive: Whispers Edition
summary:
The Whispers Edition of “Pacific Drive” includes the base game and its new expansion, “Whispers in the Woods”. Experience the rise of a terrifying new group of Anomaly obsessed fanatics on your journey through the Olympic Exclusion Zone.

Pacific Drive is a first-person driving survival game with your car as your only companion. Navigate a surreal reimagining of the Pacific Northwest, and face supernatural dangers as you venture into the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Each excursion into the wilderness brings unique and strange challenges as you restore and upgrade your car from an abandoned garage that acts as your home base. Gather precious resources and investigate what’s been left behind in the Zone; unravel a long-forgotten mystery while learning exactly what it takes to survive in this unpredictable, hostile environment.

Pacific Drive is a first-person driving survival game with your car as your only companion. Navigate a surreal reimagining of the Pacific Northwest, and face supernatural dangers as you venture into the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Each excursion into the wilderness brings unique and strange challenges as you restore and upgrade your car from an abandoned garage that acts as your home base. Gather precious resources and investigate what’s been left behind in the Zone; unravel a long-forgotten mystery while learning exactly what it takes to survive in this unpredictable, hostile environment.

name: Pain
summary: PAIN is a tough-as-nails, labyrinth-structured rage-game utilizing full-on space physics. Introducing things like Power-DOWNS, that can stack on top of eachother for the most painful experience. ...Can one make it to the end unscathed...?

name: Path of Vidya
summary: Path of Vidya is a modern philosophical/sci-fi story-driven, turn-based RPG using the RPG Maker VX Ace program.

name: Pandemic Train
summary: In Pandemic Train you are in charge of the crew aboard a train roaming the postapocalyptic wasteland, ravaged by both war and a deadly plague. Your goal is to survive long enough to discover the cure… or die trying. Humanity’s fate is in your hands! Start your journey now!

name: Parkour Fortress: Redux
summary: Parkour Fortress: Redux adds Mirror's Edge-style parkour movement mechanics into Team Fortress 2. Its maps are prefixed by pf_. The mod is a from-scratch, backward-compatible recreation of Jonas Kaerlev's Parkour Fortress mod from 2011. A standalone version of the mod known by the name of "Parkour Forever" is currently undergoing crowdfunding.

name: Pan-Pan
summary:
Might and Delight in collaboration with SPELKRAFT invites you to explore a world lush with colour and punctuated by the tranquil sounds of a melodic soundtrack. Welcome to the world of Pan-Pan!

- A foreign world -
Pan-Pan is an open plain adventure that expands on the concept of environmental narrative storytelling with puzzle solving and exploration elements at its core. In a world littered with world shifting riddles and sprinkled with memorable characters – how you solve these riddles is firmly in your hands.

- Repair the ship -
Set against a backdrop of soothing ambient sounds crafted by renowned sound composer Simon Viklund, your task is to fix your downed spaceship and begin the pilgrimage home.

Main features:
- Set in an open world: Unlock new areas by collecting items and solving puzzles.
- Stellar soundtrack created by acclaimed sound producer – Simon Viklund.
- A balanced blend of exploration and puzzle solving game mechanics.
- Story beats told through environmental interactions.
- Use a mix of tools, gadgets and devices to solve puzzles and uncover the path home.

name: Pango Blocks
summary:
LOGIC and cheerfulness!

Get ready for a challenge! CHOOSE logic blocks and BUILD a path for Pango. 
If Pango crosses the screen without falling, he will catch an item and give it to a friend.

Pango will have to bring back 8 ingredients to Pig's kitchen, 8 tools for Fox's rocket, sports equipment for Squirrel, and crayons for Rabbit's drawing…

More than 40 challenges through 5 funny adventures.

Educational game suitable for children 3 or older with 2 difficulty levels.

Pango Blocks - a cute way to learn about judging distances when you're little!

FEATURES:

- Logic game
- 5 adventures to discover for your enjoyment
- 40 challenges through 5 universes
- 2 difficulty levels
- Perfect for children 3 or older
- No stress and no timer
- A simple, functional application
- Colorful and fully interactive game
- Fully animated with sound and pictures
- Internal parental control
- No in-game purchases and no invasive advertising

name: Paper Nebula
summary: Paper Nebula is a fast paced, arcade style scroller, reinvented as a Roguelike! This space shooter will have you blasting through endless waves of alien ships, to escape the Paper Nebula. With adorable paper style graphics and intense gameplay, you wouldn't want to be trapped anywhere else.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Pacific
summary: For the first time in its 10 year history, Panzer Corps series is going to thoroughly explore the Pacific Theatre of Operations in the Second World War.

name: PACS: Post Apocalypse Courier Service
summary: Can you build delivery vehicles to survive the post apocalypse? Go it alone or with up to 4 friends as you navigate treacherous environments, make deliveries, customise vehicles, scavenge for parts, and grow your delivery business!

name: Pathologic 2: Marble Nest
summary: The Marble Nest is a DLC for Pathologic 2, offering a self-contained story. Play for a single day as Dr. Daniil Dankovsky, a scientist from the Capital, a fighter of death, and another doctor trying to save the Town alongside the Haruspex, and uncover a different perspective on the events—and Death itself.

name: Park Beyond
summary: In Park Beyond players can create the park of their dreams, without being held back by gravity! As the newly-hired visionary architect for a struggling company, players will be able to create mind-twisting theme parks. Players can create rides they have always dreamt about but that couldn’t exist in real life. Along with Phil, the enthusiastic park veteran and Izzy, the stern but friendly executive and a host of other colorful and passionate characters, players will pave the way to a successful and profitable park company. Thanks to accessible controls and a story-driven campaign mode, players will get to learn the ropes of park management and build increasingly crazy rides and modular coasters.

name: Path of Exile: Echoes of the Atlas
summary:
Path of Exile: Echoes of the Atlas is the game's 10th core expansion and will launch beside the Ritual league in version 3.13 of the game.

In Path of Exile: Echoes of the Atlas, you'll gain even more control over your end-game Path of Exile experience by specialising each region of your Atlas with its own passive tree, crafting Watchstones to refine your rewards, selecting up to ten map bosses to face simultaneously and challenging the Atlas' new pinnacle boss: The Maven.

name: Parker & Lane: Twisted Minds
summary: When a killer from Parker’s past plots a series of murders, Lily must face her past before it steals her future!

name: Pac-Man Pop!
summary: Pac-Man Pop! is an iOS and Android game, developed by Tictoc Games and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It is a puzzle game where Pac-Man needs to throw bubbles to save the Pets and Pac-People from the Ghosts. The game was removed from the App Store in March 2020.

name: Panty Match Girls
summary: Collect. Discover. Admire.

name: Pandemonium: Infernal Bonds
summary: Will old friends and new bonds be enough to save a Devil from his destiny?

name: Panic Room 2: Hide and Seek
summary: Panic Room 2: Hide and Seek - a hidden object game with an engaging detective plot and the atmosphere of a spine-chilling thriller. Delve into a new tale of a luxurious old mansion that became a prison for the captives of a mysterious maniac, the Puppeteer.

name: Passpartout: The Starving Artist
summary:
Passpartout puts you into the shoes of a French artist trying to navigate the beautifully confusing art scene. Paint and sell your own art to survive your expensive wine and baguette addiction.

Passpartout was developed by Flamebait Games and released in June of 2017. It is currently available on Steam and Gamejolt.

name: Paper Sorcerer
summary:
A powerful sorcerer is on the cusp of dominating the land. A group of heroes bands together and seals him away inside a magical tome. Now as the sorcerer you must escape from this ancient prison and find a way to regain your magical powers using your wits and an array of summonable creatures to aid you. There may be more powerful forces at work as you navigate the dungeons and fight the heroes sent to subdue you...

Paper Sorcerer is a stylish single player turn based RPG focused on strategy, party-building, and environmental puzzles. Fight with the skills and spells you've learned in a battle system that emphasizes strategy over grinding. Assemble a party of monsters and dark creatures to fight alongside you. Explore and solve environmental puzzles to unlock secret paths and find extra loot! A double-sided adventure, an RPG with adventure game elements.

name: Paper Mario: TTYD - Tower of Trials v3.0
Paper Front
summary:
Welcome to the "Paper Front"!

A new kind of classical tanks was embodied in an endless arcade.

name: Park Escape
summary: A rookie detective, fresh out of the police academy, receives an urgent order from his superiors. They must solve the case and find the missing child within two weeks. What secrets does the abandoned amusement park hide? Can they complete their mission and rescue the missing child?

name: Panta Rhei
summary: As Chaos threatens to tear the flow of time apart, Phi, a reluctant Guardian of Time, embarks on a journey to the Origin of Time. Equipped with the ability to bend time, they face hostile creatures, solve puzzles and explore the Realm of Time in an adventure rogue-like where time is your weapon.

name: Path of Exile: Betrayal
summary: In Path of Exile: Betrayal, Jun Ortoi is investigating a mysterious organisation known as the Immortal Syndicate. Help her to manipulate their ranks, reveal the identities of their members, uncover their safehouses and take down their mastermind.

name: Panmorphia: Awakened
summary: A point and click, puzzle adventure game set in the magical world of Panmorphia. Wield the Amulet and transform into one of the four animals that represent the four elements. Each change also brings a unique perspective of the world.

name: Paw Patrol Bundle
summary:
Enjoy both games from the series Paw Patrol!
Included in this bundle are:

Paw Patrol: On a Roll
PAW Patrol Mighty Pups Save Adventure Bay

A collection of great games that will provide hours of fun for everyone!

name: Payday 2: John Wick Heists
summary: THE LEGEND IS BACK IN TOWNThe John Wick Heist Pack is the 38th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The John Wick Heist Pack comes with 2 brand-new Heists: Brooklyn 10-10 and Yacht Heist, 2 new weapons, 4 masks, patterns, materials, 2 songs and 12 new achievements.

name: Payday 2: Biker Character Pack
summary: Loyalty can always be bought...The Biker Character Pack is the 10th character pack for PAYDAY 2. We are especially proud to introduce Ron Perlman as our new PAYDAY member Rust! The Biker Character Pack comes with the Breaker 12G Shotgun, the Chain Whip melee weapon, the Biker Perk Deck and Rust’s Mask.

name: Pac-Athlon
summary:
Compete in five different events with Pac-Man and co.!

Pac-Athlon is a minigame that was originally released in 1999 as part of a Japan-only CD-ROM release from Namco known as "Pac-Man no Desktop Daisakusen". This version is a fanmade remake built from the ground-up. It faithfully recreates every aspect of the original while also providing a few new things to play around with.

The Retro Mode covers the game with the classic pixel graphics of Pac-Man's arcade games and a heavy dose of Namco fanservice as you can select from a whopping 17 different characters! You can also compete with friends locally in the game's alternative multiplayer modes!

name: Parisian Brasserie Simulator
summary: Manage your own brasserie in Paris and turn it into the place to be! Create menus, serve customers, and master every detail to grow your restaurant. Manage supplies, ensure top-notch service, and make your mark on the city of lights. Will you become the next Parisian brasserie institution?

name: Party, Darling?
summary: A weird & abrasive sci-fi mystery narrative adventure game.

name: Parasomnia
summary: What begins as a simple funeral wake spirals into something far more sinister. As the Wan Siblings, explore their childhood home and uncover a dark plot, all the while surviving the malice of the tragic denizens trapped therein.

name: Pazinko!
summary: Pazinko! is a fast-paced arcade pachinko game. Launch chrome balls through vibrant, dynamic pegboards. Test your reflexes and timing as you launch balls through a maze of obstacles, aiming for the highest score.

name: P.A.C.K.: Post Apocalyptic Cleaning Kit
summary: Step into the wheels of a robot in this sci-fi cleaning adventure set after the apocalypse. Wash, vacuum, repair and clear debris from abandoned structures while learning about the ultimate fate of mankind, alone or with friends.

name: Parade
summary: Parade is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. At the beginning of the game the player is given the option to play as either Reika or Iwakutsuki. The goal of the game is to explore and collect effects. There are multiple endings for both characters.

name: Parasite Tunnel
summary: A creepy tunnel inhabited by a gigantic creature. You are trapped inside this tunnel. Escape the giant creature, search for the tunnel's exit, and make your escape. This is a short horror game that envelops the player in a sense of unease and tension.

name: Parliament of Hell 1796
summary: Parliament of Hell is a horror comedy adventure game set in 18th century England. Young gothic poet Matthew has been forced to serve in Government by his Father. He will get himself kicked out by any means necessary, even if he must call on the Devil himself…

name: Paranormal Roulette
summary: Descend into a haunted hotel casino where fate is twisted by a magical 8-ball. Shake it, interpret the signs, and place your bets as paranormal events guide your moves. Stack your chips, spin the roulette, and try to outwit the house in a game where intuition meets illusion.

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 4 Music A
PaymoneyWubby: The Game
summary: With his streaming livelihood taken from under him overnight, the dethroned PaymoneyWubby must venture through various parts of the world to reclaim his fame and fortune alongside his friends and fans!

name: Passant: A Chess Roguelike
summary: Passant is a chess roguelike. Gather powerful pieces, items to win unwinnable games and badges which can provide power-ups and change how the game is played.

name: PalSync
summary: In PalSync, control two characters who must move together at the same time. Face challenging levels where perfect synchronization is key to solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles. Test your coordination skills in this unique single-player experience!

name: Parkour Chief: Chapter Secret Agent
summary: In the future, you must retrieve a stolen hyper-advanced CPU from the CyberQuark Corporation before they use it to create destructive AI robots. In Parkour Chief: Secret Agent, you'll use your parkour and stealth skills to infiltrate CyberQuark's headquarters and recover the CPU.

name: Parcel Dash
summary: Parcel Dash is a fast paced, arcade like time trial. Plan the most efficient route to deliver packages as fast as you can and compete in online leaderboards.

name: Pair-A-Dice
summary: Decide your fate with a game of Pair-A-Dice. A strategic fight to relinquish your cards with dice that match, while Navigating a strange world with even stranger inhabitants. Despite what they claim, no one seems to play fair. Will you?

name: Paracusia
summary: "Paracusia is a third person survival horror game featuring fixed cameras and tank controls. Use the various resources found in the theater to defend yourself from the horrors waiting inside."

name: Parasite Flower
summary:
A short disturbing horror game where you're playing as Ari Yeong, she is re-living the same day over and over again . With each loop the world around her get's darker and more dangerous.

Get her to school safely.

name: Paper Battlefield
summary: A strategy game where warfare takes place in a drawn world bound by the limits of a notebook. Experience a real-time strategy experience where all your units and structures are drawn with ink.

name: Party Quiz Mega Q
summary:
Party Quiz Mega Q is a 1993 quiz game for the Sega Mega Drive by Sega released exclusively in Japan.

The game presents itself as a quiz show where you answer questions for points. Each of the four buttons (A, B, C, and any D-pad button) represents a choice — simply hit the button to make a choice. Get a question wrong and you lose points.

name: Paris Transylvania
summary: A turn-based vampire-slaying Pachinko Roguelike Deckbuilder mayhem! Collect a powerful deck of cards, strategize, aim, and pop pegs to power up and deal massive damage with relic synergies. Play as one of the unlikely heroes, explore and conquer Transylvania, defeating mighty vampire clans and hordes of evil.

name: Paleo Pines: Halloween Bundle
summary: Paleo Pines: Halloween Bundle includes the base game along with the Spooktacular and Trick or Treat DLCs. In the game, players explore an island inhabited by friendly dinosaurs and eccentric townsfolk, uncover its mysteries with their dino companion Lucky, and work with newly befriended dinosaurs to restore and customize a ranch into a personal sanctuary.

name: Parkitect: Taste of Adventure
summary: Experience a challenging new 10-level campaign, candy and adventure themed decorations, 8 new rides and 4 new shops in the Parkitect: Taste of Adventure DLC.

name: Paleo Pines: Spooktacular DLC
summary: Welcome to Paleo Pines, a charming island known for its friendly dinosaurs, quirky townsfolk, and mysterious past. Set out with your companion, Lucky, uncover the island’s secrets and befriend new dinos. Then enlist their help to fix up your ranch and farm crops to create your cozy dino sanctuary!

name: Passing By: A Tailwind Journey
summary:
Set in a beautiful and whimsical world of floating isles and a never-ceasing west wind, Passing By - A Tailwind Journey allows you to embark on a memorable voyage as Curly, a young balloonist, who is tasked with delivering a mysterious letter.

In this genre hybrid of 2D puzzle platformer, survival game and adventure, you can explore the world at your own leisure, travelling from island to island by balloon ship and solving various puzzles while having to manage your resources in order to survive. An exciting adventure full of wholesome encounters and meaningful experiences awaits you!

name: Paranormal Files: Enjoy the Shopping
summary: Rick Rogers is back for another case, and this time he’s going undercover as a security guard to investigate a series of strange paranormal events at the local mall. Can Rick figure out what’s been causing the other guards to have mental breakdowns, or will he lose his own mind in the process? Find out in this dark hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Patchwork Girl
summary: Patchwork Girl tells the story through illustrations of parts of a female body that are stitched together through text and image. The narrative of the story is divided into five segments, titled: "a Graveyard", "a Journal", "a Quilt", "a Story", and "& broken accents." The goal of the piece is to not only make the reader realize the structure of the Patchwork Girl as a whole but also realize all the pieces that must be "patched" together in order to create one unified structure.

name: Parallel
summary: Parallel is a stealth-based survival horror sci-fi game where you must unravel the mysteries of what happened on a local space station. Can discover the experiments that took place here and live to tell the tale?

name: Pathmaker
summary: Pathmaker is a single-player puzzle game with the goal to get all of your carts from one side to the other. Cross tracks, avoid obstacles, and make sure the carts don't collide with each other. 130 levels range from simple to very challenging. Exercise your logic skills!

name: Patrick's Parabox
summary: A mind-bending recursive puzzle game about boxes within boxes within boxes within boxes. Learn to use infinity to your advantage as you explore a deep and elegant system.

name: Pact of Blood
summary: Blood is the price of survival, and you are trapped forever. Explore kingdoms through ancient portals, battle twisted creatures, and craft the tools you need to survive in this first-person single-player survival adventure.

name: Paper - A Game of Folding
summary: An origami puzzle game suitable for all ages! Fold simulated paper to match the target... You're given a score based on how accurate you are.

name: Paprika Trainer
summary:
You play as a inmate being kept in the WOOHP asylum for the criminally insane. When suddenly the power goes out, all the villains escape and turn Beverly Hills into a warzone. It's up to you and the three spies to go undercover and take back the city!

In this game you go on missions, capture gang leaders and keep your spies safe by preforming more and more slutty actions. While playing you will encounter an engrossing, comedic story, a fully implemented mission mini-game, lots of supporting characters and of course many many lewd scenes. Most of which are fully animated and voice acted!

name: PayGame
summary: 《PayGame》is a black-and-white hand-drawn dungeon exploration game.You must race against time through randomly generated rooms, combining items and bills to pay massive amounts of money in order to stay alive.Each run offers a brand-new challenge and a completely different experience

name: Paws & Claws: Pet School
summary:
Experience the fun and excitement of being a real Pet Trainer! Choose from 6 of your favorite animals including dogs, horses, cats, mice, rabbits & parrots! Build the country’s best Pet School by giving your pets plenty of healthy food, exercise and love as you train them!

							Teach parrots to speak and sing for a street performing act in the park. Train rabbits and mice to jump and run on a wheel for an upcoming competition. Coach cats to complete an obstacle course for a feature roll in a comedy film. Challenge dogs to jump over obstacles for stunts in an action movie. Guide your horses through an equestrian course to win the blue ribbon!Features:							Way To Go! You are the proud owner of your very own Pet School. Care for, love and train your best friends to be amazing animals that have amazing jobs!
								Become the Best Pet Trainer in Town! Choose from 6 different kinds of animals to train for amazing stunts, tricks and jobs.
								Design your own Pet School! Choose your buildings and create great training arenas for all of your animal friends. 
								Customize your character & go shopping! Choose to be a boy or a girl, then select from 1,000+ cool outfits combinations.
								Care for your animals! Feed, exercise and clean their kennels and stables to keep them healthy and happy! 
								Teach your animal friends up to 14 unique tricks and reward them with treats or they may not respond to commands!
								Attend the Academy to improve your training abilities, grow your school and earn the trust of pet owners.

name: Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac
summary: PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC modernizes, updates, and enhances the fan favorite 3D Platforming adventure in nearly every way! Venture across PAC-LAND to reclaim the golden fruit and put a stop to the ghosts and their dastardly boss, Spooky!

name: Paralives
summary: You live and then you die. But at least do it in a nice house! Paralives is an upcoming life simulation indie game. Build your dream house, create some characters and manage their lives the way you want!

name: Pandora's Doom: Apocalypse Hotline
summary: Build your defenses, fortify your base, and battle relentless waves of alien invaders unleashed from Pandora's Box! Strategically place turrets, survive the onslaught, and save the planet!

name: Pac-Man 2600
summary:
This is a "new" version of Pac-Man for Atari 2600 I've been programming since about 2007, but had left in 2008, then in 2013 I resume again to try to finish.

I've been trying to make it as close to the original looking at various sites on the "AI" Ghosts, game logic, etc.

This version has nothing to do with the other version called pacman4k, this is a completely new version, do not use any undocumented opcode.

Currently the rom is about 120 bytes free, so I'm trying to add other things.

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 11
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 11 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 11 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Parasol Stars: The Story of Bubble Bobble III
summary:
Break out the bandages and get ready for some finger-searing action! Join Bubby on his latest quest to save the universe, this time with a Magic Umbrella. Umbrella!? Yes, Umbrella! This powerful parasol puts the elements themselves at your command! Shock the tonnage out of the whales with Lightning! Fry the feathers off the crazed, beady-eyed birds with Fire! Or, drown the demented dinosaurs with a tidal wave of Raindrops! Need help? Your buddy Bobby is always nearby. Have a friend plug into your TurboTap and blast into two player simultaneous play. Be prepared for a quest that will take you to eight amazing planets, forcing you to uncover the secret that will unleash the Parasol Stars!

Parasol Stars is the third game in the Bubble Bobble franchise (and is often labeled "Parasol Stars: The Story Bubble Bobble III"), as well as a semi-official sequel to the second Bubble Bobble spin-off, Rainbow Island.

name: Passion Rift
summary: Enter a futuristic reality show where you seduce exotic beings, battle interdimensional monsters, and uncover dark corporate secrets. Build your team, chase desire, and become a star on screen... and behind the scenes.

name: Park Beyond: Beyond eXtreme - Theme World
summary: Blaize’s career is skyrocketing and this calls for a mind-blowing celebration. Join her in creating a brand new festival park that is perfect for dare devils... Stuntwomen... and Adrenaline junkies!

name: Pac-Man Colour Handheld LCD Game
summary: Uses a light sensor to project the screen onto a mirror. An alternate, seemingly unauthorized version was produced (by Zeon Tech themselves) titled "Arcade Classic", which features Pac-Man wearing a cowboy hat.

name: Pac-Man
summary: A port of Pac-Man for Commodore VIC-20.

name: Paradox Wrench
summary: Paradox Wrench is a first person puzzle game. You have agreed to be part of an undisclosed experiment. You will be equipped with a special weapon-like tool. This tool has the ability to switch the physical dimension of certain objects, as well as your own.

name: Parcel
summary: Parcel is a multi-character cyberpunk puzzle game where your goal is to solve interlocking laser puzzles by using the unique abilities of different characters. The game can be played alone or cooperatively with friends. The game features over 120 unique puzzles and a level editor which enables the amount of playable content to grow to unpredictable numbers. A puzzling future awaits!

name: Papo & Yo
summary: A semi-autobiographical 3D puzzle platformer in which a boy named Quico is transported from his abusive home into a dreamlike favela where he has to lead an easygoing creature named Monster through the world with the help of his sister and Lula, his robotic doll, while protecting himself and his companions from Monster's frenzy fits brought on by an addiction to poison frogs.

name: Painted In Blood
summary: Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combat with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically, seamlessly blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements.

name: Pass the Punch
summary:
Pass The Punch follows the story of Rush, a resident of New Atlas, as she fights the dastardly villains King Crab and Red Velvet, who are hell-bent turning Rush’s favourite hangouts into lifeless, corporate franchises. It’s up to Rush and her three friends to claim back their city for the people!

The residents of New Atlas can transform into powerful beings with abilities based on their everyday lives. Rush is a gym owner who transforms into a lightspeed boxing champion and her buddy Claud is a LARPer whose foam sword grants the ability to turn into a badass berserker. Players can choose to fight as Rush, Claud, Beetle or Wizard to battle hyper-aggressive hot sauce bottles, disco-dancing mirror balls and over-affectionate ice-cream cones to name but a few of King Crab and Red Velvet’s minions.

Learn the moves and combos of each fighter, play solo with an AI sidekick, or in two-player local co-op. Find depth in the unique ways each character’s attacks compliment the others and “pass the punch” to create a unique ultimate attack, which changes based on which characters combine their powers. With so many punches to pass, high scores to hit, hoops to shoot, secrets to discover and extra content to unlock, Pass The Punch will keep players busy until they are TKO’d.

name: Pack Master
summary: This is a simulation game where you play as a "Rich Man" with 1 million to spend freely in a live streaming room. You'll experience the thrilling sensation of card opening in live streams and challenge your luck.

name: Paladin's Oath
summary: Paladin's Oath combines elements of RPG and light deck-building where Cards / Mana / Recruitable Followers and always-on Blessings must be synergized to Move, Interact and Battle with unlimited undo mechanics during battles to find the best possible outcome.

name: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door Encore
Paws
summary: In this unique top-down game from 1985, you are a mother cat whose twelve young kittens have wandered off into a labarinthine town prowled by fearsome dogs. Can you save them all?

name: Parquet
summary: In the near future, a technology called Brain-Machine Interface connects the brain and machines. This technology brings about a new paradigm and opens the gates to the digitization of human memory itself. From these new discoveries, "he" is born.

name: Pack Master
summary:
Can you pack it all in? Are you an expert packer? Only the smartest travelers can visit every country. Be the leader of the pack!
What is more refreshing than the feeling of a nice, perfectly organized suitcase? Relive that relaxing feeling over and over again as you get ready to travel with Pack Master. Your one simple challenge is to fill your suitcase with the myriad objects provided. All at once easy and increasingly frustrating.

Travel around the world to international cities and solve special puzzles created specifically for each of them. Organization is key since your suitcases are not the boring rectangles you are used to. We will strain the limits of your imagination as you try to fit the pieces into cases of all shapes and sizes.

name: Pac-Man vs. & Pac-Man World 2
summary: Pac-Man vs & Pac-Man World 2 is a bundle release containing both the video games Pac-Man vs and Pac-Man World 2.

name: Partygoer!
summary: PARTYGOER is an rpgmaker puzzle horror game about your birthday going.. not as you expected. Inspired by a little bit of House of Leaves and heavily inspired by Petscop.

name: Path to the Unknown
summary:
"Path to the Unknown" is an exciting adventure that will transport you to a world of mysteries, puzzles, and challenges. In this game, you take on the role of a courageous explorer embarking on a journey through unknown territories to uncover ancient secrets.

The game features a variety of brain teasers, complex puzzles, and intriguing riddles. You will explore abandoned and forgotten places, decipher codes, and discover hidden clues that will lead you to the next part of the puzzle.

At every turn, you will encounter new challenges and mysteries to unravel in order to progress on your journey. Your logical thinking, wit, and observation skills will be crucial. Collect indicators, find unlocked doors, and pave your way to the ultimate revelation.

Can you solve all the puzzles, overcome obstacles, and reach the final destination of your journey? Your adventure begins here. Embark on the "Path to the Unknown" and unlock a world of mysteries!

name: Pastel Friends
summary: Relaxing game, in which you decorate avatars and background in pastel colors.

name: Panic Palette Portable
summary: Panic Palette Portable is a port of Panic Palette for PlayStation Portable.

name: Pac-Attack
summary:
Based on Namco's Japanese-only arcade puzzler Cosmo Gang the Puzzle, Pac-Attack is similar to many block-dropping puzzle games from the time, such as Puyo Puyo.

The objective of the game is to place ghosts and blocks that are arranged in a three part L-shaped piece, so that Pac-Man, after three or more pieces (who replaces one of the parts), can eat as many ghosts as possible to try and clear up the game area. Pac-Man's directions are chosen at random between left or right, but as he goes moving on in the game area (after you place him, of course), if he bumps against a block or the "walls" of the game area, he will change his direction.

As Pac-Man eats ghosts and clear rows of blocks, the level increases, which affects the speed and gravity of the pieces one places, as well as the amount of pieces placed before Pac-Man will appear. If one is unable to fit the bottom two parts of a piece into a legal zone of the playing area, the game ends. However, by filling up a meter on the left of the screen via eating ghosts, a fairy will be summoned in place of Pac-Man. She can fit into any empty space, and can clear up to 7 rows of ghosts; all blocks that were on top of cleared ghosts will drop down accordingly.

The game also includes a Puzzle mode. It features 100 levels, in which you have to eat all ghosts with no more than 4 Pac-Men at least (the number reduces in certain levels), and, unlike the other modes, you can change Pac-Man's direction with the press of a button.

name: PaperCars Tycoon
summary: Papercars Tyccon is a small old school tycoon game about automobile. From a humble garage startup to a global automotive giant, your mission is to design cutting-edge vehicles, manage your factories and your staff in order to avoid bankruptcy.

name: Papergames.io
summary:
Classic real-time two player games. Play against your friends or random people.

papergames.io is an interactive platform that lets you enjoy classic board games online, including Chess, Tic Tac Toe, Battleship, Connect 4, and Gomoku.

name: Payout: Shop Simulator
summary: Build and manage your shop, deliver physics-based products using Van, Forklift and Truck. Hire workers to speed up your progress

name: Pako
summary: Pako is a car chase simulator that focuses on you evading cops. The aim of the game is to survive as long as possible without crashing and ending the game.

name: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
summary:
A remake of the second game in the Paper Mario series, originally released for the Nintendo GameCube.

Turn the page and join Mario and friends in an RPG adventure to discover the legendary treasure behind the ancient Thousand-Year Door. Will Mario complete his papery quest, or will he crumple under the pressure?

name: Party Animals
summary: Fight your friends as puppies, kittens and other fuzzy creatures in PARTY ANIMALS! Paw it out with your friends remotely, or huddle together for chaotic fun on the same screen. Interact with the world under our realistic physics engine. Did I mention PUPPIES?

name: Pankapu
summary:
Pankapu is a 2D platform/action game, narrative and episodic:

In a world full of Dreams and Nightmares, a tiny warrior has to fight for the safety of his homeland. However, the real purpose of his his quest, beyond the struggle of good and evil, is the mental health of a traumatized child.
