Told in the manner of a fable read to a child, the game has two levels of reading: the story of Pankapu, epic and naive, and the second one, about Djaha’rell life, the one to whom the tale is told, dark and tragic.

name: Paper Pirates
summary: Grab a crew and jump aboard a haunted pirate ship using your phones as controllers in Paper Pirates, a social deduction party game! Are you a human sailing home to shore or a ghost working against the crew? Throw your crewmates overboard, but fear not - nobody's ever out of the game!

name: Pandora
summary: Pandora is a third-person action-adventure hack n slash game that combines teleportation and combat abilities. Take on the role of Phase, a cyber-enhanced super-soldier detained by their creator, Sai-Corp. Escape the orbital testing facility and earn the freedom they stole from you long ago.

name: PaperKlay
summary: PaperKlay is a short and sweet 3D platformer where you unfold, open and rotate the paper environment in order to freely explore the cardboard world.

name: Pakistan Car Simulator Game
summary: Drive a selection of over 20 different cars from Pakistan and explore the world. Drive or drift across many cities or highways from many maps such as Dubai, Tokyo and Cairo.

name: Panilla Saga
summary: Panilla Saga is a mobile Japanese-style idle card-collection game by More2Game which combines idle RPG and instant battle game elements. It is available for Android and iOS in Taiwan and Hong Kong/Macau and SEA regions.

name: Painkiller Universe
summary: Bring the Pain! Trapped in a dark an unwelcoming world awaiting your purification, you must fight your way through over 50 species of Hell's wildest incarnations as you attempt to stop the imminent unholy war. Painkiller and Painkiller Battle out of Hell took the world by storm, capturing the souls of FPS-fans and winning multiple Game of the Year awards. In Painkiller: Overdose, play as the tortured son of Heaven and Hell, Belial. This stand-alone expansion packs 17 single player levels, new weapons, lightning-fast multiplayer maps, more than 40 sickly-twisted monsters & gigantic bosses that will blow your mind!

name: Paper Cut Mansion
summary: A horror game about a guy lost in a mansion where everything is made of cardboard. Escaping from the house won’t be an easy task! Some of the rooms are locked and the player will need to solve different types of riddles to advance through the levels. The hints to solve the riddles will be hidden inside the furniture of the mansion but watch out! You don’t know what else is lurking inside those cardboard models!

name: Paradise Girls
summary: Welcome to Paradise Cove, your new home. Thanks to your twin who owns the local resort you have a place to stay and even a cushy job to work whenever you please. Now you can freely explore this beach front community, meet the various women and start a fresh life, find love, or just have fun.

name: Paper 2: Origami Refolded
summary: Fold your way through over 100 levels and become an origami master in this casual puzzle game suitable for all ages.

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 1 Music D
Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Inevitable Excess
summary: Answer a plea from a powerful entity and defend the space-time continuum against imminent collapse. Use your unparalleled mythic powers to do battle with truly invincible opponents.

name: Panzer Front
summary: Set in various theaters of World War II, this tank sim pits Russian, German, and American armor against each other in a series of missions designed to test both strategizing and twitching abilities, albeit with a heavy emphasis on the former. The game offers two main modes, Tank Select and Tactics. Tank Select is an arcade-style mode, with exaggerated tank capabilities and basic missions, most revolving around killing whatever moves. Tactics offers a selection of 28 different maps with a variety of terrain, opposition, and victory conditions. The missions are almost evenly divided between Russian, American, and German missions, but secondary factors mix things up so thoroughly that the different capabilities of each army's tanks are only a small drop in the bucket full of strategic factors you have to consider.

name: Pago Forest: Dragon's Revenge
summary: The first of its kind, "Pago's Forest" is an educational game: you improve your grammar through the discovery of a heroic fantasy tale.

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 2 Music A
Paranormal Files: Fellow Traveler
summary: Keep your wits about you explore this crumbling mansion in search of the truth behind the disappearances in the first episode of this new hidden-object adventure puzzle game series!

name: Payday 2: The Armored Transport
summary:
PAYDAY 2 is an action-packed, four-player co-op shooter that once again lets gamers don the masks of the original PAYDAY crew - Dallas, Hoxton, Wolf and Chains - as they descend on Washington D.C. for an epic crime spree.

The Armored Transport DLC is the first DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do every heisters dream – robbing armored transports, full of valuables, right in the middle of Washington D.C.

Up to four friends co-operate on the heists, and as the crew progresses they have a chance to unlock an even more rewarding job – doing a classic train robbery. New weapons, weapon modifications, masks, patterns and materials have been added to let players continue to build and customize their own guns and gear.

name: Paper Train: Traffic
summary: Paper Train Traffic is here to test your mind and reflexes with increasingly complex challenges. From single railroads to multi railway nodes, your task is to supervise the ongoing train traffic of many different locations around the World. Give your best to avoid rail disruption and train delays while preventing any possible train collisions. Do you think you are ready for the challenge?

name: Parking Tycoon: Business Simulator
summary: Are you ready to immerse yourself in the exhilarating world of car parking management? Step into the shoes of a visionary entrepreneur and become the ultimate Parking Lot Tycoon! Take Charge and embark on a thrilling journey of strategy, expansion, and success.

name: Pawtastic Diner
summary:
Pawtastic Diner is a fast-paced, high-score chasing game where you step into the shoes of a diner worker in an cat-filled world. Your mission is to serve as many customers as possible, selecting the correct ingredients for each order and delivering them swiftly before the customers leave in a huff.

Quickly pick the right ingredients, assemble the dishes in the kitchen, and bring them to the eager patrons. As you play, you'll encounter nods and easter eggs related to the german artist scene, adding a unique and playful twist to the experience.

Perfect your serving skills, beat your own high score, and enjoy the charm of this pawtastic diner.

name: Paper Mario TTYD64
summary: TTYD64 is a PM64 romhack that adds TTYD's gameplay into the original Paper Mario plus all new items, badges, and recipes from that game, and a lot of new areas to explore plus other additions.

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Bloody Mess
summary: The "Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Bloody Mess" DLC lets you bask in the gore and glory of battle, witnessing its bloody traces both on your companions and your enemies.

name: Pac-Mania
summary: Pac-Mania is a variation on the game Pac-Man. You need to guide Pac-Man around a maze and eat all of the dots on the board to proceed on to the next round. Numerous, multi-colored ghosts also roam the maze trying to stop you. If you eat one of the power pellets in the maze, the ghosts will temporarily turn blue and run from you. Pac-Man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now shown in isometric perspective and is larger than the screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man can now jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid-air collision!

name: Pachillinko
summary: Pachillinko is a mix of japanese Pachinko and western Plinko style game, set in neon synthwave design with some retro feeling of 80s. Relaxing mouse-only clicking gameplay allows you to sit back and just chill...

name: Path of Gear: Blacksmith’s Legend
summary:
Path of Gear: Blacksmith’s Legend is a tactical roguelite RPG that combines timeline-based turn-based combat with dynamic weapon forging.
Play as a legendary blacksmith who forges powerful weapons and supports adventurers in wielding them effectively.
Explore procedurally generated maps, face unpredictable events, and battle formidable foes in a journey filled with strategic challenges and surprises.

name: Pack my LunchBox
summary: Pack my LunchBox is a cute and relaxing puzzle game where you assemble lunchboxes based on customer wishes. Read the cards, consider their likes and dislikes, and choose the perfect meal, drink, and snack. Meet all the conditions to clear the level!

name: PaperPlane
summary:
PaperPlane is a video game where you fly a paper airplane through typical childhood memories. You give life back to these memories by flying close to them, through them or around them.
Enabling those memories give access to little sketches which put some movement to the landscape. Also, each one of them is can be viewed in a polaroid pictures book inside the tree house.

name: Patrick
summary: A very short game about having an uncomfortable conversation with a vaguely sinister white guy.

name: Paradiso Guardian
summary: A metroidvania game heavily influenced by SOTN. Play as Lenga, the Battle Angel, going on a quest to reclaim the floating castle occupied by the Demon army!

name: Pac-Man
summary: A port of Pac-Man for old iPods.

name: Pac-Man Live Studio
summary: PAC-MAN LIVE STUDIO is a game published by Amazon playable on the Twitch website. It lets you play co-op multiplayer PAC-MAN with friends online and publish mazes to the community. It was created in celebration of PAC-MAN’s 40th Anniversary.

name: Pac-Man Couchcade
summary:
Have a seat, get comfy, and Play Again with an Arcade1Up Couchcade!

Easily connect the Micro Game Console to your TV via HDMI port, the wireless control deck features real-feel arcade controls on top, and a soft bean bag bottom. Yep, retrogaming just literally fell into your lap!

And yes, the Pac-Man Couchcade is absolutely packed with games. Let’s start off with our headliner, the icon of icons, PAC-MAN. Power up that nostalgia (no matter what your age), as you guide him through those infamous mazes, while steering clear of aggressive ghosts BLINKY, PINKY, INKY and CLYDE. Then take on the sequel, PAC-MANIA!

Oh, and that’s just the start of the phenomenal game list: you’ve also got the underground antics of DIG DUG and DIG DUG II, the interstellar action of GALAXIAN, GALAGA, and GALAGA ‘88, the lighthearted fun of MAPPY, and yeah, NEW RALLY-X and ROLLING THUNDER!

Yes, ALL are included. Switch up to any game at will, with the easy to navigate on-screen menus.

Ten games, unlimited retrogaming fun. If there’s any reason to become a couch potato (with no apologies), this is it. your Arcade1Up Couchcade is here!

name: Pac-Man
summary:
A port for the Micro Games of America LCD handheld device.

Pac-Man is one of the most popular and influential games of the 1980's, Pac-Man stars a little, yellow dot-muncher who works his way around to clear a maze of the various dots and fruit which inhabit the board.

name: Pakicetus Redux
summary: In deep-sea action-adventure game Pakicetus Redux, take command, choose your mission, and lead the escort submarine Salvation along a seafloor rift. Balance resource collection, upgrades, and the fate of human civilization as you battle an emerging enemy bent on stopping your search for a new home.

name: Pac-Man
summary: A Pac-Man port for Sharp X1.

name: Pac-Man
summary: A port of Pac-Man for the FM-77 computer.

name: Pacific Minesweeper
summary: Dive into the Pacific's depths in a submersible, navigating through different areas to defuse mines and score points. Aim for precision with limited shots. Avoid errors to keep your lives. Experience high-stakes, strategic gameplay in this free singleplayer adventure!

name: Paprika x Persona False God Reincarnation
summary: Dream researcher Paprika - whose real identity is Dr. Atsuko Chiba, a psychotherapist - begins experiencing vivid, unsettling nightmares. These visions include a ruined Tokyo, her former colleague transformed into the demon Amon, the enigmatic entity Philemon, and the mysterious Velvet Room. As these dreams intensify, Tokyo itself is gripped by widespread phenomena of mass hallucinations, blurring the line between dream and reality as patients’ subconscious fears leak into the waking world. To uncover the source of this phenomenon, Paprika and her intern students turn to the retro game Megami Ibunroku Persona as both a tool and a guide.

name: Pavilion
summary: Pavilion, a fourth-person puzzling adventure, throws you directly into its mysterious world without any text tutorials or beginning explanations. A puzzle game portrayed through exploration and audio-visual imagery.

name: Pages of Time
summary: Pages of Time: Prologue is a 2D platformer puzzle game. Play as the witch who controls the magic of time, in a beautiful and magnificent magic academy, utilize the skills of recording and rewinding time, solve all kinds of puzzles, and look forward to the adventure of the future.

name: Pachicom
summary:
Pachinko-themed game released in Japan for the MSX, PC-88, Family Computer, and Famicom Disk System.

Pachicom is an early pachinko simulator for various Japanese home computers along with Nintendo's Famicom and Famicom Disk System. It gives players the opportunity to play a pachinko table with several hundred small variations, with the goal to earn a high score in the time allotted.

Hidden Sounds
A programmer of this game hid inside the ROM a separate series of sound effects which apparently the management did not like and forced him to change. In protest, the programmer left the following message to ROM hackers inside the code teaching them how to enable the other sounds effects.

You RETARDS say one thing, then something else later all the time. You're a sound company; quit ignoring pachinko sounds and trying to put these weird sounds in instead! Do you WANT it ti be this hard to hear the balls?! I've left the PREVIOUS sounds, so edit this if you want to hear it. Set hex address AFFC to 1FAF and AFC4 to E0EE to get decent sounds.

name: Pachi-Slot Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri
summary: Pachi-Slot Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri is a pachi-slot simulator based on Higurashi When They Cry, released in the same month as the real machine with the same name by Alchemist.

name: Paw Patrol World: Halloween - Costume Pack
summary: Help your PAWsome Pups turn into Halloween Heroes as they take on Humdinger's Mayhem with this ghostaclar skin pack.

name: Pale Night
summary: Help Pal overcome the curse forcing him to hide from light. Explore the world of Vector and join an epic adventure through a beautiful world of shapes and colors in this tight platformer.

name: Paul Sloane & Des MacHale's Intriguing Tales 2
Part Time Job
summary: Part Time Job is a My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Visual Novel developed by Yumi-And-ZB, also going by Samuel Kingsley. You play as pegasus mare Pastel Sketch, who is going through financial issues due to her artwork not earning her enough money. Looking for a part time job, she goes to the town bulletin board; among several choices she decides she wouldn't be good at, there's an ad for working at a hospital. Turns out it's a mental hospital, run by Fluttershy. Deciding she needs the rather large payment of thirty thousand bits, Pastel takes the job. She'll wish she hadn't. The game is based off of the song Wide Knowledge of the Late Madness.

name: Patapon 2 Replay
summary: PATAPON 2 released in 2008 is back as a remastered!

name: Paper Bleed
summary: Paper Bleed is a creepy and grotesque point-and-click adventure, made with a raw art style and disturbingly gory hand-drawn animations. You find yourself in a horrible yet familiar place, facing your deepest fears and darkest thoughts. Nothing really dies here and you are all alone...

name: Patapon Remastered
summary: Patapon is an innovative, rhythm-based 2D platform/action game marching to PlayStation 4 with revitalized graphics output in 4K resolution and 1080p. An iconic PlayStation game, players are tasked with leading the colorful Patapons, a brave and noble tribe, through a series of epic battles against opposing armies and gigantic monsters. In a distinct gameplay twist, action and rhythm are intertwined as players utilize drumbeats to march, attack, and defend, ultimately leading the Patapon tribe to victory.

name: Pathfinder Online
summary:
Pathfinder Online is a Fantasy Sandbox MMO with Open World PvP based on the Pathfinder intellectual property used with a license from Paizo, inc.
Pathfinder Online features no set classes, no grinding, a player driven economy, and so much more.

name: Panel Action Bingo
summary:
The Classic Game Moves Into the Electronic Age.

Looking for a new challenge for the Game Boy? BINGO! You've found it! Panel Action Bingo pits you against the computer or a friend (with the Game Boy Game Link) in an exciting race for time. You're the Bird, and your opponent is the Cat. You must claim one of the 25 panels in the correct order. The object: grab five panels in a row - vertically, horizontally, or diagonally - to get BINGO... before the Cat does!

Choose from one of the many game play variations: there's the Number game, the Alphabet game, and the Option function, which lets you control different aspects of the game to make it more challenging. They include:
-Second 3: Your position shifts when you stay in one spot for more than 3 seconds.
-Ice Stage: The play field becomes slippery, and its's tough to stop where you want!
-Hide: Some of the squares on the panel are blank until you land there (but the Cat still knows what they are!)
-Break: ALL the squares are blank; choose this for a test of memory as well as speed!
- 60 levels, 240 round in all, including 60 bonus rounds
- Password feature
- Pause function lets you resume the game where you left off
- Beware the Black Hole and Star squares that challenge your every move
- Hook up the Game Link for 2-player action

Pick up Panel Bingo today ... don't let that nasty Cat win!

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - The Last Sarkorians
summary: The nation of Sarkoris was destroyed by the demons, yet the last of its people are ready to fight back. Meet Ulbrig Olesk, a Sarkorian shifter capable of turning into a mighty griffon. Explore a new region, fight new enemies... And maybe even find new love!

name: Parcel Frenzy: Get To Work!
summary: Run the warehouse while your boss relaxes on a beach. Sort packages by weight, stack pallets under 60kg, label them, manage power, and deal with failing machines. Everything costs money. Mess up and you’re fined. Keep it running, or the company goes under.

name: Pacebreaker: An Experiment in AI-Perfected Exercise
summary: VR is not just fun exercise. It's the first generation of exercise equipment capable of meaningful live bio-feedback. Pacebreaker is the VR Health Institute's testing ground for research-based next generation exercise in VR, artificial intelligence, and content that can help save lives.

name: Party Box
summary: PartyBox is a free party game inspired by the Jackbox format, designed for players who enjoy bold humor and awkward situations. Thousands of professionally narrated prompts across dozens of game categories easily turn any gathering into lively discussions and heated debates. Create and add your own questions with custom voice lines, and discover unexpected sides of your friends. Download the game for free, gather around a big screen, and get ready for an unforgettable night of laughter.

name: Pathfinder Puzzle
summary: Find the right path to collect all stars and bring you car save to the target zone.

name: Panda
summary: A 2D momentum based platformer.

name: Pagan: Emporium
summary: The Devil is Watching

name: Papetura: Craft Edition
summary:
One day Pape escapes from a flowery prison and finds little Tura, a magical being that he’ll take care of. Together they will have to face dark and flaming monsters which will try to burn down their beloved paper world.

Papetura is a handcrafted puzzle adventure game made entirely out of paper.

Along with atmospheric music made by Floex, Tomas Dvorak, it creates a mysterious and unique paper world shrouded in shadow and light.

Everything is made out of paper, from tiny insects, strange creatures and monsters to truly magical locations.

Includes Exclusive Case, Downloadable Soundtrack, Art book and Base Game.

name: Paca Paca Passion Special
summary:
The third title in Japan-only rhythm game series Pacapaca Passion.

Paca Paca Passion Special is the third and last game in the Paca Paca Passion series of music games made by Namco and that are conversion of Arcade Machines made too by Namco. In the game the player controls again one (but any of them can be choose) of four music group members and have to try to follow and play each melody that are featured in each game stage. Each group member play a different instrument: piano (Milka), keyboards (Plica), guitar (Cork) or drums (Geroppa). And the game difficulty is different depending of which instrument are choose. The game features different melodies and game modes, and also a vs mode against a computer or another human player. Since this is the latest one in the series the game features the best graphics in the series with good cartoon 3d graphics.

name: Party Bots
summary: Party Bots is an online party game for up to 100 players. Survive on your platform in a chaotic arena and be the last bot standing!

name: Parsec
summary: In Parsec you pilot a spaceship through a field of asteroids trying to destroy as many as possible before they destroy you. You have three different weapons that can be picked up around the world. Health can also be picked up from random spawns and sometimes dropped by asteroids.

name: Payday 2: Gage Mod Courier
summary: The Gage Mod Courier DLC is the sixth DLC for Payday 2. It allows players to act as a courier for Gage the arms dealer, picking up packages containing mods that are scattered all over D.C.

name: Path to Nowhere: Ditty Nightsong
summary:
Dark web trails, mysteries unravel
Hidden amidst bustle, lurking in shadows
Merging into night, awaiting dawn's arrival

name: Pantocrator 3D
summary:
Slash robots with a katana
...in this absolutely mindless first-person slasher.

name: Pandora's Box
summary: Slice/Life sex adventure

name: Passage IV: Race to the Grave
summary: Get further to the right than your twin, and enjoy the benefits of a well-placed death!

name: Packin'
summary: Pacman with conservation of mass.

name: Panmorphia
summary:
The legend goes that in each generation a child is born, a sentinel, bound to the land of Panmorphia and the four elements that govern it. 
 
The sentinels have the ability to wield each element and transform themselves into an animal that best represents it. 
 
With the use of the amulet they are able to combine all four elements and travel through the aether. 
 
They are called upon for help in times of need.

name: Paperball: Secret Spy Pack
summary: Help Coco the Cat on her quest to infiltrate a secret lair as you roll your way into a top secret mission!

name: Pandora's Toybox
summary: Pandora's Toybox combines god simulation and Roguelike elements. Players guide humanity from settlements to city-states, shaping a faith-driven civilization. As Epimetheus, use divine powers to combat heretical beliefs and build a thriving, devout society in a randomly generated, chaotic world.

name: Panzer Strategy
summary: Panzer Strategy: Blitzkrieg is a historical wargame on Unreal Engine where like in re­al life you can adapt your units to any objective using equipments and skills. Moreover you can make your tactics even more flexible with skills and abilities of your HQ and the HQ Commander! And all of these combined with UnrealEn­gine with the free camera mode allow you to ch­eck the whole scene fr­om the aerial view or fa­ll deep into act­ion with the close-up fu­nction!

name: Party Party Time + Special Packs
summary:
A party game with simple controls anyone can enjoy!
Pass around the Joy-Con and play with up to six players!
Experience a whole variety of intuitive, easy-to-play minigames.
Try to find your new favorite!

Pump up the party with the Party Fever Pack and Party Harder Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time!

name: Paw Paw Destiny
summary:
A cosmic horror comedy, free humanity from the cursed ancient cosmic brainwashing.
Annihilate enemies with skills of dark humor surreally and become a guardian god of the world while traveling. An epic battle against UNCO, the global dominance organization, and the demon transcends dimensions!

name: Panzer General
summary: You are the brightest and best of the new Axis generals in the Second World War. Your tactical skills will be tested in armored assaults, amphibious invasions, paradrops, naval engagements, and fierce aerial combat for control of the skies. Go from triumph to triumph, invading and seizing the capitals of Great Britain, the Soviet Union, and ultimately the United States of America on your way to conquering the whole world! Can you achieve a place in history?

name: Pastry Witches
summary: A cute, simple match-three and crafting game by Beemoov. Unlock recipes, customize your character, and work your way up to becoming the Grand High Pastry Witch. For Android and iPhone

name: Path of Master
summary: Path of Master is a roguelike‑inspired casual monster‑grinding game.You can continuously upgrade your skills to slay hordes of monsters and strive to survive.

name: Parsec
summary:
Parsec is a computer game for the Texas Instruments TI-99/4A. Perhaps the best-remembered of all TI-99/4A games, it is a side-scrolling shooter, programmed in 1982 by Jim Dramis (who also programmed the popular TI-99/4A games Car Wars and Munch Man) and Paul Urbanus.

The player in Parsec pilots a spaceship through sixteen differently-colored levels of play which scroll horizontally over the screen. The objective is to avoid being shot by an enemy ship, colliding with any flying object and/or the ground, and destroy all enemy ships without overheating one's laser cannon.

Three waves of fighters attack, alternating with three waves of cruisers. Enemy ships enter the screen one at a time. A ship flying off the left edge of the screen wraps around to the right side and attacks again. A new fighter can appear with others still on the screen, whereas a new cruiser will not come until the previous one is destroyed. The fighters pose only the threat of collision, while the cruisers fire on the player's ship. The fighter types are named Swoopers, LTFs (Light Triangular Fighters), and Saucers. The cruisers are called Urbites, Dramites, and Bynites. Each level ends with an asteroid belt, in which an array of asteroids advance on the ship and must be avoided or shot. At the end of each asteroid belt, any remaining asteroids are cleared away and the color of the ground is changed, then a new wave of Swoopers begins. Starting with level 4, the Swoopers are preceded by a random number of Killer Satellites, which come without the usual computer warning.

The Urbites and Dramites appear to be named after the developers of the game, while the Bynites were apparently named after Don Bynum (the manager of TI's Personal Computer Division) or possibly named after the fact that they have invisibility (by night). In fact, Paul Urbanus signed Internet posts as late as 2005 as "urbite".

name: Party Shift
summary: Get ready to party with your friends! Party Shift is a 2-8 player online party game where you will laugh, cheer and test your skills with our collection of exciting and unique minigames. For a night of endless entertainment and plenty of absurdity, grab your friends and shift into party mode.

name: Parking Masters: Deluxe Edition
summary: Welcome to Parking Masters, where you'll face the ultimate test of your parking skills in a variety of challenges! Maneuver vehicles through numerous levels, all designed with realistic physics and a captivating visual style.

name: Paper Mario
summary:
This game is a mix between Paper Mario and other traditional platformers. The player moves around in the same way he does in the original Paper Mario, while fighting enemies in a platformer-like style.

There is a point-based rank system in the game. Each time you defeat an enemy, you earn points. Every time you earn a certain number of points, you level up and earn more health. This gives you a reason to want to stop each and every goomba!

name: Pax Imperia: Eminent Domain
summary: This is a Spacial Estrategy game, a mix between Master of Orion and Imperium Galactica. You can be one of many races, each with advantages and disadvantages. The whole game is very customizable, from allowing you to customize galaxy size to designing your own ships.

name: Parrot
summary: Parrot is a 2D ninja parkour game

name: Path of Fury: Episode I - Tetsuo's Tower
summary: Path of Fury is a VR first-person action game focused on hand-to-hand combat. Set in a tower filled with enemies, players fight their way upward using precise, fast strikes. The gameplay emphasizes pattern recognition, endurance, and exploiting enemy weaknesses. While the experience is linear, repeated playthroughs reveal new details and progression elements. The game blends realistic Kung Fu-inspired mechanics with accessible controls, aiming to reward skill and consistency over time.

name: Pawn.OS()
summary: Pawn.OS() is a programming puzzle game where you use a custom scripting language to control a pawn on a grid. Solve 30 puzzles, learn logic step-by-step, and optimize your code to climb the leaderboard—even without any prior coding experience.

name: PandaBomber
summary: Step into the explosive world of PandaBomber, a modern reimagining of the classic Bomberman experience! Engage in fast-paced, strategic gameplay that challenges you to think on your feet while delivering heart-pounding action.

name: Pac-Guy: Resurrection
summary: Pac-Guy: Resurrection is an action game and spoof of Pac-Man. The game itself is a "resurrection" of the original Pac-Guy that include the original 12 levels with an additional new level from which you must eat all of the pellets while avoiding Kan's attacks. You navigate a maze collecting pellets while avoiding enemies. Big pellets act as ammunition that you can fire at enemies to remove them from the level permanently. Once you collect all the pellets and find the exit (sometimes automatic), you proceed to the next level. Losing all of your lives will merely send you back to the previous stage.

name: Paperbound
summary: Run with scissors and walk on walls in this award-winning local-multiplayer gravity battle arena game from the mind of a former Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare developer. Enter the pages of old books where you will find strange environments and a cabal of playable characters. Matches are not only fast-paced and intense, but they require you to think in whole new ways in order to master gravity.

name: Pac-Man World 2
summary: This version of Pac-Man World 2 is the Game Boy Advance portable version. It is sprite-based and an isometric platformer.

name: Paku Paku
summary: Available for free, Paku Paku is a proposal that transfers the action of Pac-Man to a one-dimensional maze of a single line with 16 points. In it, the goal of the protagonist (six pixels tall) is to eat points while avoiding the red ghost, an enemy that moves faster than you

name: Paranormal Cryptid Lovers
summary:
Open-minded, brave, and impatient, you’re passionate about monster movies and filmmaking. In fact, you’ve got plans to spend this last summer before film school making a movie with your friends! Or at least, you did until your mom roped you into staying with your eccentric Uncle Gary in the small town of Everly Springs…

Now you’re stuck working at his video store, swapping ghost stories with your coworker, Kit. You figure this summer’s a bust, but once Uncle Gary starts talking about the local legends, you’re rushing to grab your camera.

Within 48 hours, you fall straight into the arms of Prince Gil, a swamp man, and you also get swooped up by the local Owlman—Erebus. Will your sleuthing bring you closer to the truth of their existence or will you find yourself falling head over heels for the legends themselves?

name: Panspermia: Horror Myson Mansion
summary: After the disappearance of his sister Maria, Marcelo decides to start his search on his own since the police cancel the search for her, Marcelo goes alone to the Myson mansion, which was the last place she visited. A bizarre mystery awaits you at the Myson mansion.

name: Packing Life
summary: A cozy and satisfying puzzle-simulation game where you step into the role of a warehouse worker with a knack for perfectly organizing and packing orders. With charming visuals, relaxing gameplay, and a lighthearted story, experience the joy of transforming everyday tasks into a fulfilling adventure.

name: Pan's Permia
summary: Pan's Permia is a planetary city builder survival game, with intricate building mechanics, villager survival, in depth army combat, and tower defense mechanics!

name: Parsec Man 3D
summary: Parsec Man 3D is a minimalist action platformer shooter game published in 1994 on DOS.

name: Parfait: Chocolat Second Brew
summary: Parfait: Chocolat Second Brew is a Bishoujo romance visual novel about two cafes competing for business. It is also a sequel to the popular game Chocolat ~Maid Cafe Curio~.

name: Patriot: Democratization
summary: Patriot: DemocratiZation is a single-player shooter set in 2017 Russia invaded by the United States. You play as a guerrilla soldier fighting against the invaders.

name: Pac-Man SDL
summary: Pac-Man Arrangement inspired fangame

name: Papa's Taco Mia To Go!
summary: It's a flavor fiesta in this new version of Papa's Taco Mia, with gameplay and controls reimagined for iPhone and iPod Touch!

name: Paloo Spiral
summary: Classic run n' gun gameplay mixed with fast paced melee combat! Rack up your combo to unleash even more powerful attacks!

name: Pac-01
summary:
A certain round yellow guy, who’s probably the most iconic video game character ever, makes his entrance in ARC8’s recent MSX game called “PAC-01”. That’s right, it is Pac-Man himself that makes waves in the world’s fastest dot eating game.

Combine Pac-Man with relentless vertical scrolling, and you get an interesting game concept. In PAC-01, your playfield scrolls from bottom to top, as pills are scattered around to be eaten. However, pills aren’t the sole item on the menu. The point of PAC-01 is that you advance a level when you had all six of the the spooky baddies for lunch – or dinner, whatever you prefer. Also, as is only befitting in a Pac-Man themed game, pieces of fruit will appear occasionally to serve as a refreshing snack which will increase your score.

In this fine piece of Z80 entertainment, you hunt down the ghosts that escaped from the glitch; the deadly green computer bits at the bottom of the screen. This pool of game glitches also means instant death to our yellow little protagonist. So, don’t let those bits byte you!

PAC-01 features a one and two player mode, as well as a “Fast Game” mode. Whereas the objective in the 1P mode is to munch up all of the ghosts, in 2P mode the player with the most points wins when the game is over (which happens when the maze ends).

As for the Fast Mode it means… well, just survive!

name: Parts of the Elephant
summary: Weird things are happening in the Elephant Hotel. It's getting late, you're getting drunk, and moments in the lives of strangers are scattered around you like spilled puzzle pieces. Can you put it all together?

name: Paper Mario Eggstraordinary Egg Hunt
summary:
Join Mario & Luigi for the annual Easter Egg Hunt in Toad Town and close regions like Koopa Village and Shooting Star Summit!

A Paper Mario Mod made by Miigle and Den / DenNya as a easter present for the Paper Mario Modding Community.

name: Pawker
summary: Pawker is a supurrr satisfying deckbuilder roguelike where you play as cat adventurers trying to create purrfect combos. Find crazy felines, battle memes, and modify your deck to do insane numbers. Play Pawker meow!

name: Paper Bride 7: Lethal Bond
summary: Paper Bride 7: Lethal Bond is a Chinese horror puzzle game, and the 7th title of the Paper Bride series.

name: Pavu
summary: Pavu is an action adventure game where we are going to follow a young boy's quest in search of answers about himself and humanity in a fantastical land filled with robots, challenges and encounters that was once habited by a human civilization that has vanished.

name: Patent Tycoon
summary: This is a management simulation game in which you develop your company by making full use of patents. Grow your company through inventions, applications, license negotiations, and litigation!

name: Pajama Sam 2: Thunder and Lightning Aren't so Frightening
summary: Join Pajama Sam, the world's youngest superhero as he journeys to World Wide Weather, the storm-stirring factory in the sky! Sam's spent on to many evenings cowering under the couch, so he sets out to conquest his fear of thunderstorms. Just as our little guy begins to learn that storms aren't as bad as they seem, Sam accidentally send the weather system into a frenzy. Now, there is snow in Saigon, and sunshine in Seattle! He'll need your child's help to explore this wonderful world filled with challenging puzzles, fun games, and fantastic new friends as they help Thunder and Lightning fix the broken machines and return the world's weather to normal before Mother Nature finds out!

name: Pants no Mikiri
summary: This game is an arrangement of a certain famous mini-game with characters from Touhou Project.

name: Panzer General 3D Assault
summary: Play in a full 3D environment of WWII. The next instalment of the famous Panzer General series got a new game system, totally redesigned interface and fresh 3D graphics. This strategic simulation will awe you! Promote your best commanders and give them the best equipment to get the job done. Time is one of your enemies so be decisive! Crush all resistance under the steel treads of your tanks in a war that can easily be tailored to your commanding skills. Play historic campaigns as one of the most famous commanders of the USA, UK, Free France and Germany. Soldiers on the battlefields of North Africa, Western and Southern Europe await your orders, Panzer General.

name: Pamina vs. Slimes
summary: Pamina VS Slimes is a fast-paced top-down arcade game where you defend your home from endless waves of slimes. Choose from 4 headpattable characters, master elemental strategies, and unleash powerful burst skills across 4 game modes. Get ready for non-stop action!

name: Pacific Drive: Whispers in the Woods
summary: Return to the Zone and witness the rise of a group of Anomaly-obsessed fanatics in this terrifying new expansion to Pacific Drive. Whispers in the Woods is a brand new story for you and your trusty station wagon.

name: Paper Dash: Las Vegas
summary: Jump into "Paper Dash – Las Vegas", where your paper plane takes flight through the dazzling lights and vibrant nights of the city that never sleeps. Fly, glide, dash, scare away ghosts, and enjoy a peaceful journey, facing the ghosts of greed in exciting, relaxing, and jaw-dropping environments.

name: Path of Exile: Keepers of the Flame
summary: In Path of Exile: Keepers of the Flame you will continue the story of Breach, an iconic league from Path of Exile's past, and assist a mysterious monastic order in defending Wraeclast from the Breachlords.

name: Paramnesia
summary: Paramnesia is an interactive detective visual novel where Maria, the protagonist of this story, is a member of two radical sects with contradictory opinions. Trying to understand herself, she is walking on thin ice, and only you will know the truth after delving into the depths of her mind.

name: Pay at the Pump
summary: A lonely night shift at a remote gas station turns into a nightmare. Strange customers arrive, unease grows, and the line between reality and hallucination begins to blur.

name: Pax Dei
summary: Welcome to a vast, social sandbox MMO inspired by the legends of the medieval era. Here, myths are real, ghosts exist, and magic is unquestioned. Join thousands of players as you explore the land, build your home, forge your reputation, and craft your own stories. What world will you make?

name: Path of Glory
summary: Path of Glory is a deck-building, roguelite game, set in a post-apocalyptic world. Offering endless replayability, unlockable characters with unique tree skills and card deck's. Fight all beast on your path to become a Hero.

name: Parkour Master
summary: Parkour Master is a 3D platformer emulating a free-running environment. Players are challenged to complete eight levels and a tutorial as fast as possible, competing the in Parkour Masters tournament.

name: Paintball: The Puzzle Game
summary: Paintball is a top down puzzle game for 1 to 3 players. Copy given colored geometric shapes by throwing a ball back and forth.

name: Pandamonium Puzzle
summary: Collect sets of gems, coins, and pandas.

name: Pacific
summary: As an intrepid fortune seeker, players enter the darkness of the Pacific seeking fortune and fame seeking and the lost city of Atlantis. Met by dangerous sea creatures, player must fend them off while searching through the darkness. An overly complicated game for its time, players are forced to keep an eye on their oxygen levels and using a sextant (similar to a compass.) Players are greeted at the end of each level by a light post.

name: Parachronism: Order of Chaos
summary: Parachronism: Order of Chaos is a 3D Action RPG with social simulation system as one of its elements. This game is created by a new indie game developers around the world.

name: Paver Simulator
summary: Did you ever dream to become a paving artist? Perform tasks, during which the most important thing is creativity and precision. According to your design you lay different types of paving stones, so you earn money and raise the level of your reputation. Test your skills in the Paver Simulator

name: Pair Panic
summary: Form your team, grab the objects, match them, and outscore your rivals! Pair Panic delivers fast-paced, competitive multiplayer matching chaos, while also letting you test your skills against the clock in single-player mode.

name: Panacea: Rebirth
summary: A sickly girl explores the forest everyday. Could the creatures from the woods be as dangerous as the rumors claim?

name: Pact Warden
summary: A roaming Marchwarden, you travel along roads to defend strange travelers and pious pilgrims. They'll say you're altruistic, but in truth you seek something personal. A place to call home. The waystation Gheimgarth, tucked beneath the Threshold of the Gheim, might just be the place.

name: Patch Quest
summary:
Patch Quest is an action roguelike with metroidvania elements, set on a deserted tropical island.

Your lasso allows you to mount and ride all of the enemy types in the game, letting you use their powers in combat.

name: Patch Me if You Can
summary: Patch me if you can is a puzzle adventure where you dive into a game world and manipulate objects however you want. Equip blocks to shrink boulders, move the sun, and thwart Lord's conspiracy. This broken world needs your 'patch'!

name: Patagon
summary: Patagon is a first person open world VR Steam Punk adventure shooter. It's fun and easy to play. The game takes place in an alternate steampunk reality where the British empire has never ended. Battle giant monsters and dinosaurs while you explore Sand Dollar island.

name: Patchouli: A Little War in Bland-Old Library
summary: Patchouli is a Touhou fangame based on the gameplay of the Suguri series, featuring horizontal scrolling shooting gameplay.

name: Pacific Islands
summary:
Pacific Islands is the sequel to the highly successful Team Yankee. In this game, you direct the fortunes of Team Pacific as you attempt to recapture the pacific atoll of Yama Yama from enemy hands.

You have control over the four tank units of Team Pacific. Your aim is to recapture all of the battle areas of each of the five islands in the Yama Yama atoll. Although islands must be attacked in a sequential order, you have some latitude as to the order in which each area of any island may be attacked.

Pacific Islands provides a novel control system which allows you to control all of your four tank units ' independently, and at the same time. There are fully detailed battle maps, three dimensional views of the battlefield updated in real time, and status reports on your vehicles, ail available at any time

name: Pangeon
summary: Pangeon is a single player roguelike inspired by many dungeon crawler classics. Dive right into a randomly generated dungeon in search for a deadly artifact to save the planet from total annihilation.

name: Party Party Anxiety!
summary: A dating card game for anxious people. Use conversation cue cards up your sleeves to make connections. But beware—the more anxious you get, the scarier they become.

name: Part of the Flock
summary:
Lamby is a little poultry farmer who takes his job seriously.

But when things start going awry, Lamby is certain the well in the woods near his property holds the key to his agony. But the sleepless nights cost a hefty toll.

name: PAW Patrol Mighty Pups: Save Adventure Bay!
summary: Embark on a super-heroic mission with the Mighty Pups and Chase’s Super Speed, Marshall’s Mighty Heat, Skye’s Whirlwind Power and the whole mighty PAW Patrol team. Explore the town and journey to Jake’s resort, Tracker’s jungle and beyond. With a whole town to help out and 2-player co-op fun, Adventure Bay has never been so interactive!

name: Paintbrush Warrior
summary: Once upon a time, there was a kingdom of drawing paper. There, the prince and princess lived happily together. One day, the devil appeared, and the devil took the prince. So, at the request of the princess, the paintbrush brave set out to fight the demon king and save the prince.

name: Paplinko
summary: In PAPLINKO, the goal is to bounce balls into cups, collecting coins and prizes as you go along! Bouncing off the pegs earns points and careful play will rack up your high score! You can carefully aim and shoot each one, but the peg board is constantly shifting, so you'll have to rethink your strategy as you play! Hordes of special pegs shake things up, from bomb pegs to teleporter pegs! Use special multiplier pegs and bonus boxes to make that score grow and grow! Prizes aren't the only things at the bottom- slimes will break your high score if you're not careful! Trade in the coins you've collected to buy new backgrounds and ball characters to customize your game!

name: Pancake Surprise!
summary: Pancake Surprise is a story that is set in Azaliea in the kingdom of Azaliea. The game surrounds Mira a lowly maid who works within the castle quarters of Azaliea Castle. Mira who has worked hard throughout her career as a maid in the castle has most recently been promoted to work under the Prince as his personal assistant. The Prince who governs Azaliea is known to his people as The Pancake Prince. The Prince has lost everything and everyone dear to him and is going through severe stages of depression. The Prince try's not to show it, but Mira can sense something is wrong and attempts to help the Prince in his time of need. Can Mira unlock the key to the Prince's heart? Or will she fail miserably and lose everything.

name: Pack Powersports
summary:
Compilation of four sport games by Zigurat. The games included are:

.- Carlos Sainz
.- Emilio Sánchez Vicario Grand Slam
.- Paris-Dakar
.- Sito Pons 500cc Grand Prix

name: Pac-Man Party
summary: Reigning as one of the top pop cultural icons since his introduction in 1980, PAC-MAN remains a global phenomenon that has yielded hundreds of products including video games. PAC-MAN Party continues this legacy by offering a game that captures the spirit of the franchise and provides engaging entertainment that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. With more than 45 exciting mini-games, PAC-MAN Party provides a rewarding and challenging social gaming experience regardless of skill level. From the time-based trials of rolling a giant snowball and knocking your friends off a mountain top, to adventures that require more precision and endurance, players will be fully engaged as they use the Wii Remote's motion, pointing and button control capabilities.

name: Paratopic: Overdub
summary: Paratopic: Overdub revives the award-winning 2018 liminal horror classic: a twisting 3-in-1 remaster, remix, and sequel to the original.

name: Pastel Parade
summary: Pastel☆Parade is an exhilarating rhythm game with easy controls! Get into the rhythm with cute and pop music!

name: Pampas & Selene: Supporter Pack
summary:
This DLC offers extra content for Pampas & Selene that includes Skins, Pets, Special Games Modes, a Digital Game Manual, and a Special Developer OST. (Those who purchased and started the game in the first two weeks of it's release, aka Founders, already have this content as a bonus for free!)

This DLC includes:

Pets:
- Hada the Fairy
- Maggie the Cat
- Tod the Toad
- Cerdo the Pig

Skins:
- Porkchop [Pampas]
- Kleopatra [Selene]
- Cutezilla [Selene]

Game Modes:
- Explosions [Exploding Barrels!]
- Coins [No arrows or mana, only riches]
- Fast as wind [Run like the wind, unless you're hit!]
- Vampire [Drain life from kills and lose life over time]
- Hardcore Mode [You get one hit]

Special:
- A digital version of the GAME MANUAL from the MSX computer version of the game.
- A Developer OST where Fran, the developer, sings the entire soundtrack a capella.

name: PASS Fortress
summary: A standalone mod of Team Fortress 2, focused on improving and giving deserved attention to the oft-forgotten PASS Time game mode. Players take on a deadly form of team handball as one of three classes in this movement tech-focused expansion of the classic hero shooter.

name: Paper Perjury
summary:
Investigating a simple robbery reveals a tapestry of mysteries!

Solve a series of cases as newly hired police clerk Justina Smith and find out the truth behind a string of suspicious crimes. Work with the energetic detective Ernest Hunt and dig for clues in the paper trail to discover the secrets that paperwork can hide.

name: Paint My World
summary:
A 2D platformer puzzle game with a fluffy paintball protagonist.

Our adventure takes part in a world full of Colour, or devoid of it depending on the situation! Our hero Fluff must take on the worlds challenges to save his family and restore order.

Each level requires a set number of objectives to be completed, such as painting a number of tiles, destroying certain enemies, saving so many babies, and of course fighting bosses.

Paint My World is designed to keep the game fresh and interesting throughout, this means that lots of new mechanics and items are added to the game in each world. It requires you to think on your feet and figure out the best way to use each item. Of course, we will hold your hand at the beginning – but before long you will be confident enough to take on the challenges yourself!

name: Parkour Rewrite
summary:
Parkour is a game created in 2024, the rewrite version got rewritten in mid 2025.
Climb asteroids, create maps, explore maps, shop in the item shop and more!

name: Pandorex
summary: Pandorex is a Point & Click Adventure featuring Harry who is on a mission to find his lost dog.

name: Paths of the Visionaries
summary: Grab your notebook, trust your gut, or throw a punch—whatever works. This love letter to classic 2D JRPGs throws high schoolers, detectives, and street toughs into a tangled web of conspiracies, lurking horrors, and uncertain paths. Every shadow hides a secret—reveal them or be lost to the void.

name: Pangs: You Are Hungry
summary: PANGS (you are hungry.) is a horror visual novel game with 5+ endings and roughly 15-20 minutes of playtime.

name: Para-sol
summary:
"Now", let's talk about the future for a little bit.
In an SF world where cyborgs and androids are near reality, for some reason rumors of fantastic creatures such as werewolf and dragons started to spread.
That time, one girl silently sent a mail to an unknown someone.
A mail that's unknown to reach someone.
Written inside is only one sentence.
"Save Our Ship"
But, by a stroke of luck the mail definitely reached somewhere.
And, the girl received a reply.
"wilco"

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 1 Music B
Parking Garage Anomaly
summary: Explore a haunted parking garage in this first-person horror adventure. Uncover mysteries and anomalies as you progress through the floors. Reach the 10th floor to find out who or what has been haunting this place.

name: Pacapaca Passion
summary: Paca Paca Passion is a rhythm game with dancers; however, this is very different then Bust A Move. I thank the closest game that I could compare this to is Beat Mania or Pop’n Music. There is a bar on the far left and right of the screen, a white line moves down this bar, and when you see a colored line on the bar, you press the corresponding button when the white bar moves over it.

name: Painkiller++
summary: Painkiller++ is a multiplayer mod that vastly improves the state of the game for competitive play. It was the official mod of the CPL World Tour.

name: Passive Hero: Save the World in 100 Days!
summary: A Real-Time × Turn-Based RPG, 100 Days of Isekai Adventure, and a Useless Goddess.

name: Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - Demonic Vacation at the Blood Sea
summary: This is a singleplayer/coop centered DLC, introducing new maps, a new boss fight, a new weapon, and a much deeper storyline (deeper in terms of wading through demon blood).

name: Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - The Clock Strikes Meat Night
summary: When the clock strikes midnight, it’s meat night in Daniel’s hemisphere. Although the edibility of demon flesh still has to be explored for the bigger part of mankind, Daniel knows that one already. Join Daniel in his newest adventure of carnival carnage…Key Features:Dual weapons power-up: that’s right, Daniel had steroids for breakfast...

name: Parry de Bougai! Dual Runner
summary: A grand sports festival of spirits held once every hundred years... Here it begins!! A competitive racing game where you compete in two separate lanes! The key to victory lies in "Parry"! When an enemy appears, jump! While in the air, press the jump button again... Let's Parry!

name: Patapon 3
summary: Patapon 3 is a rhythm game for the PlayStation Portable now back on modern consoles.

name: Paris 1313: The Mystery of Notre-Dame Cathedral
summary:
Paris 1313 is an adventure game, revolving around a mysterious accident at Notre-Dame cathedral in Paris. As you progress through the game, you play as three different characters, each involved in the mystery in different ways. There's Jacques, a young goldsmith, Pierre, a young horseman who wants to join the King's Army, and Rosemonde, a dancer. Most of the game is a straightforward point-and-click adventure game, where you talk to people for information and clues, and find items that you use to solve puzzles. There are also a few arcade-like elements, such as climbing up a chimney and target practice with a bow and arrow. The game progresses in a series of chapters. In each chapter, you must perform a certain task with at least two characters in order to proceed. 
 
This game contains animated cutscenes and voice over work.

name: Paper Plane Arena: Shamans
summary: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Paper io 2: Complete Edition
summary: Conquer territory solo or beat your friends in multiplayer mode!

name: Panzer Elite: Special Edition
summary:
Faced with a life or death decision for your crew and platoon, you'll have to show courage and strategic thinking. Survive missions in historically accurate tanks and receive technological upgrades as the war grinds on. Experience the war through both German and American eyes. Survival is the key as you defend positions across hazardous terrain, attack villages, protect convoys and experience the full scope of tank battle between 1942 and 1944.

Built by experts for experts, Panzer Elite: Special Edition is the game serious WWII tank enthusiasts have been demanding. Rumbling on authentic tank tracks across the African Front, through Sicily and across Normandy, Panzer Elite Special Edition puts you in the hot seat as the Platoon Commander.

name: Paper Plane Arena: Lost Places
summary: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Paper Kingdom
summary: Paper Kingdom is a colony management game. Stack cards to gather resources, build structures, explore and fight invaders. Turn a nomadic tribe into an empire.

name: Paze Knight Ellen and the Dungeon Town Sodom
summary: Dungeon-- An ancient ruin from the dark era. Monsters came pouring out non-stop, but countless adventurers gathered to get the "treasure" inside. The town nearby thrived. Paze Kingdom Knight Ellen was heading towards a dungeon town called "Sodom".

name: Paint & Panic Bundle
summary: Solve colorful puzzles and race on roads that barely exist in this chaotic two-game bundle!

name: Parking Masters
summary: Face the ultimate test of your parking skills!

name: Paw & Hop Jigsaw Quest: Expansion Pack 3
summary: Expand your adventure in Paw & Hop Jigsaw Quest with 16 all-new puzzles! Dive deeper into the enchanting world of curious kittens and playful bunnies as you piece together scenes bursting with charm and whimsy.

name: Pac-Man Battle Royale Chompionship
summary: All new 4-player competitive PAC-MAN Battle Royale game. Battle your friends and eat your way to leader of the Pac. Destroy ghosts and other Pac-Man in unique ways with all new power-ups. Connect two cabinets for an 8-player battle!

name: Paranormal Observation
summary: Start your career as a ghost hunter with the latest technology. Use your computer to find out what type of ghost you are dealing with. Are you prepared to face the challenges of ghost hunting?

name: Pachi Pachi 2: On a Roll
summary: Our beloved thieves Fujiko and Robin have managed to escape from the Money City police. However, citizens are not happy with this situation, that's why they have decided to create a new search team to catch them once and for all and restore stability …

name: Pawsky
summary: Welcome to a whimsical animal adventure in which your choices shape the story and the world reacts to your actions!

name: Past Hope
summary: A short story about a hopeless yandere.

name: Pad Quad
summary: Get ready to bounce into action with Pad Quad, a lightning-fast platformer where padel meets pure arcade fun! Control adorable pixel mascots inspired by QUAD Sports rackets and race across futuristic arenas packed with enemies, traps, and tricky jumps.

name: Paperman
summary: Want to become the new boss of a thriving paper company whose owner mysteriously died? Track down the culprit and catch them to become the new boss. But beware, your adventure will be littered with some tricky obstacles...

name: Palace Jam 1
summary: Palace Jam 1 Mission Pack is a mod for Quake II Remaster and a tribute to the late Jennell Jaquays containing 6 brand new maps inspired by her works on E3U1 (Unit 9: Palace). Includes a hub and a boss map.

name: Pattern Survivors: Bullet Hell
summary: Pattern Survivors: Bullet Hell is a dynamic action game where you take control of your space tower and design your own attack patterns to fend off hordes of enemies.

name: Papier Julien
summary: Papier Julien is a french only comedy title based on Julien Bernatchez and his podcasts. In this game, everything and anything is subject to a good laugh, but the experience is balanced by a layered design with many side quests and secrets to uncover, which might not be all that serious. It is a highly reactive turn-based “RPG” (not in stats, but in spirit), with unique dialogue trees for every possible interaction with the world and its NPCs.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Love Beyond Death
summary: The demonic invasion cut many lives short without warning. The unstoppable catastrophe brought death to all in equal measure — rich and poor, fortunate and unfortunate, young and old.

name: Paranormal Files: Price of a Secret - Collector's Edition
summary: Rumors of hauntings surround the Russells’ Winery and Hotel for decades, but it’s not until you arrive that the paranormal goes on the offensive! Something doesn’t want you investigating the secluded island, and it will do anything to keep its secrets buried. Crack the case before it’s too late?

name: Pari Delicto
summary: In a post cyberpunk dystopia you find a world attempting to recover from authoritarianism, you find yourself, a budding paralegal, trying to climb your way up the justice system. You are mentoring under your close friend, and attorney, Iris.

name: Paulblast!
summary: Anton's in a pickle, but Paul's here to help!

name: Paper Zelda RPG
summary: If you enjoyed the Paper Mario Games, this RPG will not disappoint. Play Zelda as a turn based RPG in 2.5D for the first time ever in this epic adventure being developed and released in early access for you to try! This game is completely FREE to play. Battle Enemies and level up your character. Explore different areas to see new and familiar themes, characters, and sounds straight from your favorite Legend Of Zelda Games! Try it now for free! If you enjoy the concept of the game, consider donating to the developer for more updates and games in the future! Enjoy a fan made game that should have been created a long time ago!

name: Paper Chaser's
summary:
Introducing, Paper Chaser’s!
Come Collaborate with Artists & Content Creators in this new Hip-Hop RPG game as you take your Record Label from the ground to the top! Sign Artists, Perform Shows, Expand your Businesses, & Discover New Ventures as You Explore our Open World. Then, after working hard all day in the studio, signing artist, and sculpting rising talent, enjoy the finer luxuries of life poolside at your mansion! Cruise around town in your Exotic Sports cars! Try your luck at the Casino! Or take a trip to places like the Mediterranean for inspiration and explore hidden gems along the way!
A Brand New 2023 Hip-Hop RPG Game. Take on the role of Jupiter Ki as he goes on the wildest adventures, creating music, making new friends, and over coming crazy obstacles. This is a Venture Hip-Hop RPG Game. Make music, perform show’s, go on quests and invest in money generating properties to become the number 1 Paper Chaser!
This game updates each month with new maps, events, in-game content, music and so much more! Paper Chaser's Album Coming Soon

name: Passer
summary: It's a minesweeper game from a third-person perspective. Marking all mines is the task of each level. In the levels, you will encounter guards who prevent your action. You have a wealth of skills to fight them and even fly.

name: Payday 3: Party Powder Heist
summary: A mob family has enlisted the aid of corrupt cops to steal drugs from the Triads. The Party Powder heist supports both stealth and loud approaches, offers multiple paths, and includes cooking for those willing to risk it all for a bigger payday.

name: Pagan Age
summary: Lead the families of the first pagan tribes to conquer virgin lands inhabited by mythical creatures. Obtain building materials, win favor with the gods, and use ancient beliefs and occult practices to create a home for your people in a harsh and hostile world.

name: Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors
summary: A new roguelite survivor game set in the beloved fantasy world of Pathfinder. Enter Gallowspire, Pathfinder’s legendary tower of darkness, alongside your fearless companion. Slay hordes of enemies, upgrade your arsenal, and overcome deadly bosses to seal away the ancient king of undeath!

name: PathSketch
summary: PathSketch is a classic puzzle-solving game.

name: Paranormal Records
summary: Paranormal Records is a next-generation horror game made on Unreal Engine 5. A unique narrative experience from the perspective of a video camera. The protagonist, the host of a TV show about the paranormal, is filming a report about a missing patient, in an abandoned hospital.

name: Particular
summary: An adventure/running game for iOS and Android

name: Pachirisu's Click-Clack Attack!
summary: Pachirisu's Click-Clack Attack! was a Flash game on Pokémon.com. The player must send Pokémon discs into holes located at each of the four corners of the board to earn points. Which direction and the distance the discs are launched depends on the angle and force they are launched at. Each disc depicts a Pokémon. While these discs can be sent directly into the holes, if they hit another Pokémon disc in their evolutionary line, they will fuse together and evolve. If they hit an unrelated Pokémon, they will simply collide and knock each other back. There are also special rounds where certain conditions must be met, such as getting all the discs into the holes in one shot.

name: Paradise
summary: Paradise is a Boys Love visual novel and tells the story of a group of men who go on holiday on a deserted island. When things begin to go wrong, they realize to their horror that they are stranded. Turns out that’s only the start of their problems.

name: Paradox of Hope VR
summary: Paradox of Hope is an immersive single-player VR shooter with survival and horror elements. Explore mysterious metro mazes of post-apocalyptic Moscow, use stealth or combat approach to achieve your goal, upgrade your equipment and arsenal, and enjoy the atmospheric moments of stalker’s life.

name: Painter Simulator
summary: Painter Simulator is a new generation game in which the emphasis is placed on the player's imagination and perceptiveness. Create the world in the colors you want to see with a brush.

name: Paranormalscape
summary: Paranormal horror made for Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams jam

name: Paper Pilot
summary: Immerse yourself in the adventure of Paper Pilot, where you control the "Paper Pilot" through 15 unique levels. Collect star boxes to unlock new levels. Beware, your gun can overheat! Develop a strategy to navigate this adventure successfully.

name: Parkour Assassin: Sprint Run
summary: A 3D parkour game in a cyberpunk style, where you can experience breathtaking speeds, dodge various traps, and continuously break through to achieve the furthest distance. Terrifying bombs and robotic enemies will stand in your way, but you can use the quick blade in your hand to slash through them!

name: Panasonic Prime Smash!
summary:
Touch, Smash, and Remember prime numbers the fun way!

Prime numbers - numbers that have only two divisors, 1 and itself.

Panasonic Prime Smash! is a new type of game that enables a fun way to learn prime numbers, the mystic numbers also known as the “atom of numbers”

name: Package Man
summary: Paper Boy has graduated from handing out newspapers to delivering Packages. Get a chance to work for the best Delivery Company in the World!

name: Parking Slide
summary: Parking Slide is a puzzle game where the player must remove all the cars from the parking lot without colliding. For this, you can click on the car and drag horizontally or vertically.

name: Paperhead Ep. 0
summary: In this cute cardboard world, something went horribly wrong... You wake up in a prison cell. A strange voice calls to you from the depths of dark corridors covered in runic symbols and blood. Reload your trusty shotgun and find out... WHY WOULD CARDBOARD... BLEED?

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 9
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 9 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 9 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Paradise Killer
summary: Paradise Island, a world outside reality. There’s been a murder that only "investigation freak" Lady Love Dies can solve. Gather evidence and interrogate suspects in this open world adventure. You can accuse anyone, but you’ll have to prove your case in trial to convict. It’s up to you to decide who’s guilty.

name: Pandanda
summary: Pandanda was a massive multiplayer online game about red pandas. With your red panda, you could play games, chat with friends, adopt your own dragons, level up and other cool stuff.

name: Pacific Fire
summary:
Pacific Fire is a turn-based strategic wargame set in the Pacific Theater of World War II. Take command of US, Japanese, British, Australian, New Zealand, Chinese and Dutch forces in the Pacific and Southeast Asia from 1941-1945.

Experience the entire war in the Pacific through 16 historically accurate campaigns, from the attack on Pearl Harbor to the Empire of Japan's surrender. Command squadrons of more than 80 types of aircraft, from iconic warbirds like the A6M2 and P-38 Lightning to less well-known types like the CAC Boomerang and Vickers Wellington. Control the seas with more than 50 types of warships including submarines, battleships and aircraft carriers.

Pacific Fire contains no in-app purchases or ads of any kind, and an internet connection is not required to play.

name: Paydirt
summary:
Paydirt: Moon Miner is a fun, physics-based 2D mining game set on the Moon. Pilot your upgradeable rig through shifting lunar caverns, mine rare ores, and uncover what lies beneath the surface.

Balance fuel, damage, and hull integrity as you descend deeper and drill in search of fortune — or risk losing everything to gas pockets and whatever else lies below.

name: Paws: A Shelter 2 Game
summary: Paws is a standalone, single player, adventure, platformer set in the world of Shelter 2 with loss and friendship as its central themes.

name: Panzer Elite Action: Dunes of War
summary: Panzer Elite Action: Dunes of War is an expansion pack for Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory.

name: Panel Attack
summary: Fast, flashy, and free.A modern twist on classic Panel de Pon / Tetris Attack–style match-3 action. Swap tiles, trigger insane chains, and push your skills to the limit as the board rises beneath you. Easy to learn, hard to master, and built for pure, arcade-speed fun.

name: Parkour Simulator
summary: PARKOUR SIMULATOR! is a chaotic co-op parkour experience.  Explore mountains as egg-carrying mice, ride vehicles, battle through obstacle courses, and either lift your friends to the peak—or knock them all the way down!

name: Pants Quest
summary: Pants Quest is a tiny, lovingly crafted point & click adventure game about finding your way in life. And your pants. Sometimes just getting dressed & leaving the house feels like an impossible task. Follow one man's emotional journey to deal with the hurdles that life can throw at you on a bad day.

name: Parking Master Multiplayer
summary: Do you like playing car parking games? Or do you want to play with your friends with high-quality graphics? This game is for you and it is completely free!

name: Park
summary: The original Vector Park

name: Pathogenic
summary: Become the infection in a 2D roguelike twin-stick shooter - a lone parasite, fighting a biological war. Collect organelles to evolve your cell in a microscopic arms race against your host's immune system. Conquer a beautiful, procedurally generated world of tiny proportions.

name: Pac-Man Arrangement
summary: Pac-Man Arrangement is a 2005 video game, initially released as part of the Namco Museum Battle Collection compilation for the PSP. It shares its name with a very similar Pac-Man game from a decade prior - to avoid confusion, some later re-releases were renamed to Pac-Man Remix.

name: Payday 2: Gage Weapon Pack #01
summary: The Gage Weapon Pack #01 is the third DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. Frag Grenades make their first entry into the PAYDAY series and are bound to spice things up. With the new Grenade Case asset, players can share grenades with each other in the heists.

name: Painter Man!!
summary:
Armed only with a bucket of paint and a six inch pure bristle painting brush, Banky Van Daime sets out to make the most of the Bank Holiday and paint his exquisite castle. Unfortunately his timing couldn't be worse. A malware attack at the local robot zoo has sent the AI Lions on a rampage, and they've found their way into the castle!

Not one to let a little problem like murderous lions get in the way of a good masonry paint job, Banky pushes on; occasionally spilling a little paint on the floor (which confuses the AI Lions and causes them to turn away)

Once a level (room) is complete and all walls are painted, Banky can move onto the next room. And then the next room. ad infinitum.

(Well, not exactly ad infinitum!)

The game features 10 Levels of a-mazing action! Can you beat them all?

name: Pass Tiger Cage
summary: A Roguelike game. You will play a general in the game who leads his troops to guard the historical gate. Choose from a variety of combat skills, upgrade your equipment and recruit troops to assist in the battle.

name: Paperhead
summary:
PAPERHEAD is a fast-paced FPS game set in a world where everything is made out of cardboard and paper but is infested with horror!
Use a pencil as a weapon and explore what exactly went wrong in the secret research facility and why suddenly papercut people were able to...bleed.
Paperhead's Main Features

- Cardboard cute style with a horror twist. Cute but horrifying!

- Brutal and fast-paced combat. Slide to throw enemies in the air, kick explosive barrels into them (or enemies themselves!), and jump onto them Mario-style.

- Use a Pencil as a weapon. Draw a bomb to explode enemies!

- Use a Pencil as a reality-warping puzzle-solving tool. Not sure how to get through? Try to draw a door on the wall!

WHY WOULD PAPER...BLEED?

name: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults
summary: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults is the first-ever co-op Hack and Slash ARPG based on the Adventure Path, in which players lead iconic Pathfinder heroes into the depths of Gauntlight Keep and battle deadly abominations to reach the evil sorceress Belcorra Haruvex and end her vile schemes.

name: Pako 3
summary: Original car chase game is back! Pako 3 brings insane amount of levels and cars to unlock, while keeping the simple gameplay. Transport your crew as a getaway driver, escape cops in survival levels and drive fast laps on racing levels!

name: Pagan Hope
summary:
Pagan Hope is a PC/Windows hybrid rpg between roguelike and hack and slash gameplay types. It can be played straight-through as most of the maps are connected with constant paths, but there are also maps where the feeling of randomizing will be present.

The plot: A great wizard summons a portal that connects the humans` realm with the unknown realm of Ja`han. A fierce demon, ruler over Ja`han that came through the portal, takes the sorcerer`s body and starts a quest to conquer the humans` souls. A young sorcerer is sent to retrieve some magical tablets that can block the portal.

name: Paranoia: The Game Edition
summary: Meet a new state of the famous thrilling first person shooter - PARANOIA is released now as a stand-alone game. This release is a pretty simple port of original PARANOIA mod v1.2 for Half-Life to Xash3D Engine. It allows you to play PARANOIA as a standalone game right after installing. All required resources are provided with the game, Half-Life or even Steam are not needed.

name: Paratopic: Definitive Cut
summary:
Smuggle contraband VHS tapes across the border. Discover the remnants of illicit industry. Prepare for an assassination.

This is Paratopic, an atmospheric retro-3D horror adventure through a cursed fever dream.

The Definitive Cut introduces new areas to the game, in addition to general adjustments and quality of life improvements.

name: Park Ranger Simulator
summary: Manage your own park facility in a huge open world in Park Ranger Simulator. Take on all the tasks that need to be completed as a park ranger - alone or together in cross-platform multiplayer! You have a variety of vehicles and equipment at your disposal to complete the challenges ahead!

name: Party Pop Bubblyz
summary:
Jump into the Ultimate Penguin Party!
Break the ice and have fun at the Park! Join the 20-player party to be the star!
Explosive Fun in Just 10 Minutes

name: Paint Puzzle Quest
summary: Embark on a vibrant and colorful journey with Paint Puzzle Quest, a strategic puzzle-solving game that will test your creativity and problem-solving skills. Explore 100 exciting levels, each presenting a new challenge to keep you engaged and entertained.

name: Path of Exile Mobile
summary:
A mobile iteration of Path of Exile currently in development. 
 
"...an experimental version of Path of Exile for mobile devices. Path of Exile's Atlas Map system is actually perfect for bite-sized action gameplay. This is a complete Path of Exile game experience with no pay-to-win elements and is being developed in-house at Grinding Gear Games." 
 
The game's demo, shown at Exilecon 2019, has a gameplay loop based on the endgame map system used in Path of Exile with smaller maps for quick gameplay sessions. 
The UI was redone with the health and mana orbs being combined in one corner, 4 skills shown in one corner with 4 more available from a touch and swipe menu. 
Skills in the game use the planned 4.0 system with a separate menu screen for active gems that can have up to 4 gem sockets.  
Inventory was redesigned with equipment, currency items and maps split to different inventory menus automatically when picked up and items can be picked up anywhere on screen.

name: Payday 3: Gold Pass
summary: The Payday 3 Gold Pass includes all four Year 1 Expansions - Syntax Error, Boys in Blue, Houston Breakout, and Fear and Greed - as well as some special bonus content.

name: Paper Animal Adventure
summary: Paper Animal Adventure is a cute roguelike game where you can explore a colorful world, fight scary enemies, and relax with your friends at the campfire! Will you be the one to seal the timelines and find the missing king?

name: Paranoide
summary: You wake up in an abandoned place, with no memory, trapped in a location that defies logic. As you explore, violent hallucinations stalk you, and a mysterious figure whispers unsettling words. What is real? Only you can uncover the truth before it’s too late.

name: Passageway of the Ancients
