A mobile game with a system similar to Monster Rancher where, instead of discs being scanned, pictures taken of animals, objects, and even food can become creatures to fight and capture.
Captured creatures can be trained and bred to create more powerful creatures that will be used to battle on or offline.

Only announced for Japan, planned to be released by the end of the year.

name: Pastel Chime: Koi no Skill Up
summary:
In a High school of a fantasy world, students spend their time learning magic and sword fighting, training to be adventurers.

At the botton of the school there's a special dungeon to test their skills.

The protagonist is one of these students who want to become someday a great hero.

name: Pac-Man
summary: The Commodore 64 port of Pac-Man.

name: Paratroopers
summary: Paratroopers

name: Pad of Time
summary: It's time to play a 2.5D retro-style platformer... With a twist!

name: Paintball Chibis
summary: Shooting game without violence

name: Party Party Time + Character Skin Pack
Paper Red and the Spirits Ink
Party Wave
summary:
An Action Surfing Game Developed by Mistwalker.
Total of 50 stages! Don't forget the additional bonus stages and Arcade Mode, too.
There are two elements in playing Party Wave: paddling and surfing. For paddling, touch surfers and drag them to a spot where the surf breaks, while avoiding the obstacles such as dolphins and turtles. And for surfing, touch surfers to make them turn and jump to prevent wipeouts.
Let's surf a wave with the surfing crowd and the board-riding dog, Skip, while getting help from three mermaid sisters and Hiso Alien, who provides valuable bonuses.
Party Wave!

name: Parachute
summary: Guide the parachutist through various obstacles to safety below.

name: Pac-Man
summary:
One of the most popular video games in arcade history!
2015 World Video Game Hall of Fame Inductee

Who can forget the countless hours and quarters spent outrunning pesky ghosts and chompin’ on dots? Now you can have the same arcade excitement on your mobile devices!
Guide PAC-MAN through the mazes with easy swipe controls, a MFi controller, or kick it old school with the onscreen joystick!
Eat all of the dots to advance to the next stage. Go for high scores and higher levels! Gain an extra life at 10.000 points! Gobble Power Pellets to weaken ghosts temporarily and eat them up before they change back. Avoid Blinky, the leader of the ghosts, and his fellow ghosts Pinky, Inky, and Clyde, or you will lose a life. It’s game over when you lose all your lives.

NEW MAZES!!!
In addition to the pixel for pixel recreation of the classic original maze, the game is packed with new different mazes. Challenge your skill to beat them all! We are constantly updating the game with new maze packs that you can buy to complete your PAC-MAN collection.

HINTS and TIPS!!!
Insider pro-tips and hints are being made available for the first time in-game! Use these to help you become a PAC-MAN champion!

FEATURES:
• New tournaments
• New Visual Hints and Pro-tips
• New mazes for all new challenges
• Play an arcade perfect port of classic PAC-MAN
• Two different control modes
• Three game difficulties (including the original 1980 arcade game)
• Retina display support
• MFi controller support

This port of Pac-Man was delisted in 2013 from the digital stores.

name: Paint By Numbers: Cooking Time! Ep. 3
summary: Time to cook! Paint by numbers and uncover images of delicious meals!

name: Paperboy
summary: Game Boy Color port of Paperboy.

name: Paradise City VR
summary: Welcome to Paradise City - the city that never sleeps. Prepare yourself for an amazing experience full of beautiful girls. Explore area and discover multiple locations where you can meet and watch naughty girls. You’ll feel like in a real paradise... So… are you ready to see all of this?

name: Panomino
summary: The falling-block deck-builder that lets you reshape your blocks!

name: Party Game Box 100
summary: Party Game Box 100 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Papa's Hot Doggeria HD
summary: SPapa's Hot Doggeria HD is a cooking simulation game where players manage a hot dog restaurant. Customers order specific hot dog combinations, and players must carefully prepare and assemble orders by grilling sausages, selecting toppings, and serving meals within a time limit. The game features increasingly complex customer requests and requires players to balance speed and accuracy. As part of the "Papa's" series of restaurant management games, it offers progressive difficulty levels and challenges players to improve their food preparation and customer service skills.

name: Payday 2: The Butcher's BBQ Pack
summary: Tired of the long, dark nights of howling cold? Over the snow and ice and biting sleet? Well, we at Overkill are proud and excited to bring you a party that is guaranteed to heat things up and blow away the winter blues - the smokin' hot BBQ Weapon Pack.

name: Particle of God
summary: Particle of God is a post-apocalyptic indie RPG with Survival elements, an open world and tactical battles.

name: Paladin Quest Disk: The Scrolls of Talmouth
summary: A add-on disk for Omnitrend's Paladin with 16 new missions which are linked togehter to form a grand quest.

name: Paradise
summary:
After crashing on an island, your only goal is to escape! Join up with friends or try to survive on your own on the harsh island that awaits. Collect materials, craft tools, and survive against other players, animals, or monsters that come out at night. Escape the island by crafting a radio transmitter and signaling for help; but be careful, the rescue helicopter will leave most players behind!

In Paradise, you can craft useful items like hatchets, campfires, or various weapons. You can also build structures to protect you from monsters or other players. Survival means every man for himself - some players may be friendly, but others will be hostile! The number one thing to keep in mind is that the rescue chopper has a limited capacity on how many players can be rescued, so if you are not fast enough, you will be left behind!

Players can create their own in-game servers or easily join others in the server browser. Players also have the ability to unlock new characters to play as.

name: Pac-Man Games
summary: Includes remade "score-attack" versions of Pac-Man, Rally-X, Galaga, Dig Dug, Gator Panic and Pac-Chain.

name: Paradox
summary: Made over 10 days during the Fermi Paradox Jam.

name: Papo Town Fairy Princess
summary: Fairy Princess is a new wonderland theme play house game presented by Papo World. This pretend play game gives you a unique interactive experience!

name: Papo Town Magic World
summary: The owl just dropped you a mail! Open it! What? It’s Purple Pink asking for help! She accidentally petrified her friends and really needs your help to find the cure and lift the curse! Take your wand and enter the magic world! Explore a whole new world with magical things and supernatural creatures! Live the life of a wizard or a witch!

name: Papo World Playground
summary: The library in Papo Town just lost several important books! Could you help Purple Pink find them all? Let’s start from the biggest playground in town!

name: Pawelek the Game.
summary: Pawełek The Game is a game full of challenges, jokes and twists. Take on the role of a pawelek, craft items, fight and earn new Loot and uncover the truth about your love

name: Paradigmfetish
summary:
Lunar-meteorologist-cum-conman Cyan wakes up tied to a chair with a strange woman monologuing at him. What went wrong?

A linear ditherpunk visual novel.

name: Party Chaos
summary: Fun party game where you can Play minigames with your Friend or against your friends.

name: Panda Run
summary: In this game your character is cute panda. Help Panda collect coins jumping on branches in the jungle. Also there is some rules in this strange jungle, you need to collect as much golden coins as you can see to pass 3 start barier at the end of a forest.

name: Paulo's Wing
summary:
Play as the last able cherub tasked with defending heavens gate from scores of demons! Unlock powers such as lightning strikes to even the odds.

With your sword and shield you have the ability to switch between three different stance, with each stand having its own abilities. Master the style that makes you the most effective defender and triumph against all evil.

Paulo's Wing is the first game where all of the art was created in Tilt Brush! Even the font!

name: Papo Town: School
summary: Papo Town series are simulated role-playing games presented by Papo World.

name: Paranormal Home Invaders
summary: Turn the undead restless as you recklessly disturb their place of rest. Invite yourself and your friends into the homes of scary ghouls is hope that you can return safely and earn your minimum wage ghost hunting reward to feed your loved ones.

name: Papo Town Fire Department
summary: Papo Town Fire Department is recruiting! Who wants to be a brave firefighter hero? Together with Purple Pink and other Papo friends, let’s save the town residents trapped in the fire accidents, and protect their lives and property from fire!

name: Party Connect
summary: Play sequences, connecting walls and missing vowels in this online party game show based on BBC's Only Connect

name: Parking Lot Royale
summary: Parking Lot Royale is a multiplayer demolition derby party game that puts you behind the wheel of a fully destructible automobile. Choose your ride and take to the streets, but don't forget to smash your friends!

name: Paper Dolls Original
summary: Paper Dolls Original is a first-person horror adventure game steeped in Eastern culture. You act a man who is separated from his daughter after a car accident. When he awakes, he finds himself in a deserted Asian mansion.
developers: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

name: Pair
summary: A modern and definitely different gaming experience.

name: Parasite in City
summary:
The city has become a breeding ground of horror. 
Help the blonde escape!

name: ParaPerspective
summary: ParaPerspective is a stylish and minimalist puzzle game where your perspective affects how the world works. Help the little guys get to their destination by rotating the camera and directing them through seemingly impossible geometry.

name: Paws & Claws Best Friends: Dogs & Cats
summary: A dual-species pet simulator from THQ.

name: Path of Adventure
summary:
Text-based mobile rogue-like game that lets you venture in epic adventures, fight monsters and unearth treasures. 
Unlock gear, new characters and paths to reach the end of.

name: Path to Prosperity
summary: Path to Prosperity is a first-person RTS game, allowing you to control your base and people from the ground. Design and build your base, let your workers collect resources and produce goods, and raise armies to fight your competitors. Re-invest your coin wisely and send enough back home to win.

name: Panzer Commander
summary: Panzer Commander was a mid 90s tank simulator released by SSI that allowed a player to take the wheel of various Allied and Axis tanks in World War II.

name: Parkour Flight
Party Hard: Dark Castle
summary: Under the fool mood the ancient creatures awake inside the old castle. Dreadful things are going to happen next. Stop them using your occult powers.

name: Pac-Man: Ralph Breaks the Maze
summary: Wreck-It Ralph and his gutsy friend Vanellope meet arcade icon PAC-MAN in the remastered chasing adventure, PAC-MAN: Ralph Breaks the Maze! Collect some of your favorite characters from Ralph Breaks the Internet and more within the confines of the classic PAC-MAN maze.

name: Patriots III Ballistic Busters
summary: A one or two player shooter game published and developed by John Dondzila in 1996.

name: Par 1 Golf
summary: 18 holes, 18 lives, it's you against the golf course in Par One Golf! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back, then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: Pandemos
summary: Pandemos: Embark on this dangerous and fun pixelated dystopia, where the Protectors defend the harmless Cells from a massive invasion of dangerous virus agents of unknown origin.

name: Paccie
summary: Paccie is a maze game for PlayStation 2.

name: Pachi Pachi Saga
summary: Pachi Pachi Saga is a role-playing game released by TEN Kenkyuujo on Playstation in 1996. This game includes Japanese pachinko elements. Your ability to attack in battle is determined by the design of the drums. Also, if you collect pachinko balls, you can exchange them for items.

name: Pale Echoes
summary: An RPG of exploration, collection, and critical thinking. The end of the world has come and gone, leaving only phantoms where once there was life. Now Schorl, the last surviving human, and Spinel, the last of the magical saerii, search through the memories of a bygone era, hoping to find a future.

name: Pachinko Maruhi Hisshouhou
summary: Pachinko Maruhi Hisshouhou is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Jorudan and published by Vap, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Pac-Man Battle Royale
summary: Pac-Man Battle Royale is a 4-player simultaneous arcade game created as part of Pac-Man's 30th anniversary celebration. Each player is a different colored Pac-Man, with a similar graphic style to Pac-Man Championship Edition.

name: Pac-Man x Bomberman
summary: Pac-Man x Bomberman is a crossover title in the Bomberman and Pac-Man franchise.

name: Panzer Marshal
summary: Tactical scale World War 2 turn based strategy game, that puts the player in the role of an Axis or Allied army general.

name: Package Inspector
summary: Plunge into the dystopian land of Taxien and check packages at the local customs office! Which packages need to be sorted out? Which ones support the rebels and which ones support the state? Which side will you choose? And will you earn enough to pay your useless taxes?

name: Parkur 44
summary: There is only one rule in the game and that is to know the end of the track you play! You will be given a period of time before starting the course, during which time you will have to finish the game. If the time runs out, you have to start again from the very beginning of the track.

name: Paradigm Island
summary: Paradigm Island is a Narrative RPG where everyday surrealism meets dry wit. Figure out what kind of person you will be, piece together a perplexing mystery by getting to know the people you meet on the way using the skills of your liking, whilst trying not to get lost in your own psyche.

name: Path
summary: Use your skills to choose the correct path by modifying the direction of the arrows and/or their position, in a minimalistic puzzle game where your logical thinking will be challenged.

name: Pachinko Ren-chan Tengoku: Super CR Special
summary: Pachinko game created by Jorudan/Vap in 1995. Features a two-player versus mode - a rarity in pachinko games.

name: Particulate
summary: PARTICULATE is a VR particle physics sandbox and a creative tool. Create and save beautiful scenes by placing and recording the motions of a variety of tools. Control millions of particles using a highly-optimized custom engine.

name: Path To Dragon
summary: A casual and short 2D precision platformer, starring lil-dragon on a journey back to his family.

name: Particles
summary: Particles is a simple physics-based flash game where you dodge bouncing balls. Move the blue ball with the mouse, and try to avoid the red balls for as long as you can. As time goes by, more and more balls come up. Keep focused!

name: Paintball
summary: Are you ready for bright colors?

name: Park Ranger: Lost in the Woods
summary: Explore the map and search for clues relating to the missing person's report, but be careful. You're not alone, you are being followed. Looking at him only makes it worse, he is always watching. He is always coming.

name: Pandora: First Contact - Eclipse of Nashira
summary: With Eclipse of Nashira, new dangers and opportunities enter the world of Pandora. A new faction shows its face, talking of peace and friendship while their spies operate behind enemy lines. Nothing is what it seems anymore, as agents conduct covert warfare of espionage and sabotage, inciting revolts and stealing technologies.

name: Panzer Corps: Soviet Corps
summary: Expanding upon the award winning Panzer Corps game system, Soviet Corps puts you in command of the forces of the Stalin’s Russia and expects nothing less than Total Victory!

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 4
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 5
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 2
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Pac-Guy
summary: Less of a Pac-Man clone and more of a parody. Also lampoons popular science fiction films.

name: Pathogen Wars
summary: Educational game where white blood cells have to defeat viruses and bacteria.

name: Parchis Club
summary:
Parchis Club is the online multiplayer board dice game Parcheesi!
It is very similar to Ludo board game but with interesting game rules. Each turn is played with two dice! It is said to have evolved from Indian Parcheesi board game which was popularly played among Kings.

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 5
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 5 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 5 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Pathogen: Survival
summary: Pathogen: Survival is an arcadey wave based FPS zombie game that prioritises progression and customisation.

name: Pac-Man Collection
summary:
Pac-Man Collection (Atari 7800) is a 2006 homebrew compilation by Bob “PacManPlus” DeCrescenzo, published through AtariAge. It includes multiple Pac-Man and Ms. Pac-Man arcade variants—such as Puck Man, Hangly Man, Ultra Pac-Man, and Random Mazes—each can also be played in Plus mode, with selectable Fast, Slow, or Button-activated speed settings.

It includes these games:
Pac-Man
Puck Man
Hangly Man
Ultra Pac-Man

Random Mazes (Pac-Man style)
Ms. Pac-Man
Ms. Pac-Attack
Ms. Random Mazes

name: PainKeep Arena
summary: PainKeep Arena is a "Mission-Pack" designed for use with the registered version of Quake III Arena. PainKeep Arena not only offers brand new weapons, but also rich environments packed with tons of new sounds, new special effects, great new features, and lots of surprises.

name: Pairidaeza
summary: A historic gay romance set in Medieval Baghdad

name: Parking Lot Maze
summary: Parking Lot Maze is a puzzle game where as a parking lot manager, you need to free cars from gridlock before the stress level hits the roof.

name: Paint Drying Simulator
summary: This is literally a game about watch paint drying for 6 hours, so.. ..do you feel like wasting money and time? XD

name: Paper Shakespeare: To Date or Not to Date?
summary: Welcome to Elsinore Academy, a proving ground for young royalty; where people from all over the globe come for higher learning, and the cheerleaders are literal witches. Are you ready to enroll? Maybe get with Othello? Eh? EH?

name: Pandu
summary: Jaded and depressed, a man finds himself drawn to an adventure of a lifetime. PANDU is an adventurous, story-driven platformer combining intense action with a deep story.

name: Papa's Cupcakeria to Go!
summary: Bake and decorate delicious cupcakes on the go!

name: Panther Online
summary: A roleplaying and simulation game where you play as a panther. Improve skills and level up by hunting for food and survival in a variety of habitats.

name: Pacer: Classic
summary: Immerse yourself in Pacer: Classic, an adrenaline-fueled anti-gravity racing game set in a vast, interconnected universe. Personalize your paceship and weapons, engage in a riveting campaign, or single-player races, or even face off against your foes in a dynamic online multiplayer race within the expansive PacerVerse.

name: Pareicopse
summary: Surviving the night in the woods should be easy, as long as you don't wander too far away from camp... Pareicopse is a survival horror experience where you're tasked with finding your camping buddy who has been gone a little too long. Navigate the woods, and stay hidden from things bumping in the night. This game was made for the Haunted PS1 game jam in a little over a month, and released for Halloween.

name: Paramorfosi
summary: Atmospheric horror thirds-person experience

name: Paganitzu Part 3: Jewel of the Yucatan
summary:
Paganitzu is a tile-based, CGA/EGA computer game created by Keith Schuler and published by Apogee Software in October, 1991. It is the sequel to Chagunitzu. The game is a 2D puzzle game comparable to Chip's Challenge. It requires the player to solve various puzzles to complete the game.

Paganitzu was published in three parts. Part 1: "Romancing the Rose", Part 2: "The Silver Dagger" and Part 3: "Jewel of the Yucatan".

name: Packed to the Gills
summary: Deep-sea train-catching simulator made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54!

name: Patton Strikes Back: The Battle of the Bulge
summary: Although Patton Strikes Back is unarguably the worst game of veteran wargame designer Chris Crawford's career, it was a novel (and noble) attempt to attract non-wargamers to the fray through simplified combat, colorful animations, and excellent help functions and database. A commendable effort that would not be taken up again until SSI's phenomenal Panzer General

name: Pachi-Slot Biohazard 5
summary: Pachi-Slot Resident Evil 5 is a mobile pachinko/slot game based on Capcom's infected human hunting game.

name: Paper Drifter
summary: Manage your power ups to make it to the end of the level as fast as you can!

name: Paramedics!
summary: Experience emergency medicine in Paramedics, an early-stage game. Play as an EMT, paramedic, or doctor, face realistic medical challenges, and team up in multiplayer mode. Perfect for medical enthusiasts and gamers alike. Join us in our evolving journey!

name: Pathfinders: Mini Words
summary: Help Pathfinders discover the name of day-by-day objects in English. A unique mix of logic puzzle and word search. Great for English learners.

name: Painkiller: Hell Wars
summary: While not a straight port, it is actually a mix of the game and its expansion, Painkiller: Battle Out Of Hell. Painkiller: Hell Wars was also announced for Sony's PlayStation Portable and PlayStation 2. However, both versions were canceled worldwide.

name: Pac-Man Giant Joystick
summary: An extremely large joystick standing roughly two feet tall, with Pac-Man himself as the joystick's top. Gamelist is identical to Pac-Man Collection.

name: Parking Expert!
summary: Parking Expert promises an addictive and immersive experience that will have you vying for the title of ultimate parking expert.

name: Paco El Hare vs Los Marcianos Siderales
summary: A brief piece of history about Spanish software and video games.

name: PainKeep
summary: PainKeep is a DeathMatch-only “mission-pack” designed for use with registered Quake. PainKeep not only offers brand new weapons (with new pickup and view models), but also a new rich environment with tons of new sounds, new special effects, great new features, and lots of surprises.

name: Pawn Stars: The Game
summary: Pawn Stars: The Game is a unique strategy game that allows you to step into the shoes of Rick Harrison, Old Man, Big Hoss, and Chumlee, the famous characters from the History Channel's reality show, Pawn Stars. This game is all about the art of buying and selling items, where your ultimate goal is to turn a profit.

name: Painty Mob
summary: Shake up your humdrum world by dousing its unsuspecting citizens with splashes of vibrant paint in an effort to spread a little unrequested cheer around to all. But make sure you stay one step ahead of the ever-increasing angry mob – they aren’t too happy about your rainbow-inspired vision and will stop at nothing to slow you down. Rack up more and more points by chaining together colorful combos and unlock helpful items, equipment, and companions to keep the paint flowing.

name: Pac-Boy
summary:
Wandering in a gigantic picture dotted with vitamins and deadly traps, Pacboy, a little red and yellow ball with legendary gluttony, is desperately searching for the secret passage leading to his fiancée Pacgirl, a prisoner of ghosts.

Published as a type-in listing in the magazine Micro Mag n° 1 (May 1989)

name: Payday 2: Southbound Tailor Pack
summary: The crew heads southbound for Texas, donned in new outfits and ready for action.

name: Payday 2: The Crimewave Collection
summary:
Payday 2: The Crimewave Collection continues to be the top four-player co-op heisting game out there! Full of memorable characters, deadly weapons, non-stop action and lots of content. Payday 2: The Crimewave Collection gives you all DLCs ever released on console, in one convenient bundle.

Get it all, get it today. Keep those helmets flying!

name: Paint by DS: Classical Masterpieces
summary: no info

name: Pattern
summary: Wander an endless dreamscape of thick forests and sublime vistas. Dive deeper and the dream morphs, revealing ever stranger and more abstract worlds.

name: Paranormal Motel
summary: Cindy is a receptionist at the Paradise Motel. She begins her night watch. She takes care of customer requests as usual. But that evening unforeseen events will terrify Cindy

name: Parse-O-Rhythm
summary: Parse-O-Rhythm is a rhythm game about slashing errors in files to fix them. Slice and dice your way through files with nothing but the mouse and two buttons!

name: Party Maker
summary: Builder. Designer. Renovator. Unleash your creativity in over a dozen unique places, get the right equipment, prepare the space, use what you find. Wanna make a crazy party?

name: Paint By Numbers: Cooking Time! Ep. 6
summary: Time to cook! Paint by numbers and uncover images of delicious meals!

name: ParallHex
summary: ParallHex is a puzzle game where you'll navigate increasingly challenging levels. Solve puzzles simultaneously in two distinct worlds, interconnected by your every move.

name: Parking Escape
summary:
The goal of this game is to get your car out of a six-by-six grid full of automobiles by moving the other vehicles out of its way.
Parking Escape is a simple and a nice game.

name: Pathmaster
summary: Pathmaster is a visual novel with multi endings and various heroines.

name: Pako Forever
summary: Pako Forever is new take on the original hit game Pako: Car Chase Simulator. In its heart it still is simple to play car chase game where player must escape cops and avoid hitting anything, one bump and it is game over. But with endless, procedurally generated levels, options to play both portrait or horizontal view, secret locations and lots of other surprises it offers different, new fresh take on the original car chase game that started it all. It is not a sequel like Pako 2, but more of a refined, remixed version of the original Pako and its best parts.

name: Path of the Oxiflame
summary: Path of the Oxiflame is a 3D sokoban-puzzle-adventure inspired by classic Team Ico games. It features multiple playable characters as well as numerous puzzle mechanics beyond the classic pushing of boxes.

name: Pawn of the Dead
summary: A 3D game based on chess, in the style of Battle Chess. What makes it a unique game is its mechanic: When a Black (undead) piece captures a White piece, that White piece turns into a Black one!

name: Pawndemonium
summary: Charge through a swarm of pawns in this chess-based twist on tower defense. Work to fortify your back line while protecting against wave after wave of pawns and other chess pieces.

name: Passage: Path of Betrayal
summary: A fantasy point and click adventure game.

name: Panzer Campaigns - Bulge '44
summary: Bulge '44 is the second paid release in the Touch PzC series. This release includes 15 historical and hypothetical scenarios based on the PC Panzer Campaigns game of the same name. These scenarios allow you to play the part of different German commanders during the battle against the AI commanding the Allies. The scenarios range from the attacks by Peiper in the north of the Bulge to the attacks by 2nd and 116th Panzer further south as well as Panzer Lehr.

name: Pac-Mondrian
summary: Pac-Mondrian closes the perceptual distance between fine art and video games by combining Piet Mondrian's Modernist masterpiece 'Broadway Boogie Woogie' with Toru Iwatani's classic video game Pac-Man.

name: Palmyra: Nessa no Umi to Binaru Senki
summary:
The main character suddenly warped to a battlefield in the ancient Arabian country of Palmyra. Will he be able to survive the war taking place against his will and return to his home one day?

Palmyra is located between two big countries. When Princess Waba is on her way to one of the countries as a delegate, she sneaks out of the delegation. She enjoys freedom for a while, but she is captured by slave traders. What will happen to her...?

name: Partless Ron
summary: Partless Ron is a 2d platformer with metroidvania elements, the player explores locations, looking for new improvements to pass levels that he could not pass before, solving riddles of intricate locations and looking for the right way out.

name: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: Paru Kougyou Special
summary: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: Paru Kougyou Special is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Kaze and published by KSS, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Paper Train
summary: Control multiple trains at once, making sure they don't collide or lose time in this app for iOS.

name: Panda Dynasty
summary: A lot of trouble, family issues, love and... a panda

name: PayaPaya
summary:
PayaPaya is a drop-type puzzle game.
This is obtained score by connecting at least 4 of the same color coming from above the two blocks.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku 2
summary: The second game in the Pachi Slot Aruze Oukoku series.

name: Para Bellum: The Unknown Soldiers
summary: World War Two themed action game

name: Panda Parkour
summary: "Panda Parkour" is a role-playing parkour game in which you play as a panda and traverse the complex terrain.

name: Panco's Journey
summary:
Incarnate Panco, a white little cat, on his journey to save all Elemalia's residents, trapped in their own home due to a terrible tempest.

Control up to three different natural elements and interact with your environment to progress through puzzles and grab the coins dispersed around the world!

name: PandaSG
summary: A little cute panda, holding a gun to defend its little hometown...

name: Passing Time
summary: A casual soccer game for PS Mobile.

name: Pamir Saga
summary: Pamir opened his eyes at an unknown sanctuary somewhere. He has no choice because he has lost even his memory. Will he be able to regain his memory and defeat four powerful enemies?

name: Para Eyes
summary: Para Eyes is a spot the difference point and click horror game. You are tasked with the responsibility of monitoring live security cameras and reporting anomalies. Keep your eyes open, your sanity up, and survive the night!

name: Panzer Corps: Grand Campaign - '42
summary: 1942Poland, Norway, Belgium, Holland, Luxembourg, France, Yugoslavia, and Greece. All of these nations have fallen under occupation, and it was assumed that Russia would quickly join their ranks. Not only has the Russia Bear survived the invasion of 1941, but its winter offensive is still in full swing!

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 11
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Patrician IV: Rise of a Dynasty
summary:
Patrician IV - Rise of a Dynasty brings a comprehensive package of improvements and new features to the best-selling Patrician IV including online multiplayer and new scenarios.

Finally, you are able to operate your business in cooperative multiplayer mode with up to three friends helping out. And if you are already master of the seas, you can now try and conquer the continent as well!

In Rise of a Dynasty, you will find new routes into the heartland and trade with cities like Berlin, Warsaw and Nijmegen. But of course you have to grapple with the territorial rulers first and protect your wagon convoys from errant highwaymen.

name: Pac-Man: Championship Edition 2 + Arcade Game Series
summary: Bandai-Namco bundles its hit Pac-Man Championship Edition 2 on a disc with three Namco classics.

name: Pango Build Park
summary:
Build your own amusement park! 
 
Start by BUILDING a roller coaster CIRCUIT. 
Then arrange your PARK with its rides, its buildings and its decorations. 
All you need to do then is to EXPLORE the fascinating park that sprang from your imagination!

name: Paradiddler
summary:
The question is: How fast can you paradiddle?
A paradiddle is a small pattern of strokes executed with the right and the left hand.
Paradiddler lets you play a lot of different paradiddles and measures how fast you are, so you can compete with your friends online.
Paradiddler is not only made for drummers. It is fun to play for everyone and all ages!
But be careful: Paradiddler is very addictive!

name: Paganitzu Part 2: The Silver Dagger
summary:
Paganitzu is a tile-based, CGA/EGA computer game created by Keith Schuler and published by Apogee Software in October, 1991. It is the sequel to Chagunitzu. The game is a 2D puzzle game comparable to Chip's Challenge. It requires the player to solve various puzzles to complete the game.

Paganitzu was published in three parts. Part 1: "Romancing the Rose", Part 2: "The Silver Dagger" and Part 3: "Jewel of the Yucatan".

name: Panzer Arena
summary: Panzer is all about fast and stylish tank PVP combat. Boost, drift and flip your way through any kind of terrain in order to destroy your opponents. Wishlist now and join our playtests to help shape the game.

name: Panzer Command: Kharkov
summary: The second game in the Panzer Command Series. You command either a German or Russian company in this struggle on the Eastern Front.

name: Parlor! Mini 5
summary: Parlor! Mini 5 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Parlor! Mini
summary: Parlor! Mini is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Paper Dungeons
summary: Paper Dungeons is a fantasy board-game boosted by online content. With the ability to create and share online your own levels, you are up for an infinite replay value! The game is visualized as a classic tabletop board-game with dice and tokens. You can destroy walls and auto-heal as you uncover new dungeon tiles, which widens your choice of moves.

name: Pac-Man
summary: The Intellivision port of Pac-Man.

name: Pale Man!
summary: Pale Man! - This is a game about a man who loves to jump, who turned out to be in the world of platforms. The game will not let you get bored, because the leader and the creator of this world will always always communicate with you and joke. And by the way, he called you a dumpling, nothing personal. Good luck!

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 1
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 1 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 1 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Payday 2: Golden Dagger Tailor Pack
summary: The Payday Gang sets out to put an end to the triads chapter. With the help of new allies, donned in fresh gear we set our sights on.

name: Par 1 Golf 7
summary: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 7! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The seventh installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real golf!

name: Palace of Nemrac
summary: A Huge Level for Doom2, created back in 1998. Was my first map for Boom and now has been finally released. Was originally intended for the Doom Millennium project which was never released. The level originally didn't have as much detail, but I have given it a big facelift. In this map, you encounter every type of monster present in Doom2 and all weapons are present except for the BFG?, but who knows, it could be there?. The level is large and detailed and contains several unique sections such as a church and a Nazi building with Swastikas on the floors. Obviously the Demons are using the Nazi's for an experiment with silent teleporters. There are a few Arch Viles hanging around so be cautious. The 10 hard to find secrets come handy, many of them unmarked.

name: Pavor
summary: Inspired by the real life Isle De Las Munecas off the coast of Mexico City, players take on the role of five different characters across five different time periods, piecing together one large, paranormal mystery regarding origins of the doll covered island and the spirits that haunt it. Along the way, players will face off against a wide variety of creatively morbid monstrosities with varying behavior, and make narrative choices that not just alter the story, but directly impact the gameplay itself, and what future challenges that players may face.

name: Paradise Duty
summary: Also gods need food

name: Passage 4
summary: Passage 4 puts all the best parts of classic board games in one place.

name: Pac-Man
summary: Tengen released a port of the Famicom version of Pac-Man for the NES. It was first officially licensed, but was later re-released as an unlicensed black cartridge.

name: Paint it Doom
summary:
Paint it Doom is a conceptual successor to DIY, in that both are made out of solid colors. The sprites aren't crunched in this one though.

The wad is divided into 2 episodes:
Liberal Arts - which is a mainline progression consisting of 19 maps. Some of the later maps are pretty slaughtery.
Radicalized Arts - which is 3 misfit maps that couldn't be reconciled with my vision.

name: Panic Road
summary: A pinball game with multiple flippers and a vertically scrolling playfield. The playfield is an outdoor forest area, the sides of the playfield are tree stumps, the bumpers are walking mushrooms, etc.

name: Pac-Man
summary: The Game Gear port of Pac-Man.

name: Paws & Claws: Pampered Pets Resort 3D
summary: You love animals and they love you!

name: Panzer Campaigns: Sicily '43 Gold
summary: A revamped version of Panzer Campaigns: Sicily '43.

name: Pastaghi
summary: Are you the one to save them?

name: Paradise
summary: Paradise is a 7-map (5 main + 2 secret maps) GZDoom episode, packaged together with a custom gameplay mod crafted specifically for these maps. You do not need to read the mountain of text below to play the mod, but if you’re interested in getting a primer on all the gameplay changes before playing, go right ahead!

name: Path to Knighthood
summary: Learn the dark truth behind a gentle wyvern's rampage, a cold-blooded murder, and a dragon-worshiping cult. Will you submit or defy the godlike creature?

name: Papa's Pancakeria HD
summary:
Rise and shine with seasonal pancakes, waffles and more in Papa's Pancakeria HD!

-- ABOUT THE GAME --

After searching high and low for your lost pet, you get a surprise call that your pet was found at Papa's Pancakeria in Maple Mountain. Papa Louie has a busy schedule, but since your pet likes the restaurant so much, he's left the Pancakeria for you to run while he's gone! You'll be knee-deep in batter as you prepare fluffy pancakes, golden waffles, and warm stacks of french toast for your customers through all the seasons of the year!

Each station in the restaurant is a hands-on process, and you'll have to multi-task between all of the different stations to keep up with your orders. Pour batter onto the griddle, add mixables into the batter, and keep checking back to flip the flapjacks halfway through. Stack plates high with pancakes, syrups, and delicious toppings that change with each holiday. Add a glass of refreshing juice or a hot mug of coffee to complete the breakfast, and serve the food to your hungry customers! 

-- GAME FEATURES --

Celebrate the seasons with new holiday flavors! As the seasons change in Maple Mountain, your customers will order their pancakes, waffles, and french toast with new seasonal ingredients. You'll unlock new syrups, multiple toppings, and drinks for each holiday of the year, and your customers will love trying new flavors for a festive breakfast.

Play as Cooper hunting for his lost cat Cookie, or Prudence with her lovable dog Pickle -- or create your own custom character along with your own pet! You can also show off your holiday spirit with a massive variety of new holiday outfits and clothing now arriving on tablets. Choose unique color combinations for each item of clothing, and create your own style with millions of combinations!

Customers will occasionally bring you unique Special Recipes, which you can serve as the Daily Special in the restaurant! Each Special also has a bonus you can earn for serving a prime example of that recipe. When you serve enough Specials to master that recipe, you'll also earn a special prize!

Missing your favorite customer? Why not send them some coupons with the help of your friendly mailman, Vincent! Customers love a good deal, and will promptly arrive to order more food. Coupons are great for completing quests for Stickers and for strategically leveling up customers!

The customizable lobby is back, with new themes of furniture and decorations for each holiday of the year! Decorate the restaurant with holiday decorations and your customers won't mind waiting even longer for their food.

Play Foodini's famous Mini-Games to earn new furniture for your lobby and new clothing for your workers. You can also visit the Shop after each workday to find an extensive wardrobe of clothing, tons of furniture for your lobby, and a variety of helpful upgrades for the restaurant which you can buy with your hard-earned tips.

Papa's collection of Stickers return, which you can earn by completing a wide variety of tasks and achievements as you play. Each customer has a set of three favorite Stickers: Earn all three and you'll be rewarded with a brand-new outfit to give to that customer!

-- MORE FEATURES --

- Hands-on Pancake shop in the Papa Louie universe
- Updated and remastered for iPad
- Multi-task between cooking, building, and serving drinks
- Earn and Master 40 unique Special Recipes
- 90 colorful Stickers to earn for completing tasks
- 12 separate holidays to unlock, each with more ingredients
- Custom chefs, servers, and PETS!
- Tons of furniture and clothing to decorate your shop and workers
- Purchase shop upgrades with your earned tips
- 108 customers to serve with unique orders
- Use Stickers to unlock new outfits for your customers
- Over 75 ingredients to unlock
- 7 exciting Mini-Games to play after each workday

name: Panelka
summary: Panelka is a nostalgic, relaxing game where you immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the post-Soviet era. Create your cozy apartment or garage with that familiar, warm interior from your childhood. You have a wide selection of furniture and many other interior details at your disposal.

name: Party Fun Pirate
summary: A WiiWare game based on the children's toy Pop-Up Pirate. Shove swords in a barrel, and the one to touch the captain loses. ARG!

name: Paw Patrol
summary: PAW Patrol is an arcade machine released by Arcade1Up as a part of their Arcade1Up Jr. line. The machine features 3 original games based on the PAW Patrol series.

name: Path of Exile: Settlers of Kalguur
summary:
In Path of Exile: Settlers of Kalguur, help Kalguuran pioneers to build the town of Kingsmarch and establish trade between Wraeclast and their homeland.

The July expansion introduces the Settlers of Kalguur challenge league, a new trade market system for currency, balance improvements including two Ascendancy Class changes, Endgame improvements, some further additions to the Campaign and some Quality of Life features.

name: Papa's Time Machine
summary: Papa's Time Machine is a brand new action & adventure game in which players will play the role of a father and start an adventurous journey in different stages of life.

name: Paddington's Garden Game
summary: An adventure title starring Paddington Bear.

name: Pale Peril
summary: 1 copper map using hundreds of enemies and makkon textures.

name: Papich - The Game Ep.1
summary: Game about greatest traveler for balyk - Papich

name: Pandarunium
summary: Team up with friends in this top-down stealth-runner game to get to Rock n' Roll paradise. Use grit, abilities, and your friends to make it through the hordes of enemies.

name: Paso Comic PuruPuru Paradise: Santa Claus Tokushuu
summary: Paso Comic PuruPuru Paradise: Santa Claus Tokushuu is an erotic-themed entry starring a female Santa Claus

name: Par 1 Golf 4
summary: 18 holes, 18 lives, it's you against the golf course in Par One Golf 4! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back, then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The fourth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: Pappara Paoon
summary: Pappara Paoon is a puzzle game where you in a tug-of-war try to beat your opponent by sending blocks over to the opponent's side.

name: Pale Lands VR
summary: Pale Lands VR brings you a lighthearted take on the zombie apocalypse! Play as YOU want by combining weapons and shifting strategies against progressive mobs of unique and absurd zombies. Defend the town and save humanity with a chicken leg!

name: Payday 2: Midland Ranch Heist
summary: The Payday Gang head to Texas to complete a job for Gemma McShay.

name: Pastel x Pastels
summary: A short and colorful experience designed for whose familiar with games like LSD Dream Emulator, Yume Nikki and etc., as well just people enjoying surreal and dreamy themes.

name: Parkland
summary: Job offer - We are looking for a manager of nature park

name: Parking light
summary: Parking light is a racing game. The goal of the game is to put the bus in the parking space within the allotted time. The game has 104 different levels. To go to the next level you need to get at least one star. Stars stand out for collision-free passage.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Season Pass 2
Pastry Paradise
summary: A block matching game from Gameloft.

name: Pal
summary: A new mission awaits completion. Will you listen to Pal? Maintain your engine, lights, and oxygen levels while avoiding Pal and navigating towards destination

name: Paranormal Place
summary: Alex is a blogger who explores places with paranormal phenomena. At the request of his subscribers, he goes to an abandoned place where, according to rumors, some creepy things were noticed. What is happening there? You have to find it out.

name: Paper Flights
summary: Fly your paper plane down a tower while avoiding obstacles and collecting coins and power ups. How far can you get?

name: Path of Ninja
summary: A platform game with a Ninja theme where the player needs collect the Shuricoins and finish by getting the Phantom Blade. At each level the player will have a rank.

name: Paint Tubes
summary:
Cool off, shoot the balls, and color tubes to reach the goal in over 100+ levels!
One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects, and addictive gameplay mechanics.

name: Parasol Fall
summary: Parasol Fall was an online Flash advergame playable in the Nintendo Arcade section of nintendo.com. The game promoted Super Princess Peach, first released in 2005 for the Nintendo DS.

name: Paradise Rescue
summary: Your girlfriend has become ill, and you decide to help her by shrinking yourself down to microscopic size and entering her body. When you wake up, you find yourself on a colorful island populated by strange creatures who you play mini-games with to progress.

name: Parts Unknown
summary: Parts Unknown is a single player fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting platformers with a unique twist.

name: Paper Wings
summary: Paper Wings is a fast-paced arcade game about catching falling balls mid-air to keep your bird alive. As you gain points, you advance through the stages in the game. In each stage, new challenges are introduced to make the game harder and more fun.

name: Panda Man
summary: Panda Man is a third-person action game, where the player is located in a frozen area with a large number of panda people living on the ground. The player must avoid the attack of pandas, find a few life supplies, and kill all the enemies alive to win the game.

name: Paper Nomad: Master Edition
summary: All Paper Nomad Base features + Online game Hosting + Import\Export + XXL Maps

name: Pantsylvania
summary: The Gigglebone Gang: Pantsylvania is an educations game. The gang visits the kingdom Pantsylvania where they teach children various facts, bits of fiction, various bouts of craziness. and can enter ten destinations, e.g. a restaurant, the castle or a school. Each location has five activities which are reached by clicking on one of the gang members or the king.

name: PathCraft
summary: PathCraft was designed with the possibilities and limitations of the Go in mind. The enemies are not only a danger to the robots but to the player themselves.

name: Paparazzi
summary: Take photographs of models in one of the few Simple 2000 games that got a release outside of Japan where it is known as The Camera Kozou.

name: Panoptes
summary: A story driven trading card game about the clandestine operations of an organization known as The Club set in a world of magic and unknown technology.

name: Path of Exile: Atlas of Worlds
Paint Skills
summary: Paint Skills - is a challenging physics puzzles for your brain! You need to get creative and draw shapes to solve the physics puzzles.

name: Passage
summary: Passage is medieval mayhem in a dark twisted world that's constantly changing. Grab hold of modern artillery, magical power-ups, and your trusty old axe in this adventure to rescue twin girls taken for a truly unholy sacrifice.

name: Pac Maze
summary: Small hero is lost in a big maze. Help him find the way out. Collect all coins needed for exit to be opened. Avoid monsters wandering around. Use various powerups to your advantage.

name: Paranormal Investigation
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Peter Tomov as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Parasol Henbee
summary: This game is based on the Anime series of the same name and was released only in Japan for the Nintendo Famicom. Not to be confused with the Game Boy title of the same name.

name: Party Party Time + Ultra Pack Set
summary:
The party never stops with the Party Harder Pack, Party Fever Pack, Party Even Harder Pack, Excitement Pack, and Happy Happy Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time!
Gather everyone up and party happy, party on!

name: Parallel World
summary: Feel boring on Find Difference between still images? Would you feel awesome if I change those still images to 3D World?

name: Parabox
summary: Parabox is an award-winning puzzle game that explores a unique recursive system of boxes within boxes within boxes within boxes. Learn to manipulate the world's structure by pushing boxes into and out of each other. Wrap your head around what happens when a box contains itself, and learn to use infinity to your advantage.

name: Payblood
summary:
Payblood is a fighting game with pixel graphics.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam.
Theme: Your Life is Currency

name: ParaParaParadise V1.1
summary:
Update of the original ParaParaParadise, which was released a month prior.
The ENJOY mode was removed.
The NORMAL, HARD and EXPERT difficulties were placed in a new folder, labeled FREESTYLE.
Total songs: 28

name: Paul & Tita
summary: Help the avocado couple to cross the forest!

name: Paddington no Sekai Ryokou
summary: Paddington no Sekai Ryokou is a Sega Pico game based on Paddington Bear

name: Paradise Island 2
summary: Slip into the role of island manager, where it's up to you to create a popular holiday destination, with cute cartoon graphics, a thought out economic system and hundreds of beautiful buildings and tourist locations.

name: Path of Exile: Trial of the Ancestors
summary:
In this expansion, you will visit the Karui afterlife and defeat ten tribes in a series of tournaments to earn valuable new rewards.

Our August expansion introduces the Trial of the Ancestors challenge league, 16 new Atlas keystones, reworks of the Guardian and Chieftain Ascendancy classes, 14 new support gems and the return of a fan-favourite past league, The Forbidden Sanctum.

name: Pandemonium
summary: Pandemonium is an arcade adventure game. The objective of the game is to construct the core by collecting 12 parts of the core.

name: Panic Bomber
summary: Panic Bomber is a puzzle game released for mobile phones in japan only and it is part of the Panic Bomber series.

name: Panty Raider: From Here to Immaturity
Pac-Man Tilt
summary: Pac-Man Tilt is a 2D platformer, developed by Namco Bandai Games and released for the Nintendo 3DS in 2011, as one of the included games in Pac-Man & Galaga Dimensions.

name: Paper Mario Randomizer
summary: A randomizer for Paper Mario on the Nintendo 64. Generate your own seed and discover the game in a fresh new way!

name: Pathway: Desire
summary: A girl finds herself trapped in a cave and must find a way out.

name: Paradise Island Driver
summary: Explore a beautiful tropical island and pass a variety of exciting challenges and trials! Drive a dune buggy, food truck, circus truck and more!

name: Past Memories
summary: The game tells the story of a woman who has to face all the important memories of her life by going though several distorted stages full of enemies, which symbolize the fragments of her past that have come back to haunt her. Our heroine must try to survive those nightmarish worlds by evading the enemies chasing after her and overcoming all the obstacles that stand in her way. She cannot fight back, she can only flee. But with the clever handling of dimension changing, and the several resources she is provided with, she can hold the monsters back and get to the end safe.

name: Paint Defense
summary: A color-based tower defense game where you have to micromanage a constantly evolving battlefield.​

name: Parasites
summary: Jonathan's son, John, is kidnapped in the middle of the night and his father chases the people who took him to save the boy and find out why he was captured. Along the way, you'll uncover a web of secrets and plot twists that will challenge everything you thought you knew.

name: PachiPara 13: Super Umi to Pachipro Fuuunroku
summary: PachPara 13 is one of the many titles in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features faithful 3D recreations of two pachinko machines made by Sanyo Bussan: CR Super Umi Monogatari M55W and CR Super Umi Monogatari M55X. There are two modes available: Tsūjō (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed.

name: Papa Sangre
summary: A game wherein the world is presented solely through 3D binaural audio in the first-person perspective, without graphics of any kind.

name: Pax Ruthenia
summary: Lead a young post-soviet republic, torn by internal contradictions, and determine its historical path. EU or EAEU? Federalism or Unitarianism? Democracy or Dictatorship?

name: Path Builder
summary:
Don't let your people fall down in the dark - build the path, so they can follow you to a better world.

Connect the path blocks and fill in the empty shapes to create a solid road for your friends. Try to do it in the best way possible to collect the stars. New levels will give you the new challenges. Solve all the puzzles to save all your followers!

name: Palingenesis

name: Pac-Man Hammer
summary: Whac-a-mole machines with 6 or 3 moles to hit, respectively. Only released in Brazil.

name: Panic Attack - Devil's Favorite

name: Parlor! Mini 4
summary: Parlor! Mini 4 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Party Party Time: Party Power Pack

name: Paper Plane Arena: A Medieval Fantasy
summary: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: PandemicZ

name: Pararomantic

name: Pardon My French Toast
summary:
In Pardon My French Toast, you play as a Toasty (a talking slice of brioche) who dreams of participating in the new edition of the bread wrestling competition. To be physically up to the challenge, he decides to follow a training program organized by the previous champion of the discipline, which will take him all over the world and make him meet a bunch of wacky weirdos.

Pardon My French Toast is an adventure / platform game in 2D top view in which the player explores different worlds, solves puzzles and meets a whole bunch of fun characters. Bread wrestling is a... special sport. We will introduce the discipline later.

name: Pandoland
summary: A new mobile game developed by Game Freak in collaboration with WonderPlanet

name: Pachoink!
summary:
Pachoink! The game boards provide the targets, but do you have the ball skills to take them all out?
Some levels require precision, others good timing, some brute force, but more often than not it's a combination of all of these. Rise to the challenge and earn your stars!

name: PaperPlane

Piece together all colorful patches to solve increasingly challenging puzzles. It has a competitive mode where you must solve the pattern before your opponent.

name: Panzer Warfare
summary: Panzer Warfare - best game about tanks of all time.

name: Panties Attack

name: Paris Attack

name: Path to Heaven
summary: Path to Heaven is a hardcore platformer in a minimalist style. You have a long and difficult way to heaven!

This is the perfect place where you could learn to cook all kinds of food from all over the world, from delicious European food to exquisite Japanese food, and also the Chinese food! The best of all, you get to taste all of them! Explore in 7 different rooms and scenes as you wish!

name: Paint My Cat - Color and Play
Par 72 Golf IV

name: Partia 2
summary:
Partia 2 is a SRPG (Strategy Role-playing) video game inspired by Fire Emblem and Tear Ring Saga series. In a high fantasy setting, the game will take players through an adventure where magic and sword collide and friendship and betrayal intertwine.
Partia 2 : The Pretenders War is a sequel to Partia: The Broken Lineage. The game packs 22 stages that could present challenges to any SRPG fan.

summary: Beat down citizens taken their gold, kill your neighbors for a roll of toilet paper, and plenty more scenarios like that.

name: Pancake: The Game
summary: Flip a pancake with a frying pan as many times as you can without it falling on to the floor.

name: Paradigm Blast

name: Palikat
summary:
Palikat (Blocks in english) is a 1-player game only, controlled with a joystick. Steer to left or right with your stick. Press fire to rotate the piece clockwise. Pushing up on the stick will make the piece fully drop. Drop a little faster than the normal speed by pushing the stick down.

From the title screen you can adjust music volume, toggle sound effects on/off. You can also select your starting level. Each level the piece drops faster than in the previous level.

name: Path to the Goal
summary: The protagonist, who aims to become a professional soccer player, sets out on a journey of training! Overcome various obstacles to become a professional soccer player!

name: Pantyhoes
summary: Pantyhoes is an adult visual novel that follows the life of a young business graduate as he takes over his father's failing company. Choices matter as your employees try to win you over to their side.

name: Pachinko TD
summary: Pachinko TD is a physics-based, minimalist tower defense game. Inspired by Thronefall.

name: Paranormal Agency
summary: Use your supernatural ESP to rid the city of malevolent spooks and spirits in this eerie Hidden Object game! Detective Heather Mills has the amazing ability to see ghosts and other mysterious entities that are not visible to other people. When spooky ghosts and weird creatures start showing up in local homes, it's up to Heather and her agency to get to the bottom of this macabre mystery and look for reasons behind recent poltergeist attacks on innocent citizens. Help Heather hunt for hidden items in locations all over the city and find out who is behind the attacks. Featuring over 50 levels and variety of hidden object challenges, Paranormal Agency is a thrilling, and chilling, interactive examination of the unexplained. Start your search today!

name: Pandora Galaxy

The protagonist of the game is a merchant engaged in interplanetary trade, but as the story unfolds, the player can choose the path of an interstellar pirate or a planetary explorer.

name: Parking Jam 3D
summary:
Parking Jam is a fun and addictive puzzle board game. It’s more than just parking - it's a fun driving experience that'll take you to another level!

Jams in parking lots, challenging parking situations, angry grannies and much more. Experience one of the best parking board games, get rewarded and unlock skins, solve puzzles which get harder each level, choose which car to move so you can find smooth exits without hitting anything and anyone, build up properties, rent them and get "idle money" from them, complete levels without getting stuck, and more! Just make sure you don’t mess with Grandma...

In this funny and colorful game, you challenge your logic skills, critical thinking, and timing precision.

name: Paintings Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Paintings Jigsaw Puzzles - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day.Paintings Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and children.

name: Panty Raider - From Here to Immaturity
Panda Hero

name: Paranormal: Found Footage
summary: You are a student journalist who decides to make a documentary about the abandoned «North» cosmodrome, where in the 1990s a series of man-made disasters occurred that caused serious genetic changes in humans and animals, forming previously unknown mutations.

name: ParkourMan
summary: It’s time to shake this city up! ParkourMan is the game for the real adrenaline lovers. Run, jump, climb roofs and perform fascinating stunts right in the air – here’s your main mission. The further the way, the more dangers you’ll face! Collect coins and boosters and unlock new characters!

name: Pang: Magical Michael
summary: Michael, an aspiring young magician, has failed an experiment - leading to dire consequences!

name: Paradise Shooting!!
summary: A simple shooting game in which players move your ship left and right to destroy all the "targets" placed on the stage! Clear all 12 stages and get a total of 24 reward CGs!

name: Panzer Campaigns: Philippines ’44
summary:
In Philippines ’44, as MacArthur you will command units from both the US Sixth and Eighth Armies as well as US Army Air Force and Naval air groups. The Japanese forces, led by General Yamashita, had at his disposal, three major commands, the Shobu, Shimbu and Kembu Groups. Yamashita’s command outnumbered the Allied forces but had to defend a vast territory with limited knowledge of where the Allied forces may land. All that is lacking is for you to kick off one of the largest land campaigns of the Pacific War.

Philippines ’44 is a fascinating title, focused on a rarely covered campaign. There is both a range of operations as well as diverse forces for both sides. Actions ranged from amphibious landings, airdrops (for both sides!) to a range of land actions. The environment and terrain are much more of a hinderance to action than is the case in Europe and the juncture of weather, jungle and other challenges impacts the speed of movement and play.

Philippines '44 includes 76 Scenarios – covering all sizes and situations, including a solo tutorial scenario plus specialized versions for both head to head play and vs. the computer AI.

Philippines '44 provides multiple play options including play against the computer AI, Play by E-mail (PBEM), LAN & Internet "live" play as well as two player hot seat.

name: Pac-Guy: Atomic Edition
summary: Pac-Guy's hometown gets nuked, and naturally, Pac-Guy wants revenge.

name: Paper.io 3D

name: Pachinko Daisakusen 1

name: Paca Plus Plus!

name: Patchman vs. Blue Squares
summary: More Sheeple need rescuing - this time from Office World - and Patchman is on the case! But now there are sinister Blue Squares to contend with... and a boss EIGHT TIMES more powerful than the last one! Grow, sneak, and battle your way to the truth!

name: Pawly Pets: My Pet Hotel
summary: Do you sometimes wish that you could spend every working day with animals? We know we do, but for the majority of animal lovers, a pet is the closest we can get. Some of us are not even that fortunate. That's where games such as My Pet Hotel come in: a variety of virtual pets at your mercy for as long as your DS can stand! You can look after dogs, cats, ponies, horses, rabbits, turtles and budgerigars. Feed them, clean their pens, play with them, teach them some tricks, ride out on horseback through the countryside and so much more. At the end of the game, you could be voted the best Pet Hotel in the world, if you find you can rise to the challenge.

name: Pawn Shop Simulator
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure in "Pawn Shop - Storage Auction". Restore treasures, outbid rivals, and build your pawn empire in this addictive simulation game. With a mix of pawn, auction, and storage war elements, the excitement never ends. Will you become the ultimate pawn mogul?

name: Paranormal Escape
summary: Paranormal Escape

name: Pathfinder Adventures: Rise of the Goblins Deck 2
summary: The Rise of the Goblins takes place in an alternate version of the Rise of the Runelords, where the heroes are the Goblins and the villains are the heroes. This is a continuation of the story that follows immediately after the first series of five scenarios. Goblins Only!

name: Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder!
summary: Immersed in an old fashioned, decrepit military battlefield, players in Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder must take down a sea of hand drawn and animated enemy soldiers as they attempt to cross into your territory. Load your cannons and take aim with the hope of ultimately blasting your way to victory.

name: Party Pie
summary: Party Party is a VR party game, you can draw and share your own characters, chanllenge large number of unique levels with them. We will also add the map editor in the future , you can create your own levels!

name: Paris in 2000 Years
summary: 'Paris in 2000 Years' is a city-builder game focused on the history of Paris. From the Gallo-Roman era to the Middle Ages and the Renaissance, you can construct, upgrade, and beautify various buildings. Completing historical quests will also reward you with iconic landmark architectures.

name: Party Central
summary: Party Central is a party game that has games such as Poker, Trivia, Blackjack and more.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Dekahel 2
summary: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Dekahel 2 is a Pachi-Slot simulation game developed and published by Aruze for Neo Geo Pocket Color.

name: Panda Push
summary: Panda Push is a classically styled game with simple controls. Push the other team off the field and capture their flag. Build your path and walls to block your opponents. Every game is unique, playing with multiple players, 2 to a hundred. You build the map and choose your tactics.

name: Paper Toss: World Tour

name: Path of Becoming
summary: Path of Pecoming is a quest adventure in which you have to travel to the mysterious world of the magical Grimoire!

name: Paso Pico McDonald's de Asobo!
summary: This is the PC remake of McDonald's de Asobo!

name: Payday 2: Crimewave Edition - Scarface Heist
summary: The Scarface Heist Pack comes with The Scarface Mansion Heist, 1 new weapon, 1 melee weapon, 4 masks, materials and patterns and 4 Achievements.

name: Paint Works
summary: Named after the classic quick guessing show on German television, Die Montagsmaler guarantees real creative fun for the whole family on the Wii. This makes it the first painting and creative game format on the motion console. It is all about drawing, guessing, painting and colouring. Whether alone or with up to four players - this game offers variety and pure entertainment. The party really gets going, especially in multiplayer mode: grab friends or family and off you go! Whoever guesses the searched terms first in the game »Monday Painter« wins the match. The game principle used is intuitive and ensures long-lasting guessing fun. But the single player mode is also impressive: Here the player draws figures, stamps or sprays crazy motifs. Features: * The first painting fun for the Wii: 14 different games about painting, drawing and colors * Let your creativity run free: Large creative part with paint boxes, mandalas and collages * Which one of you is the next Picasso? Gallery to save your own artworks * Also included: Over 500 terms for tracing and guessing are included with the game on extra playing cards. This is how »The Monday painter« becomes a real parlor game! * Dexterity, guesswork and creativity: For 1-4 players

name: Passimian's Jungle Bowling
summary: A Pokemon bowling browser game featuring Passimian.

name: Party Hard: Collector's Edition
summary: The Collector's Edition of Party Hard includes the full game, a kick-ass OST, and the High Crimes DLC. This is the ultimate edition of Party Hard.

name: Panic Palette
summary: Panic Palette is an otome game, developed and published by Takuyo, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Papercut Art Gallery-Growth
summary: An artistic puzzle game inspired by the art of paper cutting. You need to assemble paper cutting pieces to restore the artworks in the museum themed around growth.

name: Pain
summary: Climb. Fall. Climb even higher. The pain from failing will be meaningless once the top is reached.

name: Pandora: Wild Origins
summary: Pandora: Wild Origins is an animal simulation game where you play as a feline. Write your own story and explore a new world. Survive and evolve to become a fierce predator. Meet a partner, build a new family and raise your own progeny !

name: Paul Pixel - The Awakening
summary: An ordinary guy forced to defend the world from an alien invasion of infectious zombies. A point and click adventure with beautiful pixel art and bombastic retro sound.

name: Pairs / Space Rendezvous / Logic
summary:
Three games are available in this compilation: 
 
Pairs (selected by pressing "1") is the same game as Matchmaker!, a regular Memory game. A matrix with 20 letters appears on the screen and the player has to find pairs of symbols hidden by the letters. Two counters will be displayed: time and number of matches. In two players mode (selected by pressing "2"), the players share the matrix and the one who makes more matches win. 
 
Space Rendezvous (selected by pressing "3") is somewhat similar to Lunar Lander. Two players have to try to link up their spaceships to the orbiting mother ship, while avoiding hitting the ground. Each ship has 50 megajoules of power and will be refueled when a perfect link-up is performed. A counter will be displayed for each player, and wins the player who first performs 10 perfect link-ups. If one player goes out of fuel, he's out of game. 
 
Logic (selected by pressing "4") is the same game as Logix!. The player has to guess a sequence of five different digits. The player types in the first try and the computer will display a two digit number with the number of correct digits to the right and the number of correctly placed digits on the left. The player has then to continue guessing the sequence based on the clues given. The object is to solve the problem in the least number of tries, counted on the left on the screen.

name: Parallax
summary: A top-down shooter for the Commodore 64.

name: Parasitic Descent
summary: In a world ravaged by a catastrophic event, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. In "Parasitic Descent," you step into the boots of a lone survivor navigating the haunting remnants of a once-thriving civilization.

name: Pandemic Bunny
summary: Fight the global pandemic both in game and real life! Save humanity by shooting your way through hordes of viruses in your quest to find and use vaccine. A percentage of all proceeds from Pandemic Bunny will go towards charities aiding those affected by the current global pandemic.

name: Parameters
summary: A minimalist RPG where all gameplay elements (enemies, stores, loot, treasure) are represented with squares on a grid.

name: Paradise Lust
summary: 2D Point & Click Dating Adventure! Explore an idyllic tropical island with a cast of sexy beauty pageant contestants and their friends, discovering a paradise of survival, romance, and lust.

name: Parcheesi Boardgame Simulator
summary: Play parcheesi on your computer, against cpu or with friends.

name: Panzer Dragoon
summary: The LCD version of Panzer Dragoon is a handheld game released by Tiger Electronics as part of their Pocket Arcade series of LCD handhelds. It is based on the Sega Saturn game, Panzer Dragoon.

name: Patlabor: The Mobile Police
summary: Patlabor: The Mobile Police is an Adventure game, published by Yutaka, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Pasteman Pat
summary:
Pat Splatt, the best poster paster in Groove-Town, has his work cut out for him. After spending all day yesterday putting up posters he has found out that his rival, Nasty Norville has messed them up. You play as Pat as he attempts to put the posters back to normal within a time limit. Before you play the game you can select which level to play from a choice of 12. These are split into three groups which are Kids Stuff, Smart Alec and Mensa Only and each level is harder than the last one but with a higher time limit. The first poster is just a grid of 2x2 while the last poster is 8x8 and when one is completed you see a tick beside the level you have completed. You can attempt any level at any time and if you fail one then you can attempt it again later.

The game is viewed from behind Pat on his ladder with a small part of the poster shown and the screen scrolls when you move Pat in multiple directions. With your brush you slide the pieces of the poster by a full row or a full column so forward planning is required. In the bottom right corner is a sign for the toilet and if you press down you can see what the poster should look like, a press of the fire button shows the poster with the grid on it and finally another press of the fire button and you see what the poster is looking like at that moment. As you move the pieces around the screen you have to avoid missiles being thrown at you by Norville's henchmen and if you are hit by one you lose one of five lives. Failing to complete the level within the time limit and you fail the level and back to the level select screen. Also seen on the screen is a percentage of how much of the poster is completed.

name: Path
summary: In the world of lightness and darkness, Let's make a Path by connect the dots.

name: Paradise Lost: First Contact
summary: Paradise Lost is a 2D pixel art side scrolling adventure that focuses on a stealth-action type of play and takes elements from platformer and puzzle resolution.

name: Panic Park
summary: Slam the red and blue sticks back and forth to win and, probably, break the machine with Namco's arcade-only jam, Panic Park.

name: Patchwork Heroes
summary: Patchwork Heroes is an Action game, developed by Acquire and published by SCEA, which was released in 2010.

name: Parasol Stars: Rainbow Islands 2
summary:
Port of "Parasol Stars - The Story of Rainbow Islands II" (also known as Bubble Bobble 3) was published by Ocean and Graftgold for Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Amiga, and Atari ST.

This sequel to Rainbow Islands sees a return to the gameplay of Bubble Bobble, but with Bub and Bob in their now-human forms.

The boys must clear a series of screens of bad guys - who take slightly more esoteric forms than the angry caterpillars from Rainbow Islands - and again pick up a whole bunch of power-ups.

But this time they're armed with umbrellas! Oh, okay then, parasols...

name: Paladin Slayer
summary: Paladin Slayer is a hack and slash / beat'em all game, in the third person. In a universe of medieval fantasy with intrigues and multiple environments.

name: Party Talk Simulator
summary: Talk to three random people at a party, but only communicate with one word.

name: Pandora Saga: Weapons of Balance
summary: A free to play MMORPG by Atlus Online.

name: Parcel Problems
summary: ​​Parcel Problems​ is a fast-paced parcel packing simulator. You must cram items into boxes as fast as you can in the hopes that you're making your quota. Don't let your boss down!

name: Pachi-Slot Tekken 2nd
summary: Pachi-Slot Tekken 2nd is a mobile pachinko/slot machine game with Tekken characters.

name: Par 1 Golf 6
summary: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 6! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The sixth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: Pastel Island
summary: Arcade collecting game.

name: Panzer Command: Operation Winter Storm
