name: Paintball Arena Challenge
summary:
Put Yourself Out There On The Wide Battlegrounds For A Royal Battle, And Get Into The Ultimate Shooting Competition In Different Modes Of Paintball Arena Challenge. Load your machine guns & paintball guns at the ready, Aim and shoot your opponents in three different modes paintball shooter battle in the action sports 3D game battlegrounds.

Level Progression: 
Get the real world shooting experience in the in the best of paintball shooting games. Aim the paint ball guns on suggested rivals and upgrade on level progression.

Lone Survivor battle arena: 
Enjoy the essence of paint ball games along with shooting combat battlegrounds. Be the lone survivor in the battlefield and shoot your opponents with the field gun.

Team Death match: 
Team up and gear up with paintball guns. Paintball gun shooting is always more fun in teams. 


Features Of Paintball Arena Challenge:

•	Be The Ultimate Paintball Shooting Player 
•	Experience Gun Fight In Extreme Shooter Game
•	Wonderful 3D Graphics And Details
•	Engaging Sound Effects
•	3 Modes Of Game Play
•	Battle Arena Free For All Mode
•	TDM Mode For Team Match

name: Parkour Game
summary: Parkour Game is fun platformer game where you can parkour around amazing world with fitting sound track.

name: Parkour
summary:
Parkour is a runner game with tons of challenges.
Try to run as far as possible.

name: Palesuckers
summary: Follow the story of the very first vampire, who this pale "nobody" is, and why there's a growth on his neck. If things weren't already confusing, he comes across a horde of demons, ghouls, and zombies that he must fight off as he figures out what is happening.

name: Paws for Adventure
summary: Hunt, Fight and Meow your way to saving the cat colonies. A purrrfect adventure for cat lovers.

name: Paradise Heights
summary: Paradise Heights is an eroge VN where the protagonist inherits managerial duties of an apartment complex inhabited mostly by amorous women.

name: Parfait Station
summary: This is an unreleased MMO from Webzen that focused on PVP and shooter gameplay.

name: Paper Shakespeare: Stick Julius Caesar (With a Dagger) - War on Xmas
summary: Shakespeare's Brutus and Cassius are out to assassinate Santa Claus. This DLC is just a whole lot of holiday trauma.

name: Pauli's Adventure Island
summary: Hop, dash, fly, and float your way through rolling hills, mysterious forests, dark caves, ancient temples, and more in this epic 2D side-scrolling platformer! Explore and collect all the stars in each level for extra lives, but beware of dangerous creatures: One false step, and you’ll get knocked back to square one!

name: Papi Trampoline
summary: Papi Trampoline

name: Palladium: Adventure in Greece
summary: In this game you will play as an archaeologist who is driven by a desire to find an ancient artifact. The hero will travel to Greece to solve riddles and avoid hazardous traps. But he is not the only one who wishes to obtain the treasure. Two other adventurers also arrive at the forgotten island.

name: Paradise Cleaning!
summary: Paradise Cleaning! is casual action game. Select a girl you want to play with among 4 heroines, and beat each stage. Beautiful, kawaii, a little erotic CG will be yours!

name: Pacfish
summary: Help a tropical fish fight off ocean predators, survive in coral mazes, and find a way to eat all dots!

name: Party Host 85
summary: Party like it's 1985! You're the host of the wildest party of the century and have to plan and execute a succesful event. Get to know all the crazy characters and discover what they do will once the party started.

name: Pango Playground
summary:
Discover 4 playgrounds in the kind and colorful Pango and friends' world.

Catch the train, stop at the station and slid down on the slide, look for a treasure in the sand, fly to the stars on board a space rocket, put together a puzzle's pieces...
Play with your kid and make up your own stories!

Your kid can experience interactivity, increase his/her curiosity and imagination, develop his/her fine motor skills.

Sweet and lovable, everyone will adopt it!

Also, visit the website www.studio-pango.com and discover numerous printable free activities: coloring books, invitation cards, puzzles, drawings ... quite a choice to keep little hands busy !

name: Paddle Battle
summary: The first video game produced by Allied Leisure. It is a clone of Atari's pong, and was created by electronics firm Universal Research Laboratories more-or-less copying the board from a Pong machine Allied had purchased from a distrubutor.

name: Paper Knights
summary: Paper Knights is an artistic stylized RTS (Real Time Strategy) game which puts the player in charge of controlling tiny paper armies and deciding about their next moves in battles and sieges.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Salerno '43 Gold
summary: Salerno '43 - The invasion of Salerno in September 1943 and Anzio in January 1944 were two very different operations. At Salerno the US and British troops ran into a stubborn enemy determine to throw them back into the sea. So, five months later at Anzio, they acted with caution, building up their force before moving inland - but the delay allowed the Germans to pocket them into the beachhead - one that proved difficult and costly to break out of. In this Panzer Campaign title you can try your hand in command of both of these critical Allied amphibious operations that lead up to Normandy. As a bonus you can also play the German Air Assault on Crete in 1941 to round out the action in the Mediterranean.

name: Pac-Man: Ticket Mania
summary: Over 30 years later, the PAC is Back and better than ever! This new video redemption piece brings back the classic PAC-MAN game concept but now rewards players with tickets or a gift card. Players acquire points by munching on as many of the familiar Pac-dots and fruits as they can while being chased by the ghosts; Inky, Blinky, Pinky, and Clyde. If successful in entering the ghost house, players can win the “PAC-POT” and are treated with a mesmerizing PAC-MAN animation. Options for the “PAC-POT” can include tickets or gift cards*. The cabinet is beautifully lit from top to bottom with multicoloured LEDs as well as a spectacular LED marquee that scrolls the classic 8-bit PAC-MAN animation.

name: Papa's Pizzeria to Go!
summary: Top, bake, and serve pizzas in Papa's Pizzeria To Go!

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Special Edition
summary:
Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Special Edition is a physical boxed release of the game that includes 3 in-game bonus items (also known as pre-order bonus): 
 
- Expert's Hat 
- Mesmerizing Necklace 
- Owlcat Pet

name: Papa's Hot Doggeria
summary:
Papa's Hot Doggeria is a home run!

It's opening day at Griller Stadium but the season tickets are all sold out! Looks like the only way to watch the games is to work for your old pal Papa Louie.

In Papa's Hot Doggeria you'll need to grill up juicy Hot Dogs, top them with a variety of condiments, and serve them to all the rowdy fans. You'll also have your hands full popping up fresh popcorn, and pouring a crazy amount of drinks for your hungry customers. Meet all new faces, cheer on your favorite team, and even take a swing in the Home Run Derby!

name: Paint Bowl
summary: Fast Downhill Bowling!

name: Paintey
summary:
Paintey is a freeform do whatever you want painting simulator! 
You can paint everything from your face to the entire environment.

name: Panelki
summary: A utility worker earns for a ticket to leave the endless Siberian city of panel houses. Permafrost, day/night cycle, dynamic weather and open world. Feel the atmosphere of the northern city, having been in the role of a handyman.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku 5
summary: The fifth entry in the Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku series.

name: Paint By Numbers: Cooking Time! Ep. 2
summary: Time to cook! Paint by numbers and uncover images of delicious meals!

name: Panda Lu Baby Bear World - New Pet Care Adventure
Paradise Beach Girls
summary: A relaxing Visual Novel in which you meet and talk with 5 different girls on a vacation in Miami.

name: Parlor! Mini 6
summary: Parlor! Mini 6 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Paddle Up
summary: Paddle up with online multiplayer, robots, complete challenges or train your table tennis skills. This is the ultimate ping pong experience for VR.

name: Painting Mel-chan
summary:
One day, the Jewel of Time was suddenly stolen by someone, threatening an end to time itself. Cottonland is in big trouble, and now Mel and her black cat Zaza must retrieve the jewel's shards to make things right.

Painting Mel-chan is a maze chase game in the vein of Pac-Man, Crush Roller, and other Golden Age arcade classics. You must move over each entire stage to paint it completely, all while avoiding or magically removing enemies. The game features several boss and bonus stages, plus a shop accessible between stages for replenishing your health-bar and obtaining power-ups.

name: Patch Catch
summary: You should find 5 differences between 2 pictures before the time runs out! The classic game returns with awesome high quality pics and game center leaderboards! Be quick to get combo points, and show the world who is the master of photo hunting games!!

name: Paperback Vol. 2
summary: Word-building meets deck-building in the unique game Paperback Vol. 2

name: Park Control Simulator
summary: Park Control Simulator is a parking space management game. Take care of cleanliness, improve the parking space and please the visitors. Are you ready to build and manage the most beautiful park in the city?

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 8
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 8 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 8 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: PacMax Classics
summary: Compilation of Pac-Man clones.

name: Pax Nova
summary: A sci-fi turn-based 4X strategy game where you lead the fate of one of several factions divided between three races. Explore new worlds and new star systems filled with exciting secrets as well as new dangers. Build new cities, expand your influence and fight great battles on land and in space.

name: Paranormal Flipper
summary: House renovation game but houses are haunted! Find cheap houses, buy, renovate, clean and sell them with a good profit. Spend your money for better equipment and bigger houses. But you need to stay sane, because most of houses are full of dangers and creepy creatures.

name: Paper Ninja
summary:
Who says paper cuts can’t kill?

Each ball of paper bouncing up to you will unravel a swift and deadly ninja waiting to slice you up.

Swipe your finger across the screen to slash the paper ninjas before they get to you!

name: Panzer Campaigns: Stalingrad '42 Gold
summary: Toward the end of 1942, the German High Command saw that the tide on the East Front had reached its peak. After the setback in front of Moscow in 1941, the mighty German Army surged forward again in the summer of '42. After defeating an ill-fated Soviet summer offensive at Kharkov in May, they drove onward to the outskirts of Stalingrad by the late summer of that year. This is where the Stalingrad '42 game picks up the fight, including a number of scenarios covering the drive to the Volga. After several months of bloody house to house fighting in the fall, the Soviet positions were reduced to pockets of rubble, barely 300 meters from the Volga. As the season turned to winter, Hitler remained fixated on taking the city, ultimately leading to disaster for his troops. He had badly underestimated the Soviet army's ability to mount an offensive on his flanks. The Russians cut through weak, poorly equipped, Rumanian troops and encircled the entire Sixth Army. In Stalingrad '42 you can re-fight this titanic struggle, exploring both the historical situation in addition to a number of plausible "What If" situations; a German retreat, a corseted flank defense, or a powerful panzer rescue force made available had Rommel been successful at El Alamein.

name: Parascientific Escape: Crossing at the Farthest Horizon
summary: The fusion of puzzle solving escape game and command selection adventure game - Parascientific Escape series Vol.3 - is here!

name: Paperboy
summary:
Paperboy is an arcade action game developed and published by Atari Games and Midway Games, and released in 1985. The player takes the role of a paperboy who delivers a fictional newspaper called The Daily Sun along a suburban street on his bicycle. The arcade version of the game featured bike handlebars as the controller.

The game was ported to many home systems beginning in 1986. A sequel for home computers and consoles, Paperboy 2, was released in 1991.

name: Partia
summary: Partia is a SRPG (Strategy Role-playing) video game inspired by Fire Emblem and Tear Ring Saga series. In a high fantasy setting, the game will take players through an adventure where magic and sword collide and friendship and betrayal intertwine.

name: Pane in the Glass
summary: Pane In The Glass takes the genre of VR window washing to new EXTREME heights! Grab your sponge and squeegee, then soak up the fast and frantic action as you splash, wipe and squeak your way up the ever increasing tower of windows!

name: Pactum + Episode 1
summary: Explore all the different routes of Pactum! Try to discover more about what really happened. Learn more about each character by picking between some... story-changing choices!

name: Park After Dark
summary:
Park After Dark is is an erotic parody game created as a hobby by fans for fans

When you are granted a magic pen with the ability to rewrite reality, you immediately begin creating your very own theme park...and filling it with sexy princesses!
Manage your time between visiting the girls and growing your park!

name: Paper-io
summary: Paper-io

name: PanChira Concentration
summary: Turn over pairs of matching pantsu and compete on the speed of complete!

name: Papa's Sushiria
summary:
Slice and serve the most delectable sushi around in Papa's Sushiria.

Your day takes a turn for the worse when you break Papa Louie's lucky cat statue. Is this to blame for the restaurant's underwhelming opening day? All we know is that Papa Louie left on a wild-eyed mission and you're now stuck running the restaurant. Can you turn your luck around and master the fine art of sushi making?

Perfectly cook, season, and spread the rice with the all-in-one "Sushi Square". Then fill, roll, and top the sushi with a huge assortment of brand-new ingredients. Finish it off by cutting the sushi into bite-size morsels for your hungry customers.

Bring in the bubbles! Papa's Sushiria also has Bubble Tea to serve alongside the sushi. Mix the flavored teas with milk then add tapioca pearls or one of the many other deliciously flavored bubbles.

Missing your favorite customer? Why not send them some coupons with the help of your friendly mailman, Vincent! Customers love a good deal, and will promptly arrive to order more food. Coupons are great for completing quests and strategically leveling up customers!

name: Pangya M
summary: A redevelopment version of PangYa Mobile. Planned to release as a cross-platform game between the mobile version and PC version in NCSoft Purple platform.

name: Particulars
summary: Particulars is a game with a unique combination of arcade-action and puzzle gameplay, set in the mysterious world of subatomic particles. Taking control of a single quark, you must negotiate the fundamental forces of the universe. Other particles will push and pull at you - you'll always be on the brink of losing control and being dragged towards annihilation.

name: Paranormalized
summary: Paranormalized is a psychological horror game, designed to catch ghosts in breathtaking situations. Squad up with up to 4 of your friends and terminate one of them. In the game, 1 player haunts the spooky locations, while the others hunt it down.

name: Password
summary: During a secluded mansion vacation, Dave and his friends are offered the contents of a mysterious password-locked vault if they are able to find the Zodiac medals hidden throughout the estate. Each friend, however, holds secrets from their past that threaten to bring the trip—and each other's lives—to a tragic end in this mystery/thriller visual novel.

name: Pair-a-Site
summary: Welcome to Pair-a-Site, the dating website of the future! But you aren't here for love. Take on the role of an alien computer virus who can control the minds of anyone they attract! Your end goal? The president of the world.

name: Pac-Laby 3D
summary: Pac-Laby3D is a simple, fun and very addictive game: the goal is to find all pellets in a maze. The maze is a ramdom construction and composed of 1 to 3 floors. The maze grows at each level, some pellets give options.

name: Parasite Star
summary: A cute, surreal action-adventure game with horror elements

name: Pa-nap
summary: A little Yume Nikki-inspired fan game made in 7 days for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: PartyLine VR
summary: Welcome to the party! Have you ever wished your friends could join in the fun of VR? Partyline VR is a collection of virtual reality experiences where up to 8 people can use their smart-phones/tablets/computers and join in the fun. No app download required!

name: Paint Desk Simulator
summary: Welcome to Paint Desk Simulator! In this game, you own a small paint-mixing company. As you rise through the ranks, you will start to be able to automate the paint mixing process. You need to strategize your days and always think ahead. Good luck, and all hail Radiant.

name: PartySparkers
summary: Use your phones as controllers to play these 3 fantastic Party Games in one! Trivia game Bajillions, (2-20 players) Improv game Unrealty, (3-7) and the bluffing game Little Stinkers (2-6) are all here to give your next game night a spark! Works great in-person or online.

name: Panzers on the Steppe
summary: A fast-paced WWII Eastern Front campaign game that simulates the titanic clashes of armor and armies across the Russian steppe from Finland to the Caucasus mountains. The game does all the logistics so you can focus on strategy and tactics.

name: Page One
summary: A beach, a house, the howling rain and a mystery to uncover. Playable in both desktop and VR take control of the first chapter of this 360 degree hand drawn adventure.

name: Parking Star 3D
summary: This is a leisure game that simulates real parking. It's a parking game.

name: Payday 2: Crude Awakening Heist
summary: Alice Rainey is on the run, she's currently hiding out at one of her business enterprises in the Gulf of Mexico. And like many have been made to learn before her, one does not simply hide from the Payday gang.

name: Payday 2: Street Smart Tailor Pack
summary: Our new mission in Texas from gun runner Gemma McShay brings us to the heart of Dallas, we want to make sure to look our best, and to look our best - we need to look Street Smart.

name: Paro Paro
summary: A Free Doujin parody/fangame of the parodius series of shmups.

name: PachiPara Slot+ Pachi-Slot Daiku no Gen-san: Ikuze! Honō no Gen Matsuri-hen
Pachio-kun Special 3
summary: Pachio-kun Special 3 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Marionette and published by Coconuts Japan, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Pass the Pigs
summary: This game is based on a classic "push your luck" dice game.

name: Panel Flux
summary:
The classic match-3 puzzle game, now with unlimited content! Generate puzzles across a wide range of difficulty settings, and share the coolest ones with your friends!

The gameplay is based on the Panel de Pon series. Swap blocks horizontally, and match 3 in a row or column to make them disappear. Try to clear the entire board with your limited number of moves!

name: Parfait Remake: Complete Limited Edition
summary:
Parfait Remake is a Bishoujo romance visual novel about two cafes competing for business. It is also a remake of Parfait: Chocolat Second Brew.

The Complete Limited Edition of Parfait Remake comes with:
- copy of Parfait Remake
- Especially drawn B2 tapestry
- Special visual booklet
- Lycee Overture PR Card

name: Pace Chasers
summary: Join the ranks of the Pace Chasers, a league of interdimensional speedsters, as they travel through time and space on a grand tour of races to become the fastest beings in the universe.

name: Patou
summary: When Kit finds herself all alone in a dream-like world, giant dog Patou comes along. On their journey home, strange creatures and lonely spirits await, guarding ruins of memories buried deep.

name: Pac-Man
summary:
The original Pac-Man game has been released free-to-play on Android and GameStick, with additional tournament levels purchasable.

The game was first released as "Pac-Man + Tournaments", being later renamed to "Pac-Man".

name: Patchy's Magical Maze
summary:
A seamless blend of first person dungeon crawling with fast-paced action RPG combat, explore the magical maze as Alice while fighting off foes as her doll, Shanghai.

Project made for Touhou Pride Game Jam 4.

name: Pavephobia
summary: Pavephobia is an action game where you decide how the level builds up. You choose whether you want to encounter a trap or an enemy next. It's up to you. You want to know more? Then go to Pavephobia!

name: Painting Christmas with Tito
summary: Santa Claus and Tito have come to you with great gifts. Wonder coloring that will delight the little ones. Prepare your pencils, your paint cans, paint and get as close as you can drawings to the original models. 3D animations, pencils and brushes to shade, paint bucket to fill fast. Great performance and amazing speed painting.

name: Paralysis
summary: Paralysis is an asymmetrical (4 versus 1) first person horror game in which four survivors use teamwork to evade the player controlled creature. The creature uses their vision to track down and take out the survivors while they attempt to outsmart it.

name: Parlor! Mini 2
summary: Parlor! Mini 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Passive Income
summary: Passive Income is an idle-ish simulator game where you can build houses, get upgrades, and gain money over time! Chill out and relax as you rip rent out of little cartoon people's pockets. Grow your passive income now!

name: Palavras Cruzadas: O Globo
summary: Crossword made for the journalistic website "O Globo".

name: Pata
summary: This is a tower climbing game, which emphasizes strategy.

name: Patience Playdate
summary: A playdate game where you take care of a bonsai

name: Parfum Nostalgique
summary: Parfum Nostalgique is a heartfelt tale about the people who change us, for better and for worse. From betrayal to unconditional love, from regret to hope… see the drama unfold between exes and lovers, old friends and new, when you dive into this kinetic visual novel dram-com series. With delicate vintage shoujo-inspired art, original soundtrack, and a diverse cast of voice actors, Parfum Nostalgique is a lovingly handmade passion project packaged with sweets and scented with roses by sole developer Prince Rosalium for your reading pleasure.

name: Path to the Devil
summary: A replayable rouge like deck building game in an RPG environment. Travel down a path across an island to face the devil. Build a strong deck on the way by taking out the devil's mercenary army and completing various non combatant encounters.

name: Papa's Freezeria to Go!
summary:
Build and serve sundaes on the go with this brand-new version of Papa's Freezeria, with gameplay and controls reimagined for iPhone and iPod Touch!

You've just started a relaxing summer job at an oceanfront ice cream shop, but things get hectic when all of Papa Louie's customers arrive on the island! You'll need to whip up delicious Freezer sundaes by pouring ice cream, adding mixables and syrups, blending sundaes, adding whipped cream and toppings, and don't forget the cherry on top for a perfect summertime treat!

You'll need to multitask between each area of the restaurant, with new controls designed to work just right in the palm of your hand.

name: PaintOut!
summary:
- Take an art break! -
A unique mono-color art puzzle game!
Relax with some piano, art, and puzzles!

name: Patchwork Beast
summary: A seemingly sentient beast made of haphazardly welded parts has awakened and is rotting the forest from the inside out with metallic Corrosion. You are a visiting traveler who may be the key to stopping this evil before it turns the land barren. Can you stop the Corrosion before it's too late?

name: Pacific Strike
summary: Pacific Strike is a 1994 WWII flight simulation game by Origin Systems.

name: Paranormal Pop
summary:
Pop, Blast and Banish Ghosts!
The intrepid ghost hunter McGrimsby needs your help! A sinister entity has come to haunt the shady town of Spookshire! Pop your way to the heart of the matter and figure out who’s unleashed all of these ghosts!
Paranormal Pop is a Match-3 ghost busting game with more than one twist, including unique gameplay, missions and special hidden bonus levels! Meet wicked companions, and deliciously evil bosses in this first chapter in the Spooktacular world or Paranormal Pop!

name: Paranormal Simulator
summary: As a paranormal investigator, your job is to discover the magical properties of anomalous items and find creative ways to use them against supernatural creatures. Without accidentally being abducted by a dark entity or suffering a bizarre anomalous effect, of course!

name: Pamoja Mtaani
summary: An educational game designed to make children in Nairobi aware of aids.

name: Panzer Crew VR
summary: A multiplayer tank deathmatch game where each tank is manned by three players: the commander, the driver and the gunner. Up to four tanks can battle for a total of 12 players. Can your crew work as a unit or will you devolve into chaos and be annihilated?

name: Paramedium: A Noise in the Attic
summary: Spend the night as a Paramedium Cleric and see if you have what it takes to survive.

name: Pandora Project: The Logic Master
summary: Pandora Project: The Logic Master is a Strategy game, developed by NK System and published by Team Bughouse, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Panzer Corps: Grand Campaign - '40
summary: May 10th, 1940The Maginot Line, shield of France and the battleship on land, was supposed to be impenetrable, but the Germans have a secret and daring plan aimed to topple their old enemy! Import your experienced troops from the first campaign, or start with a pre-generated brand new core and lead your forces to victory.

name: Pagliacci
summary: Slasher game where you kill people as a clown.

name: Paracelsus no Maken
summary: A horror themed dungeon crawler, and sequel to Laplace no Ma, released in 1994 on the NEC PC-98 by Humming Bird Soft. Travel across Europe to fight various secret societies, vampires, werewolves, and other monsters and uncover a dark conspiracy that could spell the end of the world.

name: Pandemia: Virus Outbreak
summary: Swipe cards to face the deadly virus threat in this story driven strategy game. Step into the world in which you will face the decisions that world leaders make in the event of a deadly virus threat. Every decision have consequences.

name: Paradise Lofts
summary: PARADISE LOFTS is a slow-burning, noir, hardcore sex romp, set in the fictitious town of Paradise in 1958. A visual novel, point-and-click adventure, with loads of mini-games, crazy characters, and multiple solutions to challenges. 8 - 12 hrs.

name: Pac-In-Time
summary: The game takes place on a huge island separated into eight regions: Desert, Lagoon, Forest, Pyramids, Mountains, Factory, Village, and the Castle. When you manage to get through them, the last one awaits: The Machine which seems to be some sort of a way to get out of here. This level is not a typical stage after stage approach. Each screen has several exits that can either bring you closer to, or further from the end of the game.

name: Pandora's Palace
summary: Taking on the role of a Roman emperor, replete with white robe and olive leaf head ornament, the player must make his or her way from the top left of the screen to the bottom right, via careful navigation of a variety of poles and moving platforms. Enemies can push the player character into fires or over the edge of platforms if they are not carefully avoided.

name: Pandora's Room
summary: What would happen if you were in the room, the only thing that will be inside is the mysterious red button? Nothing happened, as long as you do not press it. Your choice determines everything here, because the room is full of secrets, and each key has consequences that will determine the outcome of the game is yours. Try all that imagination is enough to unleash the potential of multi-level structure of the Pandora`s room. Make up your mind and be ready for challenges.

name: Pathos: Nethack Codex
summary: Pathos is a roguelike adventure game inspired by the rule set from Nethack. Choose from 13 classes and journey deep into the dungeon. Descend to hell to defeat your nemesis before escaping the dungeon with all the loot you can carry!

name: Packy & Marlon
summary: Packy and Marlon is a platform video game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System released in 1995. It was designed to improve self-care behavior in children with juvenile diabetes. The game achieved some success with treatment groups.

name: Paladins Strike
summary: Paladins Strike

name: Path of Exile: War for the Atlas
summary: An ancient entity known as The Elder has challenged the Shaper's control of the Atlas of Worlds. Explore maps ravaged by their conflict.

name: Pavement Pummel
summary: Welcome to Pavement Pummel, an exhilarating multiplayer physics-based bike racing game. Engage in thrilling races against players worldwide across diverse landscapes. Master the art of strategy, skill, and speed. Navigate through city streets, mountain trails, or off-road terrain.

name: Paranoid: Paranoiac
summary: Paranoiac, the sequel to Paranoid.

name: ParaNormal Commute
summary: (para)Normal Commute makes your everyday sardine-packed commute seem like a refreshing walk along a sunny beach... Solve puzzles and overcome challenges to complete your commute safely in this short first person puzzling journey!

name: Paladins: Feathered Fiend Pack
summary: Hold on tight and get ready for a wild ride across the Realm aboard the Feathered Fiend Mount!

name: Pack Per Duck
summary: Pack per Duck-2d shooter with a change of weapons, go through various levels dodging mines, enemy bullets and suicide bombers, destroy levels, blow up everything around and at the end meet the great and terrible... a rubber duck!

name: Papercraft
summary: A paper world of survival awaits your fingertips. In this 2.5D landscape, craft your chosen tools and weaponry to build your base, mine, chop trees, fish, hunt, cook, farm or, draw your blade to crumple your foes! Manage resources like health, happiness, hunger, water and time with care to survive. But be warned, the challenges of the wild are not as paper-thin as you might think in this pleasant land.

name: Pain in the Arch
summary: Medium-sized underground ruins in Knave style with many tight spaces and initially limited supplies. The map source is included.

name: Panel de Pon GB Restoration
summary: Panel de Pon GB Restoration is a ROMhack/mod of Pokémon Puzzle Challenge which intends to restore the game to its original concept of being a game in the Panel de Pon series.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku 6
summary: The sixth entry in the Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku series. This is the first entry on the PlayStation 2.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Del Sol 2
summary: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Del Sol 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Aruze Corp, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Park Rangers of the Undead
summary: A fun, easy to play combat game where you shoot, blast, or build to your hearts content as you beat wave after wave of zombies.

name: Pachi-Slot Teiou: Dream Slot - Heiwa SP
Patterns of Light
summary: Patterns Of Light is an XNA community game

name: Paint Match
summary:
Color blending puzzle game.
Match target colors by blending paint droplets and enhance your understanding of color theory along the way.
In each level, you are presented with a specific target color and a set of color droplets to mix. Your objective is to recreate the target color as precisely as possible using the provided droplets. Your goal is to replicate the target color as accurately as possible using the available droplets. As you advance, the difficulty escalates, progressively building your intuition and knowledge of color theory.

name: Patches of Adventure
summary: The mayor has declared it's the start of the harvest season festival! To kick it off, he's begun a seed collecting competition! You know just where to find 4 unique seeds that'll win you the contest! Armed with only your knowledge and shovel, you strike out early in the day to begin your quest! Cause you know the more seeds you get, the more powerful you'll become!

name: Palais de Royale
summary: A fandisc for Palais de Reine.

name: pareidolia in █▄██▄▄
summary: angel dressup and selfie simulator with pure love between girls. created for yurijam.

name: Pathos
summary: In PATHOS, a resilient mind is strangled by tragedy and loses its order. Through 150+ puzzles (including some of the hardest ever made for Steam), follow Ego as it works desperately to put back together a brain that’s losing the will to fight.

name: Paper Attack
summary: A VMU game released with Evil Twin: Cyprien's Chronicles.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Papa's Pizzeria
summary: When Papa Louie runs off on another adventure, Delivery Boy Roy is left in charge of Papa's Pizzeria. Unfortunately for Roy, the customers are use to Papa Louie's style of fully custom pizzas. Whether it is 8 pepperonis everywhere and 2 olives on the lower half, or a 10 onion pizza cooked well done and cut in 4 slices, there is no telling what they will come up with. So master the 4 stations and work up the ranks to be the best Pizza Chef around!

name: Painkiller: Special Edition
summary:
A very specific release of Painkiller that only contains 12 levels.
Crank up the intesity as you blast your way through 12 levels of mayhem and more than 75 species of Hell's wildest incarnations. Experience frantic action and wicked weapons: fire your stakegun and pin you enemies to the walls, or lob a grenade to send them flying!

name: Paintball eXtreme
summary: Enter the world of paintball tournaments and challenge players from all around the world. Paintball eXtreme is a fast-paced side-scrolling shooter with cartoony 2,5D graphics, that will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Path of Exile: Sacrifice of the Vaal
PackageRun
summary: A challenging platformer that looks easy to play on the surface. You play as a computer screen defeating enemies, going through hard to navigate levels, defeating bosses and collecting upgrades to get stronger and play better.

name: Partisan
summary:
Our hero, a former Red Army captain, demoted during prewar repressions, finds himself on the frontline. Outnumbered and outgunned by the superior German forces, his battalion was destroyed and his few surviving friends were captured.

Fighting his way through occupied territory, our hero will liberate his comrades, reveal the mysteries of a secret weapon and foil the enemy’s plans.

The storyline brings the hero into contact with NPCs that will help him survive: weapons vendors, allies that will fight on his side and peaceful civilians who provide quests or supply information.

name: Party Poppers
summary: Party Poppers follows in the footsteps of Party Golf and Party Crashers but with the brand new adorable Poppers with the same incredible customisation options and crazy competitive couch gameplay you know and love!

name: Paperboy: Special Delivery
summary: A follow-up to the arcade classic "Paperboy", for iOS and Java-based "feature" phones.

name: PapiJump
summary: PapiJump is a simple (yet addictive) platforming game. Mr. Papi wants to go higher! Tilt your device back and forth to make sure he doesn't fall off of the moving platforms.

name: Pale Abyss
summary: Descend into the Pale Abyss, a cursed chasm where the forgotten truths of a dying world fester in its depths. Inspired by games such as King’s Field and Shadow Tower, Pale Abyss is a first-person action RPG about exploration and adventure.

name: Papi Chocolate
summary:
Let's roll Mr.Papi (red ball guy) and coat him with chocolate!
Use cursor keys to move.

name: Paraplasm: Beyond the Veil
summary: You fell into this cursed house! But will you be able to cope with the paranormal activity? Solve the puzzles and try to find your way out!

name: Party Business Supreme
summary: Collect presents for the big client. Avoid forks that try to eat you, because you are a cake.

name: Parking World: Build & Manage
summary: The hunt for the ultimate parking space will never be more fun than with Parking World. Create your parking garage and carefully manage its operations and staff, overcome dynamic events, use the latest technology, and get ready to discover what perfect parking really looks like. From festival lined grass and mud lots to VIP valet parking and the hustle and bustle of a multistoried airport parking garage, the quest for the ideal space is detailed and varied.

name: PandaMonium: Corporate Carnage
summary:
Play as Panda Headed Serial Killer Jacob Jakushi as he knives his way through the offices of Killmore & Percival, dispatching Yuppies and taking Strippers as payment in this brand new adventure which promise all kinds of Corporate Carnage.

Based on the Indie Horror hit Pandamonium, Pandamonium: Corporate Carnage adapts the movies story whilst leaving into the wacky nature of 80's and 90's movie game adaptions and pushing the films narratives to new. absurd places.

name: Panqueca & Paçoca: A Friendship Jigsaw
summary: The friendship's love between Pancake and Paçoca. Discover a true friendship story between two distant friends in this innovative puzzle game , told in 5 handmade illustrated scenes. Have a calm and relaxing experience.

name: Pancake Bar Tycoon: Extended Edition
summary: Do you like pancakes? Enjoy their taste? Do you want to make them yourself? Well... why not give it a try? Let's make one right away! Scoop up some pancake batter and drizzle it on a frying pan. Watch as it turns golden brown.

name: Pallas of Vines
summary: Pallas of Vines is a revolutionary musical adventure. An epic journey of myth and magic into the radiant heart of a musical world.

name: Parmesan
summary: an 8-bit story about a non-binary person being bullied for being who they are

name: Panzer Panic
summary: Using the touch screen, maneuver your tanks as you face off against an enemy squad of tanks. This game requires a combination of both strategy and skill.

name: Pachio-kun 4
summary:
Pachio-kun returns for a fourth outing on the Famicom.

Pachio-kun 4 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Color Dreams and published by Coconuts Japan, which was released in Japan in 1991.

name: Paimordle
summary: Paimordle is a Genshin Impact themed version of Wordle.

name: Paper Bum
summary: A feral dog tries to survive in a hostile world. The dog doesn’t trust anyone and maybe there is a reason for that. There are two ways: to become a wolf or to give people a chance. Paper Bum is a dark adventure resembling a sad child’s drawings.

name: Pathstow Mystery VR
summary: Pathstow Mystery VR is a mystic adventure game with a touch of horror and built from the ground up for VR. Created as a SteamVR exclusive it uses all advantages of Room-scale and SteamVR controllers.

name: Path of Destruction
summary: Face other opponents inside a unknow labyrinth. Follow the path to no where or destroy the walls to give a end for your enemies. Path of Destruction is a top-down 2D multiplayer PVP focused game.

name: Paper Shakespeare: To Date or Not to Date? - Charity Scene: Seriously, Why Are There Still Nazis?
summary: Fight robot Nazis. All sales go towards Southern Poverty Law Center, Can't Do Nothing, and Water.org.

name: Path to Light
summary: Have you seen my light?

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 3
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 9 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 9 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Panzer Corps: U.S. Corps '42
summary: The first instalment of a mega campaign covering the entire African and European campaigns of the United States. Carry over your troops to US Corps '43 and US Corps '44-'45!

name: Palamedes
summary: A puzzle game by Taito.

name: Pathways
summary: Pathways puts you in the shoes of a curious young boy looking for adventure. It's up to you to navigate through challenging and brain stimulating pathways in order to find your missing friend! Seventy-five addicting levels, each progressively harder than the last, will leave you scratching your head as you make your way towards the climactic ending. Along with a host of puzzles, the original soundtrack and appealing art style will keep you grooving as you travel through deep dark dungeons filled with new adventure and mystery around every corner.

name: Pakapow Party
summary: Pakapow Party is an online board game for 1–4 players, where you’ll go on an adventure to protect villages from invading monsters and explore strange, unpredictable stories. You could end up becoming an ultrarich tycoon but beware, your teammates might just turn you into a poor wanderer

name: Panama Canal
summary: Drive Real 1:1 Scale Ships Thru The World-Infamous Panama Canal!

name: Palace of sky
summary: 突如其来的变故打破了山村的宁静， 一名不速之客的到来，造成相依为命的爷爷亡故。 为此，一名原本应该平凡的少年，为了替爷爷报仇，踏上了修行之路。 随着对事情的调查深入，他逐渐解除到了传送中的东西——九霄仙阙。

name: Palpable
summary: Using photogrammetry we have converted every single frame of a claymation into an animated stop motion game character. Exploring the possibilities of maintaining the tactile and morphable qualities of clay togheter with the felxibility of an interactive 3D space.

name: Pacific Rim: Breach Wars
summary: Epic Puzzle Action RPG for PACIFIC RIM fans! Command your own Shatterdome base and defend your district with human-piloted mechs called Jaegers against monsters from the breaches known as Kaiju.

name: Paradise Tomb
summary: Explore Islands and treacherous underground of Paradise Tomb in short 2D action platformer.

name: Parking Dash
summary: Like Diner Dash but parking!

name: Paratives
summary: Paratives is a 1-4 players ghost hunting indie horror game where you'll have to use your detective skills to gather clues and evidences. Paratives offers a thrilling and immersive experience that will test your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Park Beyond: Chicken Run - Dawn of the Nugget: Theme World
summary:
Welcome the Chickens to Park Beyond! Decorate your dream park in the style of Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget, with new scenery items, flat rides, entertainers, two new maps and more.
Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget - Theme World includes the following content:
• 13 Building Prefabs
• 280+ Scenery Objects
• 6 Animatronics
• 2 Flat Rides & their Impossification
• 3 Entertainers
• 1 Track Type
• 6 Coaster Cars
• 2 Modules
• 2 Sandbox Maps

name: Pac-Man S
summary: A unique variation of the Pac-Man formula that features time as Pac-Man's greatest challenge.

name: Papi Commando: Second Blood
summary:
Papi (Grandpa) is back and angrier than ever! Help him find his beloved Commostrad, alone or in co-op mode with his wife, Mami (Grandma) Commando. 
 
Fight the terrible C++ forces through more than 100 missions across 10 stages until the final battle against the infamous Colonel KassTaGoul (also known as Colonel BreakYaFace)!

name: Parking 3D
summary: Parking 3D is an amazing car parking simulator where you have to park different cars with highest precision!

name: Pac-Man
summary: Tomy LSI Game Pac-Man is a handheld LCD game released by Tomy in 1981. It is a conversion of the original arcade Pac-Man from 1980.

name: Path of Exile: Crucible
summary:
In Path of Exile: Crucible, you'll learn about the ancient titans who once shaped the primordial surface of Wraeclast. If you're powerful enough, you will earn the ability to forge their power onto your weapons.

Our April expansion introduces the Crucible challenge league, nine new Vaal Skills, Atlas Gateways, over ten new Unique Items and improvements to Breach, Abyss, Passive Tree Masteries, the Saboteur, the Pathfinder, Ruthless and much more!

name: Pac-Man Doom
summary: Pac-Man Doom is a 12-map adventure, where you run around mazes and other exotic locations in search of Pac-Dots. Lots of custom sprites immerse you in a world that is both Doom and Pac-Man at once. The 12 maps span a wide variety of locations: from taking you deep inside a computer mainframe and a haunted mansion, to a lush green hedge maze and a beach resort. Keep running and make sure to take care of those Ghost Pinkies!

name: Panda Craze
summary: Help Tik-Ling make it home to her Bamboo Forest in this action-puzzler! Evil Zoo Keepers keep popping up all over the place trying to capture her. Can you help her escape? Seventy-five levels of classic arcade action challenges both your reflexes and your creativity as you use quick moves and tools to slip away from those dastardly Zoo Keepers!

name: Panda Eat Bamboo
summary: Escape the busy pace of life and immerse yourself in the calming embrace of nature with our delightful healing game. Spend quality time with charming pandas, de-stress, and rediscover your peace of mind.

name: Party Demon
summary: Party Demon is a tower defense, deck-building game where your main goal is to protect a Lady Demon’s birthday party from human intruders. Build your castle on a budget and defend it in real time with a deadly Trap Deck full of demonic weapons.

name: Paint Car Derby
summary: A game that involves driving around, painting the ground, and battling it out with other drivers. Happy racing!

name: Party Party Time + Party Harder Pack
summary:
10 brand new head-to-head mini games! Get the gang together and keep the party going!

The Party Harder Pack includes the following content:

10 New Minigames:
- Twirling Disks
- Robot Watch
- Go Go Race
- Conveyor Run
- Punch Fighter
- Boot the Bomb
- Air Hockey Rumble
- Block Slicer
- Escape Zone
- Labyrinth Escape

name: Past Synergy
summary: Past Synergy is a 2 player co-op game that tests you and your friend's synergy. Divide the ability and roles between you and your friend to overcome the obstacles in a cave that appears in your dream every night.

name: Pachi Para 16 ~Silver Shining Paradise 2~
summary: Someday we'll all fly away to that great pachi paradise in the sky. Until then, there's always this PlayStation 3 game.

name: Payday 2: The Charlie Santa Heist
summary: The Charlie Santa Heist is the first annual OVERKILL Xmas heist for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do a classic bank job - robbing the GO Bank, based on a map from Counterstrike: Global Offensive, in the outskirts of Washington D.C. This heist was a part of update 20 and is completely free for our players.

name: Pax Britannica: An Imperial Timeline
summary: Welcome to Pax Britannica: An Imperial Timeline, an alternate history science fiction mod for Hearts of Iron 4.

name: Pablo Let's Go Bar
summary: A co-op roguelike FPS game where the player has to get through the map by killing enemies in his way, picking up random weapons, and gaining random perks. He fights his way from street to street to get to the bar, bring some friends or go it alone and enjoy a hell of a journey.

name: Par 1 Golf 5
summary: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 5! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The fifth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: Pastel
summary: Pastel is a Single-Player 3D Adventure Puzzle Game. Play as Pastel, a nine-tailed fox who has just woken up in an overgrown forest with no memory of who she is or how she got there. You will need to travel through time to recover her memories and prevent a great calamity from taking place.

name: Pancake Bar Tycoon: Premium Edition
summary: This bundle includes base game and expansion pack #2 with 20 new levels.

name: Pangaroids
summary: Destroy the deadly bouncing orbs for the highest score in this Pang meets Asteroids arcade blaster.

name: ParanoiaScape
summary: Paranoia Scape is a first person action pinball game that features the designs and sounds of Screaming Mad George. The gameplay is about going around each creepy stage of the game using the ball to destroy the enemies.

name: Palette
summary: Paint, create, contemplate.

name: Paris Saint-Germain Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Dai-hanabi
summary: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Oohanabi is a Pachi-Slot simulation game developed and published by Aruze for Neo Geo Pocket Color.

name: Pandara
summary: Simple 2D scrolling shooter. Japanese and English story.

name: Paddle Baddle
summary: A twist on the classic block breaking gameplay, Paddle Baddle is a multiplayer Arkanoid style game.

name: Pallanda
summary: A digital board game for DOS for up to four players.

name: Parasite
summary: Parasite is a non-linear retro platformer with a mix of action and puzzles. The player controls an alien worm wanting to get rid of a human space colony on his planet. There are multiple shapes to unlock and to switch between to facilitate the navigation and sabotage the complex.

name: Palace Charitas
summary: Palace Charitas is a reasonably small, intermittently detailed gentleman's club of sorts.

name: Pancake House
summary: Pancake House is a VR first-person shooting game. If you want to survive and save the world, you must defeat zombies.

name: Patchwork
summary:
It's a big day for Daniel - he's about to test a teleportation device he's been building for the last few years. 
 
Will everything go as planned, resulting in a stunning breakthrough in modern science, or is he, as it so often happens in situations like this, going to end up in a parallel universe, where magic and fairies are pretty common, while cell phones and sneakers aren't?

name: Palworld: Pokémon Mod
summary: A mod for Palworld which changes many models from the game to Pokémon characters. It was taken down by Nintendo due to copyright infringement.

name: Paratopic + Urban Flow
summary:
Experience two unique and captivating games with the Paratopic + Urban Flow bundle on Xbox:

Paratopic - Enter a fever dream world with Paratopic, an experimental horror game that takes you on a thrilling narrative-driven adventure. Unravel the stories of three characters through numerous vignettes and explore the detritus of forbidden industry.

Urban Flow - Control the traffic lights and ensure that everything runs smoothly in Urban Flow, a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. With over 150 levels and local co-op mode, Urban Flow offers hours of entertainment for players of all ages.

Discover the subtle beauty of city streets and unravel thrilling stories with the Paratopic + Urban Flow bundle on Xbox. Don't wait any longer, grab your copy today and experience the best of both worlds!

name: Paper io 2: Mishmash DLC
summary:
Conquer new maps with your friends in mishmash skins!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 13 diverse skins: bus, burger, donut, poop, toilet, ufo, robot, ninja, santa, crab, car, police car, airplane
- 5 hats: widget, "truck" cap, helmet with horns, apple with an arrow, witch hat
- 9 custom game maps in the form of a: car, boat, poop, sport bike, cruiser, scooter, headphones, teddy bear, crown
- 10000 coins

Put on funny mishmash skins, change the look of your territory and take over new custom maps!

name: Pancar
summary: PANCAR - Game for the Kenney Jam 2021

name: Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It's Dark Outside
summary:
Sam is an ordinary kid who, with the help of his red cape, turns into "superhero" Pajama Sam. In No Need to Hide When It’s Dark Outside, Pajama Sam journeys into the land of darkness to face his fears. Help Pajama Sam figure out who or what is behind the darkness and realize that there is no need to hide when it’s dark outside!
Think, listen, explore - fun learning encourages critical thinking, fosters listening and memory skills, and reinforces good social skills.

name: Pair Up
summary:
Three is a crowd. Match two instead!

Tap on a sticker, find its pair, and it just feels so good.
Pair Up is a deeply satisfying match-two game that presents a treat for the eyes and tickles the brain. A perfect little puzzle game on the go or whenever you just need a little escape. Pair Up also has unlockable themes to suit any mood or craving you might have - cute animals, mouth-watering food, whatever floats your boat.

name: Parlour Games
summary: Choose from the exciting challenges and action of Billiards, Darts or World Bingo! In Billiards, choose nine-ball or rotation. Play the Dart games 301 or 501. Or test your luck in a high-stakes game of World Bingo.

name: Papa's Freezeria HD
summary:
In this new edition of Papa's Freezeria, you'll be working at an oceanfront ice cream shop on Calypso Island, but your laid-back summer job gets hectic when all of Papa Louie's customers arrive on the island! You'll need to serve up delicious Freezer sundaes by pouring ice cream, blending mixable candies and syrups, adding whipped cream and toppings, and don't forget a cherry on top for that perfect summertime treat!

This latest game features dozens of syrups, candies, and toppings that unlock as you play, and a variety of new and returning customers looking to beat the heat with your ice cream sundaes. The time-management and hands-on gameplay seen in "Papa's Burgeria" is back, with plenty of new twists for serving ice cream treats. You'll need to watch the lobby for new customers arriving, add ice cream and goodies to sundae cups, keep an eye on the blenders mixing your ingredients, and add toppings and syrups before serving the sundae to your wacky customers.

This updated version of Papa's Freezeria features dozens of customers not found in previous editions of the game, as well as DOUBLING the amount of unlockable ingredients found in the original! We've also added new touch controls to make building and topping sundaes easier and more enjoyable on tablets.

You can choose to play as Penny or Alberto, or you can now design your own custom character to work in the Freezeria! Create a boy or a girl, with dozens of hairstyles, hair colors, skin tones, and facial expressions. You can even adjust your head size, neck, eye and mouth positions to make your character look just right.

You can also buy and earn new clothing for your worker, by playing Foodini's Mini-Games or visiting the Shop! Browse through hundreds of shirts, jackets, hats, pants, and accessories to give your worker that perfect look.

Play new Mini-Games like "Saucy Shot" and "Mitch's Mess" after each workday to earn new furniture for your Shop and new clothing for your worker!

The customizable lobby from Papa's Burgeria is back, now with various themes of new posters and furniture, and an easy way to change your trim and countertop colors in the shop!

You can also earn 100 achievements for completing various tasks in the game, including serving sundaes with certain mixables and toppings, earning bonuses on the Build Station, playing mini-games, and earning Customer Awards. Papa's Freezeria HD also supports Game Center achievements and leaderboards!

name: Parkdens
summary: Parkdens is a minimalistic and relaxing nature park building game where you can place tiles and choose variety of objects ranging from statues, sitting areas, shelters to bushes, playgrounds, trees etc. to populate the placed tiles.

name: PaintballX
summary: PaintballX is an online mutliplayer FPS paintball game! Battle your friends in a casual paintball FPS!

name: Pagodia
summary: Pagodia is a vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring varied, japan-inspired settings. The wad is split into 3 distinct themes: Village, Techno-shrine, and Cyberpunk City. Difficulties are implemented. Mouselook, jumping, and crouching should be disabled if you're playing on a port with those features.

name: PakPak Monster
summary: Seventh game released for the Epoch Cassette Vision, despite being labelled game six, due to a delay during production. A clone of Pac-Man but with an unorthodox maze layout using a plus and blocks to make up the arena.

name: Papair
summary: Paper-Styled Game

name: Papa's Pastaria
summary:
Become Portallini's primo pasta chef in Papa's Pastaria!

It's a destination wedding in the waterfront town of Portallini, home of Papa's Pastaria! You're in charge of Papa's newest restaurant, where you'll take orders, cook noodles, and add sauces and toppings to craft a perfect plate of pasta!

name: Paranormal Mutagens: Cargo
summary: Paranormal Mutagens: Cargo is a first-person eldritch horror game. Manage a spacecraft and its passengers while battling eerie anomalies and struggling to survive the chaos unfolding aboard. Can you endure the horrors and complete your mission?

name: Paradox Escape Route
summary: Paradox Escape Route is a Survival Sci-Fi (Turn-Based) RPG that takes place on the Mars Arctic! Pick from 8 different scientists with various skills and gear to fight your way out of the anomaly-ridden Mars Base of Eithode! Engage in a very challenging journey back home using any means necessary.

name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures
summary: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures, known in Japan as Hello! Pac-Man, is a side-scrolling adventure game "sequel" to Pac-Man. Instead of being a maze game like the majority of its predecessors, Pac-Man 2 incorporates light point-and-click adventure game elements. It was produced and published by Namco for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) and Sega Mega Drive/Genesis systems, and was released on April 6, 1994 by Namco. The game borrows its structure and certain elements from Pac-Land, and also appears to contain certain elements from the animated series, such as Pac-Man's family and a main villain commanding the ghosts. The Genesis version was not released in Japan or Europe.

name: Parallels Cross
summary: Discover the surreal experiments that took all of the mansion dwellers to another place. Can you save your son from being a prisoner of the void?

name: Pachio-kun 3: Pachi-Slot & Pachinko
summary: Pachio-kun's third and final PC Engine CD outing has him tackling the world of Pachi-Slot as well as pachinko

name: Palette Swap
summary: A monochrome action platformer where the palette changes the environment around you

name: Path of Exile: War for the Atlas Bundle
summary:
The ultimate starter pack to begin your journey through Wraeclast.
The Seeker Supporter Pack contains an Armour Set, a Cloak, two Weapon Effects and 550 Points.

Earn devastating skills and valuable items as you fight your way through the dark continent of Wraeclast. With unrivaled character customization, Path of Exile is an award-winning online Action RPG created by hardcore gamers, for hardcore gamers.

name: Pac-Gal
summary: An 80's clone of Namco's Pac-Man.

name: Pax Narcotica: Trafficker
summary: Become a cartel boss and take over the US drug trade. Build smuggling networks across the country and negotiate sales with crime groups. Recruit soldiers to protect your shipments and expand your territory. Bribe police and politicians to protect your interests and disrupt your rivals.

name: Parking Mania HD
summary: Parking Mania is a driving and parking game that puts your spatial awareness and dexterity to the ultimate test! Whether you’re behind the wheel of a flash sports car or a cumbersome big-rig, Parking Mania captures that great, ‘easy to learn, hard to master’ gameplay. Take your pick of three unique play styles – tilt your device, swipe a slider, or use a virtual steering wheel – and test your precision, style, and skill in 195 levels, spanning parking lots, city streets, and highways, as well as day and night cycles. With hidden areas and pick-ups, leaderboards and much more, Parking Mania will give you hours upon hours of entertainment. So hold onto your real-life No-Claims Bonus, and channel those insane driving skills into Parking Mania today!

name: Paragon Pioneers 2: Happy Southburghs
summary: Makes all Southburghs in the game smile and supports indie development!

name: Party Party Time 2: Party Spirit Pack
summary: Let's show your Party Spirit! Enjoy 10 new minigames!

name: Paranormal Stories
summary: Assist Esther in this hidden object game, as she helps people with her clairvoyant ability, to solve paranormal crimes... Find hidden objects and play challenging mini games.

name: Paradise Architect
summary: Click to get money. Build buildings, develop the city infrastructure to increase passive income. Keep the infrastructure of the city in working condition by completing quests on time and get bonuses.

name: Papa's Burgeria HD
summary:
Grab your spatula and get ready for a burger-flipping adventure! In this brand-new edition of Papa's Burgeria, you are unwillingly left in charge of Papa Louie's famous Burgeria. You'll need to take orders, grill patties, add toppings, and serve the burgers to all of your wacky customers. 

This hands-on time-management game gives you control at each step of the burger-building process. You'll need to multi-task and juggle between each area of the restaurant: Keep an eye out for customers waiting in the lobby, drag and flip burger patties on the grill to cook them just right, and add toppings and sauces to the sandwiches before serving them to your customers! 

Keep your customers happy to earn more points and level up! As your level rises, you'll unlock new toppings in the shop, and new customers will start visiting the Burgeria! 

** NEW FEATURES ** 

This updated and remastered version of Papa's Burgeria features a variety of new unlockable toppings and sauces, and many new customers not found in previous editions of the game. At the end of each day, you'll also be faced with Closer customers who are very picky about their burgers, and each week you'll be visited by the Food Critic with a chance to earn a tip-boosting Blue Ribbon! 

Use your hard-earned tips to buy restaurant upgrades and hats to wear, and you can also decorate your lobby with furniture and posters from the Furniture Shop. You'll even earn a Pay Day each week, which you can spend on upgrading your Burgeria! 

You'll also be able to earn 70 different achievements for various tasks in the Burgeria, including reaching certain ranks, earning Customer Awards on your customers, playing mini-games, and serving burgers with certain toppings.

** MINI GAMES ** 

As your serve sandwiches to your customers, you'll be rewarded with Game Tickets. At the end of each day, the Great Foodini will arrive with his Traveling Mini-Game Show, where you can use your Game Tickets to play a variety of food-themed Mini Games, and win posters and furniture that you can place in your lobby! 

** GAME FEATURES ** 

- Hands-on burger shop game in the Papa Louie universe 
- Optimized for full-screen gameplay
- Multi-tasking between grilling, stacking, and serving 
- Over 60 customers to unlock with unique orders 
- Over 100 furniture items to buy in the Shop and earn through Mini-Games 
- 70 in-game achievements 
- Various upgrades and hats to purchase with your earned tips 
- Challenging Closers and Food Critic

name: Park the car
summary: "Park the car" is a simple indie game where you will have to park the car in different situations, being able to personalize the car as well.

name: Parafron
summary: Unravel dark secrets, confront inner demons, and shape the haunting narrative in this psychological thriller. Your choices define the gripping, first-person journey - will you unravel the truth or succumb to madness?

name: Paper Shakespeare: The Legend of Rainbow Hollow
summary: Explore a post-apocalyptic world wherein everything and everyone has been turned into a stick figure! Explore newly-formed empires, ride Unicorns, punch Werewolves, and solve the mysteries of the universe!

name: Past the Moon; Towards the Sun
summary: Past the Moon; Towards the Sun is a fantasy visual novel that invites you into a richly woven tale of self-discovery and empowerment. Step into the shoes of Colleen, a young girl filled with apprehension about her future, whose dreams and aspirations seem out of reach.

name: Panels
summary: Puzzle platformer with a dash of metroidvania and a unique panel switching mechanic.

name: Paint Park Plus
summary: Draw, doodle and color anything you like with your PlayStationVita system and Paint Park Plus! Play solo or with your friends via Ad-Hoc mode, add a personal touch to photographs taken with your PS Vita, and Tweet your artwork for the world to see.

name: Path of Zen
summary: Path of Zen, a game that will help you let go of your worries about the past or the future and bring you back to where you are supposed to be, here and now.

name: Pan
summary: Make GOD happy and get three coins from your neighbors by using your very limited communication skills of Hitting, Crying, Imitating Micael or Repeating the last thing the person said.

name: Pale Roots
summary: Work. Earn money. Pay for survival. Speak with crazy characters as tragedy unfolds. You have sixteen weeks before the town ends.

name: Paws of Fury
summary: Become the King of the Cats

name: Panther VR
summary: Plan out your heist, choose your weapons and gadgets and infiltrate the location. Go full stealth or guns blazing, level up, get rich and expand your personal hideout with powerfull weapons, gadgets, and collectibles. Everything can be stolen.

name: Park Beyond: Complete Edition
summary: Park Beyond is a theme park game that gives you complete freedom to create and manage the parks of your dreams! With thousands of options to detail your dream theme park creation, sharing it with the world, exciting rides to thrill your guests, and powerful tools to track every penny that you earn, there's something for everyone! The Complete Edition includes the base game and the entire contents of the Park Beyond Golden Pass.

name: Pan·Gaia
summary: Pan·Gaia is a whole-Earth sandbox fresh outta 1999. Sculpt your planet's climate, balance its ecology, design the perfect species for a niche, and maybe, lead them to sapience. Or... hurl meteors at them.

name: Pandora
summary: "Rpg Maker game, The pandora is the best game for the people who love big tits. It contain 42CG with 50 Moving CG. It also have many minigames. "

name: Pamali: The Vengeful Mother
summary: Pamali: The Vengeful Mother is a 1-4 players online co-op survival horror. Use each character’s unique strengths, strategize with your teammates, do everything you can to save the missing children and escape the abandoned orphanage. Bring your friends!

name: Party Party Time + Character Skin 1 & 2 Pack Set
Panic Lift
summary: In this game the player has to press the button on the exact floor indicated by the elevator occupants.

name: Party Party Time: Party Fever Pack
summary: The party's just getting started! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Get ready for Party Fever, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand new minigames! Invite your friends and keep the party going!

name: Party Party Time: Character Skin Pack 2
summary: Customize your character! Change up your look with over 20 different skins! Be it a ninja, clown, or astronaut, dress up in style and get ready to party!

name: Paperplanes
summary: A Third Person Action Adventure game where you explore the conflicted land of contemporary India in a post climate change crisis as an eighteen year old Hope.

name: Pangya Mobile
summary: PANGYA Mobile is a sports game, where you play Golf. In this game you will find yourself on the magical island of Pangya which was covered by a curse and now your task will be to cleanse the world of evil. Choose a character from the many in the game, by selecting the costumes, clubs and equipment. Choose your style and become a master of the game of Golf. Challenge your competitors in PVP mode and compete with them for the best results. Go through entertaining mini-games and earn rewards.

name: Pac-Man Plus
summary: Pac-Man Plus is an Action game, developed and published by Bally Midway, which was released in 1982. Gameplay is nearly identical the original Pac-Man. However, the game features new gimmicks that make the game harder, such as faster speed, disappearing mazes, and invisible enemies.

name: Pathfinder 08
summary: Pathfinder 08 is a fun and challenging adventure. It is a platform game with a focus on exploration and retro inspiration with some RPG elements.

name: Panthera Frontier
summary: Adventure into space with your starship and crew. Discover amazing new alien species to recruit and train, and find powerful weapons to install on your craft. Uncover unique new ships to pilot and command, engaging in tactical combat where you are the commander of your forces! The vast fantasy universe of Panthera Frontier awaits, commander!

name: Parky and the Yellow Submarine
summary: A 3rd-person perspective action platformer developed for C64.

name: Paraception
summary: A First Person Horror Game

name: Panda Love
summary: You have to play for a panda, collect coins to have enough money for a bouquet of flowers.

name: Pachi-Slot Adventure 3: Bitaoshii 7 Kenzan!
summary: Pachi-Slot Adventure 3: Bitaoshii 7 Kenzan! is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Aisystem Tokyo and published by Coconuts Japan, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Paper.io
summary:
Your goal? To conquer as much territory as possible. It's initially very simple, and the game can be mastered immediately, but watch out: there's competition, and not everyone can win!

Whether you're bold or more careful, you have to be more cunning than your adversaries by finding the best strategy to conquer the most space. But be careful! You have a weak spot: your tail. If an enemy touches it, that's the end for you.

Try to stay ahead, because victory in Paper.io is never certain until you possess all the territory. Stealing is allowed, and your enemies won't hesitate to do so.

name: Pagan Peak VR
summary: A VR escape room thriller that takes you to the darkest corners of the human mind. You will find yourself in a mysterious alpine cabin, captured by the Krampus Killer. Take on the role of a criminal profiler and solve the riddles laid out by the killer, emerging deeper and deeper into his psyche.

name: Payday 2: The Diamond Store Heist
summary: The Diamond Store Heist is the first free heist that was released for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do a classy heist against the Gioielli Di Famiglia jewelry store in downtown Washington D.C.This heist was a part of update 11 and is completely free for our players.

name: Paranormal Psychosis
summary: A first-person horror game set on an island.

name: Pac-Mania
summary: Pac-Mania is a variation on the game Pac-Man. You need to guide Pac-Man around a maze and eat all of the dots on the board to proceed on to the next round. Numerous, multi-colored ghosts also roam the maze trying to stop you. If you eat one of the power pellets in the maze, the ghosts will temporarily turn blue and run from you. Pac-Man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now shown in isometric perspective and is larger than the screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man can now jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid-air collision!

name: Pac-Land
summary: A handheld port of Pac-Land.

name: Pac-Man 256
summary:
Pac-Man 256 is an official hack of the original Pac-Man starting right before Level 256; not to be confused with the 2015 game.

It was only released in Pac-Man Connect and Play.

name: Pac-Man
summary: In 2002, Denki released an obscure port of Pac-Man to Sky Active's now defunct service, Sky Games. The game could only be accessible by either purchasing a Play-to-Play or Game Pass payment.

name: Path of Trials
summary: Save a friend in an exciting platformer with a cat hero! Complete challenges and uncover the story of friendship. Beware of mistakes, plan every jump, and achieve success in this captivating platformer.

name: Pac-Man
summary: The Xbox Live version of Pac-Man is a direct port of the arcade original, but fixes the kill screen on level 256, making the game playable beyond that level. It also adds a score board.

name: Path of Kami
summary: Path of Kami follows the spirit of recently-deceased Japanese wolf Kazeyo as he navigates the trials of the Mortal and Spirit World through puzzles. He is accompanied by Wisp, a wolf spirit embodying both his mother and his more distant ancestors, who is there to guide him on his journey.

name: Pasta Master
summary: Pasta Master is an adventure 2D platformer set in a world where pasta based food is the most popular type of dish. The game follows Jimmy, a man who gets his pasta stolen by a mysterious figure and sets of on an adventure to get it back…

name: Pazaak Cantina
summary: Pazaak is a card game from out of this Galaxy. The goal of Pazaak is to have your cards add up to as close to 20 as possible. If your opponent has a higher score than you, they win. Simple right? Time to put your Credits where your mouth is. Do you have what it takes to be the Pazaak Champ?

name: Path to Octavius
summary: Path to Octavius is a plug-and-play TV game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005 as part of its Marvel game line. It features Spider-Man in an adventure themed around battles with Doctor Octopus. The game connects directly to a television without the need for a separate console. Gameplay consists of side-scrolling action and platforming designed for a casual audience.

name: Pass the wall
summary: Pass the wall is an indie casual game that has the perfect balance between a good and fun gameplay but also challenging and with increasing difficult.

name: Pac'N-Jump
summary: Pac'N-Jump is a vertical platformer featuring Pac-Man and a host of classic Namco cameos

name: Paint Chase
summary:
Rev your engines and color your way to victory in the local paint racing competition.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Particle Wars
summary: Particle wars is a super cool and colorful survival shooter with crazy particle effects, tons of weapons and power-ups! Beat the levels with different approaches and get some great highscores at the infinite mode!

name: Paper Mario Multiplayer
summary: Paper Mario Multiplayer is a ROM hack/mod of Paper Mario (Nintendo 64) developed by SKELUX which adds support for multiplayer, with the second player controlling Mario's partner.

name: Pale Sand, Dark Skies
summary: A walk on the beach with a ghost

name: Payday 3: Chapter 3 - Houston Breakout
summary:
Dallas found his brother, Houston, alive but not safe. On trial for a slew of charges, Houston is injured, about to be sentenced, and sent off to one of Concord’s private prisons, from which he’s bound never to reappear.

Whether you break him out silently or go in guns blazing is up to you, either way, we’re getting our man out.

name: Paramedic Simulator
summary:
Emergency, rescue & first aid. 
 
Get ready for a huge variety of challenges and scenarios - varying difficulty levels and unpredictable weather conditions and technical factors will make your job even harder! Numerous minigames (quizzes, hidden objects, reaction tests) add to the gameplay and make Paramedic Simulator a challenge for the whole family.

name: Pachi-Slot Kanzen Kōryaku: Onihama Bakusō Gurentai - Gekitō-hen
summary: A Pachi-Slot simulation on the PlayStation 2.

name: Pallurikio
summary: A 2D platformer for Wiiware

name: Pachinko With Nick
summary: big pachinko!

name: Papa's Scooperia
summary:
Serve delicious sundaes of cookies and ice cream in Papa's Scooperia!

Your sightseeing trip to the big city is stopped short when you lose all of your money and belongings! Stuck in Oniontown without the money to return home, Papa Louie has a unique solution to your problem: Stay and run his brand-new ice cream shop!

You'll be baking up fresh, gooey cookies for each sundae, then topping them with hand-scooped ice cream in a variety of flavors. Add some sweet syrups and drizzles, pour on decorative shakers and candies, and finish the scoops with toppings before serving the mouth-watering sundaes to your hungry customers. Your customers will start by ordering sundaes with just one cookie and one scoop of ice cream, but as you keep serving them fantastic sundaes, they'll level up and start asking for even larger orders! Watch the sundaes grow and evolve as customers order two-scoop and giant three-scoop platters, with different cookies and different flavors of ice cream on top. Some customers like picky Closers will even start out with larger sundaes.

name: Path of Memory
summary: Path of Memory is a puzzle game where you test your memory, relax and listen to calm musics. Complete the sequence in the right order to uncover the hidden stars in 60 different levels.

name: Parking Cop Simulator
summary: Take on the role of a Parking Enforcement Officer and show your knowledge of parking regulations and laws as you hand out fines to parking violators!

name: Patchwork Image
summary: Patchwork Image - is a logical educational game that develops logic and imagination, where you have to collect patterns of different levels of complexity from geometric shapes of different shapes and sizes.

name: Park Racer
summary: Take control of cute tiny cars, collect coins to unlock new cars and drive your car to victory in this stylish racing game taking place in amusement parks. Drift, slid, skid your bolide to victory in races of 6, competing against skilled bots.

name: Pathologic 2 + Marble Nest DLC Bundle
summary: Get Pathologic 2's Supporter Bundle featuring the main game and Marble Nest DLC to support developers!

name: Panzer Strike
