summary: Authentic RTS gameplay straight out of the 2000s. Command your troops, develop strategies, and win World War II battles. Huge maps, thousands of units, long-range firepower, and no building mechanics!

name: Paradox of the Cryptomancers
summary: Prepare to embark on a journey to solve the enigmatic puzzles of the Cryptomancers. Immerse yourself in an awe-inspiring world where you will need your wits to unlock the ancient mysteries of this haunted realm.

name: Party Party Time 2: Party Hustle Pack
summary: It's time to party hustle! Introducing 10 new minigames!

name: Parkour Tag
summary: Parkour Tag is an online, platforming, PvP game that faces two-players off in a competitive game of tag. Run vertically or horizontally on any wall, jump, double jump, slide, vault and more to outmaneuver your opponent.

name: Paws & Claws Pet Vet: Australian Adventures
summary: Get ready for an adventure at your very own Paws & Claws Pet Vet clinic down under! It’s your job to nurture and love all of the wild animals down under and bring them back to health. Work as a doctor and care for 6 fun loving animals such as koala bears, wombats, dingoes and kangaroos! Be an entrepreneur! Use the profits from your Pet Vet clinic to expand your business and increase your clinic’s capabilities. Hop in your very own vehicle and use your map to locate all the sick animals in the eucalyptus forest, the vast plains or the mountains.

name: Paper Shakespeare: Modern Warfare
summary: Enter a war-torn Rome based on Shakespeare's 'Coriolanus'. Save war-torn Rome based on Shakespeare's 'Coriolanus'. Don't save war-torn Rome based on Shakespeare's 'Coriolanus'. It's really up to you. 50% of sales go towards the Wounded Warrior Project and Feast of Crispian.

name: Party Games
summary: Introducing the "Party Games" bundle - the ultimate collection for unforgettable moments with family and friends!

name: Paintball NET
summary:
After nearly 2 decades, Paintball Net is back! 
 
Play paintball online! Go head to head against players from around the world! Paint each other pink and cyan! Mark up the simple-minded bots so the machines learn who’s boss! Paint the trees, the grass, and the sides of mountains! All without stinging welts, steaming masks, and poison ivy! 
 
Multiplayer, online, and pain free. What more do you want??? 
 
Do you want to play in PVP “battle royales”? Do you want survival games, team games, and more? Do you want to modify your equipment so it fits your style? Do you want sci-fi equipment like infrared scanners and Predator-like refracto suits? Paintball Net has all of that! 
 
Plus, Paintball Net has always been as much a community as a game. So don’t be intimidated by experienced players. Ask questions. Hang out. Make friends. Then paint them funny colors! =) 
 
Originally online from 1996-2000, Paintball Net’s 2D PVP experience predates Google! Windows 95 was still new! I had hair! If you’re looking for a retro-MMO game, Paintball Net has serious 90’s cred. 🙂 
 
If you played back then, there have been some changes–for example, PBTerm has been replaced with your browser–but at its core, Paintball Net is the game you remember!

name: Pac-Panic
summary: Much more than the return of the ghost-chompin' legend, PAC-PANIC is a think-fast challenge and a puzzle game, too. As the blocks, you gotta think quick and move quicker, to line 'em up and make 'em vanish.

name: Papyrus
summary: Papyrus is an Action game, developed by Planet Interactive and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 2000.

name: Party Print 'N Play

name: Papo Town: Ocean Park
summary: Welcome to Papo Town Ocean Park! This is a perfect place for summer vacation! How about making a huge sand castle? Lying on the beach and have a cold drink? Or a beach barbecue party! The stars in the ocean park prepares a splendid show for you, too!

name: Papo Town Food Street
summary: Welcome to Papo Town Food Street! Here, you can experience a variety of distinctive delicacies. Walking down the bustling streets, you'll meet different buddies and together enter the food shops of your choice. Experience the making of delicacies, create your favorite dishes, and enjoy the food with friends. Come and explore your culinary journey!

name: Papo Learn & Play
summary: Especially designed for early learning and entertainment, this is a massive collection of games, cartoons, songs, pictured books and brain training puzzles. It helps the preschoolers to master essential life skills and build emotional intelligence through role play. Your little ones will enjoy the free exploration and the fun of learning.

name: Papo Town Dessert Shop

You’ll learn how to cook these beautiful and yummy desserts, and also satisfy your customers’ needs. With the coins you earned, decorate the diners upstairs! There are so many furniture for your choice. Where to place them, how to decorate the room, it's entirely up to you! Enjoy the fourfold fun of cooking, restaurant management and, house design and play house!

Pandemia

summary: Start your driving adventure on a beautiful island! When you feel warmed up, mix things up and hop into a sports car, quad bike or even a massive bus. This is a racing game that will bring the sun into your life! FEATURES: ▶ 13 UNIQUE CARS: Dune buggy, f…

summary:
Included as a bonus game bundled with the X68000 port of Pac-Mania.
The ghost AI is very off, with the ghosts rarely attacking Pac-Man.

summary: Dodge hazards, climb walls, and kick off of signs in your rush to the flag! Parkour Polygon delivers a 2D parkour experience with a striking minimalist style.

summary: Parlor! Mini 3 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1996.

Pac-Mania
summary: Pac-Mania is a variation on the game Pac-Man. You need to guide Pac-Man around a maze and eat all of the dots on the board in order to proceed on to the next round. Numerous, multi-colored ghosts also roam the maze trying to stop you. If you eat one of the power pellets in the maze, the ghosts will temporarily turn blue and run from you. Pac-Man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now shown in isometric perspective and is larger than screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man now has the ability to jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid air collision!

summary: 3 Girls are waiting you at the tip of the floor. Fill the gauge, Launch the sled, and Raise your head... What do you see? Is this panty?

summary:
Park on your friend's streets, or catch them parking illegally on yours and write them a huge ticket!
Fully customize your fleet of cars with an array of car modifications that span from whimsical to awesome!
Ticketing is the real fun. The longer you keep cars parked on your friends’ streets, the more money you'll earn, but be careful. Your friends are waiting to steal your cash with ticketing all over the time.

name: Paco
summary: A sci-fi 2D puzzle platformer utilizing an unusual gun, that allows you to navigate a robot incineration facility.

summary: This is a horror game based on the popular Japanese meme "pien koete paon" , means paon beyond the pien.

name: Pax Corpus
summary:
Plunge into the strange world of Oz Nama alongside Kahlee, a dangerously seductive mercenary. Load your Blaster, warm up your joints and set off for an adventure to solve the mystery of the Pax Corpus. If you resist the charms and trickery of Kylana Soro, you may be able to help Kahlee to free Oz Nama from this dreadful creation.

Initially intended to be an adaptation of MTV's animated series Æon Flux, Cryo Interactive continued development on the game after Viacom, MTV's parent company, closed their video game division, removing any character names and references to the aforementioned series in the process.

name: Party Crasher Simulator
summary: Join the wildest party of the year! If crashing parties is your greatest passion, then this game is definitely for you. Step into the shoes of a young man who has no mercy for party people and become famous as the King of Party Crashing!

Take command of your forces once again and prepare to face the might of the Red Army head on in the final battles of World War II!

summary:
Paper Mario: Master Quest is a mod made for "Paper Mario" on the N64. It was created by Emperor_Thamz, Rainchus, JaThePlayer, and Brotenko. It revamps old content and adds plenty of new as well.
Often considered "The Dark Souls of Paper Mario", the mod is incredibly difficult.

name: Pawnshop Tycoon
summary: Start with a garage full of old junk and expand to a thriving business. Manage sales and train staff to automate redundant tasks. Relocate or expand your shop with many options across the city. Learn all the ins and outs of becoming a big city Pawnshop Tycoon!

name: Para Bellum
summary: Single player strategy with puzzle elements and focus on microcontrol. In the game you need to form an army to storm the castles and change formation during the attack. Capture castles and fortifications with various sets of attacking and defending units. Each unit has its own special ability.

name: Pac-Man Vs.
summary: A port of Pac-Man Vs., released initially inside Namco Museum DS.

name: Parking Mania 2
summary:
A sequel for a popular Parking Mania in 3D.
Drive and park various cars completing exciting missions.

name: Park Beyond: Beyond the Skies of Arabia - Theme World
summary:
Enhance your dream park with this new themed world. The all-new Beyond the Skies of Arabia expansion allows you to bring the wonder and delight of 1001 Arabian Nights into your park.

Beyond the Skies of Arabia - Theme World includes the following glittering wonder content:
• 230+ Scenery Objects
• Building Prefabs
• 2 Flat Rides
• 4 Animatronics
• 2 Entertainers and Impossification
• 2 Coaster Modules
• 1 Track Type
• 1 Coaster Car
• 2 Sandbox Maps

name: Paradigm Overhaul
summary: An action puzzle game that makes full use of the power to break things and the power to heal. Explore a facility filled with dangers, try to escape from the facility, and solve the mysteries of the world.

name: Paraiso Island: Restaurant Expansion
summary: Open a restaurant on Paraiso Island! Chop, mix and cook to prepare over twenty recipes, then serve them to guests! Don't let anything burn! This DLC unlocks the restaurant building and cooking mini-game.

name: Panzer Rollen
summary: Panzer Rollen is a WW2 tank game. In the formal version, you fight in historically reconstructed Japanese castles. You can learn Samurai's defense doctrine "Yokoya-o-kakeru" (横矢をかける）, which means making a flank attack on the enemy.

name: Parametric Creature: Lab
summary: Explore and create parametric creatures

summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

summary: Pandas eat berries to get bigger and drop bikes to defeat opponents. Get the biggest to win.

name: Pack Man in Rio
summary: Make a living as a packman assistant in this game that teaches how to handle money while you enjoy a beach, surf, Altinho matches, and even a human pac-man between good and bad guys! Welcome to Rio, this nice City of God! Keep your wallet and cell phone inside your pocket, if you can... xD

name: Party Bunch
summary: Psychological and fun game with lots of game modes for a big group of friends!

name: Pachi-Slot Love Story
summary: Pachi-Slot Love Story is a Miscellaneous game, published by Coconuts Japan, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Pandemic: The Board Game - On the Brink: Mutation
summary: You thought you saved humanity already? "On the Brink: Mutation" DLC brings a fifth, special, highly dangerous and purple, disease to eradicate.

name: Pack a Block
summary: pack n' break some blocks!

name: Pac-Man
summary: A port of Pac-Man for watch.

name: Parallyzed
summary: A frantic adventure platformer - control twin sisters at the same time as they navigate intense, hand-crafted parallel worlds!

name: Pantropy
summary: Pantropy is a science-fiction based multiplayer game for players who want to make their own story. You’ll need to band together to thrive in this lush and dangerous world. Luckily, there are factions just waiting to welcome you into their ranks. Are you going to mine resources and craft a powerful mech?

name: Pathways
summary: Pathways explores the idea of interactive storytelling through abstract decisions and literal pathways. The hero walks through the same town each day, taking different routes and encountering separate stories that, when all brought together, make up his life story.

name: Papa's Cupcakeria HD
summary:
Bake and decorate delicious cupcakes through all of the fun holidays in Papa's Cupcakeria HD!

-- ABOUT THE GAME --

Papa's Cupcakeria has opened in the picturesque town of Frostfield, and you're in charge of baking and decorating cupcakes in the shop! Work your way through all of the holidays of the year, and master all four stations of the restaurant to become a cupcake crafting master.

You'll need to multitask to handle all of the separate areas of the restaurant, and each step is a hands-on process. Choose the correct pan liners and pour just the right amount of gooey batter into each. Slide the pan into the oven and bake them to perfection. Twist and swirl frosting onto the cupcakes, and carefully shake and drizzle the correct toppings onto each. Add festive decorations on top, and serve the delicious cupcakes to your hungry customers!

-- GAME FEATURES --

Holidays have arrived on your tablet! As you level up and build a loyal customer fan base, you'll notice the seasons changing all around you, bringing exciting new holidays on a regular basis. You'll unlock a variety of batters, drizzles, shakers, and toppers for each holiday of the year, including some brand-new holidays that weren't included in the classic game! Each customer has a favorite holiday, and will visit the shop to order something special with these holiday ingredients during their favorite season.

Play as James or Willow, or create your own custom character to work in the Cupcakeria! Visit the Shop to find an extensive wardrobe of clothing and accessories for your workers, which you can buy with your hard-earned tips. In this new version of Papa's Cupcakeria, there is also a wide selection of holiday-themed clothing that you can wear to get in the holiday spirit. If your worker is wearing clothing that matches the current holiday, your customers will give you even more tips!

The restaurant also includes a Dining Room where customers can sit and enjoy their freshly-baked cupcakes, and you can hire a Server to help you take their orders. Hire James or Willow as your Server, or create another custom character to staff your restaurant. All of the clothing and accessories you buy in the Shop can be used by both of your workers, so you can coordinate their uniforms or give them each their own style!

The customizable lobby is back, with new themes of furniture and decorations for each holiday of the year! Decorate the restaurant with holiday decorations and your customers won't mind waiting even longer for their food. You can also change the wallpaper, flooring, countertop, and trim, which will change the decor in the Dining Room as well!

Play Foodini's Mini-Games after each workday to earn new clothing for your workers and furniture for your restaurant. Complete all of the levels in each Mini-Game to earn a special Rare Prize with extra points for your lobby decoration score! Complete all of the levels again to earn a second and then a third Rare Prize to complete your collection!

-- MORE FEATURES --

- Hands-on cupcake shop in the Papa Louie universe
- Updated and remastered for iPad
- Multi-tasking between batter, baking, frosting, and topping
- 12 separate holidays to unlock, each with their own ingredients
- Custom chefs and servers
- Tons of furniture and clothing items to decorate your shop and workers
- 96 customers to serve with unique orders
- Over 115 ingredients to unlock
- Purchase shop upgrades with your earned tips
- Challenging Closers and Food Critic
- 90 Achievements with Game Center support

name: Parkour Simulator
summary: Experience breathtaking emotions and master parkour tricks. Become a true master and show your own freestyle!

name: Path to Christmas
summary:
Path to Christmas is a cute holiday Mystic Square classic 15 puzzle interpretation about Mr. Gift.

Demonstrate savvy and help Mr. Gift to get in time under your Christmas tree!

name: Paul Moose in Space World
summary: Meet amazing alien species and visit deadly planets as Paul Moose in Paul Moose In Space World.

name: Pac-Man Micro Player: 40th Anniversary Edition
summary: Based on Sega Genesis clone hardware. Compared to the non-40th model, it is gold instead of yellow, and the side artwork is a lenticular print.

name: Pang.date
summary: Remake of a classic 70s arcade game.

name: Pacifish
summary: Pacifish is an incremental fishing management game with several mechanics to interact with and improve. It can be played both idly, or more actively to progress faster.

name: Panelki: Delivery
summary: Tired of being a janitor? Now you can become a delivery man! A big heavy bag instead of shovels, an attractive smell from it and the same goal to save up for a ticket to start a new life (again?).

name: Paper Pal
summary: Embark on an adorable adventure as a paper doll that came to life in a kindergarten! Fueled by a fear of being discarded, you set out to find a way to slip into your creator's backpack resting atop a towering shelf. Explore a whimsical world with a vibrant cast of sentient toys, each with their own quirks and stories to unfold!

name: Pac-in-Time
summary: The evil Ghost Witch has cast a vicious spell on Pac-Man and thrown him back in time to when he was a Pac-Boy. Only you can save him now. Down some Pac-Pellets and get ready to battle your way through a totally supersonic side-scrolling adventure. Journey through snowy mountains and forests, collect fireballs and bubbles, crunch Pac-Bats and ghosts, swim like a fish and swing like a monkey... and ultimately get Pac-Man back to the real world! Sega Mega Drive and Sega Game Gear versions were announced at CES 1995, but were ultimately cancelled for unknown reasons. A prototype of the Game Gear version has since been found and released online.

name: Panic in Nakayoshi World
summary: This title is about monsters that are attacking the World of Nakayoshi. The monsters are eating up the citizens. The more they eat, the hungrier they get. Four girls must stop the monsters and defeat Daima to save the World of Nakayoshi. The game is an overhead Adventures of Lolo-style puzzle game featuring characters from various Nakayoshi-printed manga. Sailor Moon and Chibi Moon are playable characters. There are also characters from Goldfish Warning!.

name: Parasite
summary: This is a roguelike open-world sandbox survival horror set in a modern city. Play as an --redacted-- parasite, possess human hosts, exploit and evolve them to help you survive in a hostile world, all to find out your one true purpose.

name: Payday 2: The Golden Grin Casino Heist
summary: Las Vegas is a Desert Mirage, a Jewel Amongst the Sands.The Golden Grin Casino Heist DLC is the 24th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and is the final contract from the Dentist. She boasts more Five Diamond hotels than any other city in the world. Her shine and sparkle attracts tens of millions of dreamers every year.

name: Pandora's Box
summary: A space themed arcade adventure in psychedelic pixel arts, collect coins to customize your ship color and background as you get through far away galaxies.

name: Payday 2: Ultimate Edition
summary: The Ultimate Edition of Payday 2 includes all previously released DLC content, including heists, weapons, accessories, skins, playable characters, and soundtracks, at a heavy discount compared to the original release.

name: Pavor
summary: Pavor is an online co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players. You are a professional electrical repair and ghost exterminator, repairing broken houses and exterminating ghosts as requested.

name: Pacific Fleet
summary:
"It really has too much detail and logic to be dismissed as an arcade game."
- Neal Stevens, subsim.com

"One of six games you should have played in 2013 (but probably didn't)."
- Owen Faraday, pockettactics.com

Pacific Fleet is turn based game set upon a detailed simulation depicting naval warfare during World War II.

Check out the full game trailer at:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8k7dq_0fPPc

Features:
- All new graphics depict the greatest war at sea in stunning full 3D
- Historically based ships, aircraft, weapons and dozens of ship upgrades
- A unique blend of deep strategic planning combined with quick tactical decisions
- Play as the US Pacific Fleet or Imperial Japanese Navy
- 90 combat zones to battle through on your way to victory
- Single Battle and Multiplayer Hotseat modes
- Complete 44 achievements
- Sink ships with realistic buoyancy physics, not with hit-point bars!
- Submarine warfare and carrier operations with dive bombing and torpedo bombers
- Dynamic weather, shore bombardments and night engagements
- Target specific ship subsystems to sink or cripple the enemy
- 17 playable ships
- 8 playable aircraft
- Random ship placement, wind, weather and night engagements make each play-through unique
- NO ADVERTISEMENTS. NO IN APPS. ONE PRICE = FULL GAME.

Join us on Facebook for latest news and ongoing discussion with the developer:
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Pacific-Fleet/313315455431274

name: Paintball 707
summary:
Paintball 707 is a first person shooter sports game for single- and multiplayer games.
Target is to mark the players of the opposite team and capture flags.

name: Palace of Woe
summary:
a sort-em-up labyrinth
with one ending

name: Pangman
summary: Pangman takes you inside a VR classic arcade game experience, where your goal is to burst spheres by using a pair of guns that transform into hooks when you throw them. Complete 140 story mode levels in individual or cooperative campaign, and enjoy frantic multiplayer games with up to 8 players.

name: Paradise
summary: The player who is private detective is asked to investigate Paradise Corporation by a police detective. He decided to go to the place of the first customer of Paradise Corporation.

name: Parallel Turn
summary:
A skiing game with six events: Ski Lift, Slalom, Ski Jump, Biathlon, Dog Sled and Downhill.

Bash the buttons to increase your speed.

name: Paper Shakespeare: Stick Merchant of Venice
summary: Shakespeare's classic play about intolerance, bigotry, and revenge. Told only as stick figures can. 25% of sales go towards the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research and Desert Bus for Hope.

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 14
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Paddles
summary: Compete against friends or robots in local 4-player party chaos! Defend yourself against magical balls in hectic levels to win the prized cup crown.

name: Paintiles
summary:
Paint the tiles to make matches and clear the board.

The game starts simple, you are given three colors to paint tiles with. As you gain the skills necessary to solve increasingly challenging puzzles you're faced with new mechanics - dissolving ground, bombs, rainbow tiles, all of which make you think in new and interesting ways. Paintiles is a must for puzzle lovers!

name: Paths Taken
summary: Become the noble of a country on the brink of war.

name: Papyrus: Le Secret de la Cité Perdue
summary: Aidez Papyrus à découvrir Le Secret de la Cité Perdue et pénétrez au coeur de l'Egypte antique. Dans ce jeu d'aventure sur PC, vous devrez résoudre des énigmes, découvrir des amulettes et divers objets, afin de lever le mystère qui entoure cette mystérieuse cité.

name: Packer
summary: The ultimate box packing experience

name: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: Universal Special
summary: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: Universal Special is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Kaze and published by KSS, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Paperchase
summary: Little shapeshifty platformer thing.

name: Paws Trail
summary: "Paws Trail" is an enchanting adventure game where players guide a charming black cat through a mystical forest and unlocking secrets along the way. Experience a vivid world filled with engaging challenges and endearing forest companions.

name: Pac-Man
summary: An LCD handheld port of Pac-Man.

name: Pathosis
summary: Pathosis is an early access Combat-RPG game that takes place in an infected medieval world. A few selected knights have survived the pathosis and are now fighting against the undead warriors that roam the world. You are one of the knights. So go and explore the world of Pathosis and save it from this great infection!

name: PacMan2
summary: PacMan2 is a handheld LCD game released in 1981 by Entex. It was released in Japan as HungryPac. There was also a cartridge version released for the Select-A-Game system.

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 13
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Papo Town Countries
summary: How many national flags can you recognize? Which is your favorite country all over the world? If you travel to your favorite country, what kind of cultural activities and local food would you like to enjoy? It’s not safe to travel abroad because of the COVID-19 pandemic, so Papo Town features this new theme room decoration and play house game.

name: Papo Town Spaceship
summary: Space crisis! The most notorious fugitives in space are acting recklessly! Purple Pink and other space policemen need your help! As the caption and commanding officer of Papo Town Spaceship, you should lead your super fleet to fight with the criminals, defeat them and maintain the peace and stability of the universe!

name: Parkasaurus: Prehistoric Wonders
summary:
10 New Animals
American Lion, Mammoth, Sabertooth, Megatherium, Eastern Puma ,Giant Capybara, Short Faced Bear, Dodo, Dire Wolf, Dwarf Pronghorn

name: Pajama Sam: Don't Fear the Dark
summary:
The award-winning best-selling Humongous children’s property made popular on the PC is now available for Wii!

Help Pajama Sam Escape the Land of Darkness! Join Sam as he embarks on his journey to capture Darkness in a land of talking trees, hilarious carrots and non-stop adventure! Kids will love testing their wits in this midnight quest to shed some light on Sam’s mysterious closet. Explore a world of secrets and slumber in this motion-based adventure filled with discovery and imagination!

name: Painting Werther
summary: Painting Werther is an interactive visual novel where all the visuals are living paintings, all the music are classics (with a twist) and the novel was written by Goethe (1774). The story tells the sorrows of Werther, a young man who fell so deeply in love that he was the first romantic.

name: Party Party Time: Character Skin Pack
summary: Customize your character! Change up your look with over 20 different skins! Be it a ninja, clown, or astronaut, dress up in style and get ready to party!

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Azteca
summary: A Pachi-Slot game in the Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket series.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Ward of Lights
summary: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku Pocket: Ward of Lights is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Aruze, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Panel Rabbit
summary: Flash! Puzzle Action！ Place the panels on the ground and Guide the rabbit safely to the goal!

name: Path of a Player
summary: This Game is loosely based on Solo Leveling

name: Pam's House: An Escape Game
summary: Here's a charming, escape-room puzzle game with hand-drawn art!

name: Panzer Dragoon Mini
summary: One thousand years into the future, you live in constant fear of the Dark Dragon and his giant cyborg insect armies. Armed with a deadly weapon from the ancient past and the guidance of your armored blue dragon, you must save your people from endless swarms of deadly foes. Fulfill your destiny and keep the Dark Dragon from reaching the tower; or die trying.

name: Paul's Monster Adventure
summary: Prepare to embark on an epic adventure and enter a land where monsters known as bosses once ruled with an iron fist.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku 7
summary: The seventh game in the Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku series.

name: Papo Town: Sweet Home
summary: Welcome to Papo Town! It is up to you to create the rules of life here! We will visit the sweet home of Purple Pink the Bunny. Enjoy the fun of exploration and discovery!

name: Pac-Man
summary:
Included as a bonus game in the SNES version of Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures/Hello, Pac-Man!; was never released in a standalone form.
Similar to the Famicom/NES version, but features slightly updated graphics and a high-score table.

name: Parkour with Friends
summary: Kekdot Center is a fun and challenging multiplayer obstacle/parkour game in which players will have to find their way to the finish. Players can take a short break in the Plaza where they can socialize with others in the form of text chat and voice chat.

name: Para Bellum: Hold the Line
summary: Para Bellum - Hold the Line is a 3D real time small unit tactics game. Your task is to hold off enemy attacks wave after wave using a variety of different Units and Supports in your arsenal to the best of your abilities in Campaign and Skirmish modes.

name: Patter Warrior
summary: This is a first person shooting game，The player plays a special soldier in a small town full of enemies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, and try to keep their health value alive for a long time.

name: Pac-Land
summary: Atari Lynx port of Pac-Man.

name: Papa's Burgeria to Go!
summary: Papa's Burgeria is now available to play on the go!

name: PathPix Edge
summary: Live life on the edge - the PathPix Edge! No stodgy rectangles here. 180 puzzles in funny shapes and sizes from mini to supermax - more than half a million squares to solve! Lots of easy puzzles! Lots of medium puzzles! Lots of hard puzzles! Only a few real stinkers - just enough to keep you on your toes.

name: Paul McCartney's Give My Regards to Broad Street
summary: You are ex-Beatle Paul McCartney and your master tape of your new solo album has been accidentally erased. All tracks coukd be recovered except the first one. You must find seven members of your band in order to recover the missing track.

name: Parallel Arena
summary: Parallel arena is an old-school classic shooter with a unique teleport capability between two parallel worlds. Kill your opponents deftly moving around the location, and switching between worlds, while you see the players in a parallel world but can not kill them until you are together.

name: Party Arena
summary: 2-4 Players Online or Local Play. Turn Based Strategy Board Game + Action Mini Games. Use items to max effect as you move around the board and combo to victory. Fast games (20 minutes total)! Fun for any evening or night with friends!

name: Paperly: Paper Plane Adventure
summary: Go on an exciting paper plane flight adventure, learn different flight mechanics & explore different worlds. it's all about flying a paper plane, learning from previous mistakes, and heading toward a better flight in this physics-driven gameplay.

name: Paradise Lost
summary: Shooting games. Shoot monsters and have fun.

name: Paws 'n Claws VR
summary:
Paws 'n Claws VR is a fast-paced tower defense game in which you, a loyal combat dog, use a variety of wacky weapons to stop cats from invading your owner’s home! 
The best use of VR in tower defense, period.

name: Pawnchline
summary:
Display your best stand-up comedy routines in the most famous bar in town, the "Pawnchline".

Use your joke cards to find the type of humor that best suits your audience, and make them laugh. But bear in mind, each session has its new outlandish audience, with different humor preferences.

name: Paradise Nowhere
summary: Paradise Nowhere is a Backrooms game that blends abstract concepts with realistic graphics, evoking a feeling of liminality through empty spaces devoid of life. The game isn’t intended as a horror experience, your feelings towards liminal spaces might make it one. Or maybe, it's just the Paradise...

name: Pac-Land
summary: ZX Spectrum port of Pac-Land.

name: Pac-Land
summary: MSX port of Pac-Land.

name: Pain: Repainted
summary: Remember your deepest fear and shame? You get PAIN... the DLC! PAIN: Below Sanity is back, like never seen before, meaning now you can awkwardly steer your ship and feel pure rage with new graphics and many more!

name: Palm Tetris
summary: Palm Tetris is a puzzle game built on various cubes of different colors that need to be decomposed so as to fill the entire void.

name: Pacific Rim: The Video Game
summary: Pacific Rim: The Video Game is a Fighting Game based on Guillermo del Toro's Mechas vs. Kaiju blockbuster.

name: Pac-Land
summary: Amstrad CPC port of Pac-Land.

name: Pac Man's Sky
summary: A combination of classic Pac-Man mechanics with exploration elements similar to No Man's Sky. Players move through a universe containing planets, each one a procedurally generated Pac-Man-style level.

name: Pacific Storm: Allies
summary:
The long-awaited sequel to Pacific Storm; Pacific Storm: Allies expands upon the success of the internationally acclaimed original to deliver an unforgettable mix of real-time strategy and blistering arcade combat, recreating World War II's most heated battles.

Experience large-scale naval and air operations of the Pacific as either the United States, Imperial Japan, or new playable nation - the UK. Marvel at the enhanced 3D visual engine complete with detailed damage modeling. Settle disputes via diplomacy or battle. Or assume direct control over stunningly-rendered ships and planes to personally annihilate your adversaries. From the US to USSR, Germany to Japan, new missions, tactical maneuvers and multiplayer modes offer armchair admirals greater excitement than ever.

name: Pac-Land
summary: Commodore 64 port of Pac-Land.

name: Painturio
summary:
paintur.io is a free online multiplayer game where players have to guess the word that is drawn by one of them within a limited time. The principle is very simple, so it is possible to have fun with the whole family or a group of friends.

This game allows you to showcase your drawing skills, while using your overflowing imagination. Faster you are, more points you earn and you win the game!

The game is playable on any device which can access to internet.

name: Panda vs. Bugs
summary: The cute panda "Shearer" is playing happily on the bamboo, an army of bugs is climbing up the tree unknowingly, avoid the bugs carefully and use "weapons" to defeat the army of bugs!

name: Pac-Man Palace: Festive Folleys
summary: Just in time for Christmas in July, you can beat the heat with the Pac-Man Palace: Festive Folleys demo! It's a brand new Pac-Man experience. Run, jump, swim, bounce your way to the top but watch out for those pesky ghosts!

name: Papo Town: Forest Friends
summary: Purple Pink the Bunny moves to her new home in the forest. This forest is full of wonders and fantasies, and best of all, lots of new friends! Would you like to visit the new friends with Purple Pink? Let’s go！

name: Pain of War
summary: Horror based action game themed in World War. Prepare to knows the dark side of it.

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 8
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: PalmRide: After Flight
summary: Prepare to take flight in the retrofuturistic PalmRide universe. Explore neon cities, colorful mountains, beaches and more while shooting your way through a world full of enemies who want to kill you. Enjoy an on-rails shooter with retro outrun aesthetics!

name: Pachi-Slot Kanzen Kouryaku: Universal Shindai Nyuuka Volume 1
summary: A pachi-slots game that draws from Universal Entertainment's product line. Like many pachinko/pachi-slots games, its chief role is to help gamblers practice for the real deal.

name: Pac the Man 2
summary: Pac the Man 2 is an adaptation of Pac-Man for the Macintosh platform. It features 25 original levels, 3 difficulty settings and music remixes based on the older classic games themes. The gameplay of the original game is preserved, with the following variations: the fruit bonuses are also power-ups (such as speed-up, invincibility), and last but not least, simultaneous two-player gameplay is available.

name: Pacific General
summary: Pacific General is a simulation game set in the Pacific theater of conflict in World War II, pitting the Japanese Empire against the combined might of the Allied forces. In this game, it is possible to take either side in the conflict, which can be played from the dawn of combat in 1937 through to the historical or hypothetical outcome(s) of the war. Land, air, and naval operations play a key role in the battles to be fought.

name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku 4
summary: The fourth game in the Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku series.

name: Patisserie Palette
summary: a narrative-driven 2D puzzle adventure set in colorful and black-and-white parallel universes

name: Paragrowth
summary: Paragrowth is Survival RPG game placed in giant dark forest. Scavenge and explore giant countryside areas overgrown by trees and mysterious living roots. Find hideout to survive nights full of paranormal activities. Hunt mutating prey for ingredients to inject enemies abilities into yourself.

name: Paint School II
summary: Paint School II has all the remarkable features of Paint School I: the use of 32,000 colors for spectacular painting, CD-quality music to color by, and sophisticated software for a "smart" program! Paint School II contains hundreds of additional scenes to paint, from such categories as Numerous Numbers, Lots of Letters and Shape Place. These subjects teach kids important concepts while they color. With a wide choice of color palettes and hundreds of scenes, there's no end to the fun!

name: Pastel Muse
summary: A colored ball matching style puzzle game released exclusively in Japan.

name: Paper Boats
summary:
Paper Boats is a small, experimental game about sharing and contemplating. There's not much to do, no enemies to kill or puzzles to solve. You can just look around, interact with the things around you and take screenshots.

Every once in a while, though, a paper boat will come sailing and stop in front of your dock, carrying a message for you, written by a stranger. Maybe it's a kind word of encouragement, or somebody emptying their worries into the void.

Good thing is that you can also send a message in your own paper boat, and let it sail for a stranger to read.

When you need a small break from reality, you can just hang around on the dock, watch the day go by and read messages from strangers.

name: Party Quiz Mega Q 2022
summary: Party Quiz Mega Q 2022 is an updated version of the 1993 Mega Drive Game Party Quiz Mega Q with updated questions. It was released exclusively on the Mega Drive Mini 2 in Japan.

name: Pac-Man
summary: Possibly bootleg in origin, or an unreleased prototype. Nearly identical to the Atari 400/800/XL/XE version.

name: Partial Control
summary: Overcome the limitations of having a hacked brain and still survive. Most of the time you have no control, but at key moments you can take decisions that are vital: think them through very carefully. The rest of the time, watch your body act and hope you make it out alive...

name: Pass On
summary: Dash through the darkness and avoid its undead dangers to save the lost souls of the night!

name: Paradise
summary:
Paradise PC From the creator of the award-wining series Syberia comes Benoit Sokal s fascinating new work, Paradise. Sokal s latest adventure game masterpiece is set in four different worlds in the heart of darkest Africa. From the arid lands of Madargane to the dense jungle of the Maurane river, the world is both primitive and contemporary. Fraught with political turmoil, the lush landscapes are beautiful and dangerous.You play Ann Smith, a young woman suffering from amnesia struggling to make her way home and avoid the conflict surrounding her. To discover her true identity, she must escort a strange black leopard back to the land where it was born. Follow Ann through her journey as she finds clues to her identity and unravels the truth behind her mysterious past. A benchmark in art direction: Benoit Sokal, creator of the award-winning Syberia series contributes his unique vision in 4 visually dazzling worlds with over 360 backgrounds and Rembrandt-style lighting. 
 
 
Unique Storyline: Ann Smith, estranged daughter of an African dictator, loses her identity and must journey through uncharted Africa to unravel her past and the mysterious existence of her leopard companion. 
Unique Setting: First Adventure game to feature landscapes of Africa as a backdrop. 
 
Play as the leopard: When day turns to night, players become the leopard and move in real time, climbing trees, leaping boundaries and frightening humans. This option adds a real-time element to the traditional point and click gameplay. 
 
Puzzle solutions are seamlessly embedded into the story: For example, players must find a way to speak with the well-guarded prince, so they must pose as one of his wives to gain access (no gadgets or levers to pull).

name: Parallel Paths
summary: Run, Jump, & Swing your way to the top. Beat the clock and collect Upgrades. Find your dimension before time runs out.

name: Pantheon
summary:
Pantheon is 2 genres in 1: A vertical shoot'em up and an arcade adventure game (the latter being the main game).

In the arcade adventure game you are Sergeant Silver first in ancient Greece and later in outer space. To complete the main game you have to solve puzzles (and bring certain items to temples) and fight enemies

name: Pachio-kun: Pachinko Land Adventures
summary: Pachio-kun continues his adventures on PlayStation.

name: Parkour Civilization
summary: Progress from a noob to a god by mastering parkour courses, crafting parkour gadgets, and solving parkour puzzles.

name: Path of the Dead
summary: Let's kill those bastards!

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 10
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Painting Workshop
summary: Amazing Drawing & Painting software for Nintendo 3DS!

name: Parachuter
summary: With a limited number of moves, move through the selection of the direction of gravity. Defeat all enemies and escape this strange world.

name: PachaMama
summary: A side-scroller game containing some mini games based on mindfulness techniques to relieve stress.

name: Papa's Donutria
summary: You just got a job at Papa's Donuteria in the whimsical town of Powder Point. Sure, the great pay and benefits are nice, but you took the job for that coveted Line-Jump Pass. Unfortunately, now you have to cook dozens of delicious donuts a day for all the crazy customers in this carnival-like town. Cut out the donuts, fry 'em up, and decorate them with a dizzying array of toppings.

name: Paper Wizards
summary: an exciting fast-paced first person action game with bullet-hell mechanics that make you feel like a powerful wizard. You get to plan your approach and then test your skills in combat and platforming situations.

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 7
summary: Welcome to 8-Bit World! Paint by numbers and take portraits of various pixel art scenes!

name: Paper Shakespeare: To Date or Not to Date? - The Merry War
summary: It's election time at Elsinore Academy! Pick the candidate that you wish to back, and get them to the top!

name: Pax Romana
summary: Pax Romana: Romulus is an RPG/Adventure game that takes the mythological story of Romulus and Remus, legendary founders of Rome, on a different fiction. In the meantime, let the players create their own farm and design home.

name: Pawarumi: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Pawarumi Collector’s Box (with a beautifully embossed logo)
- Pawarumi Game (region free)
- Game Manual
- Original Soundtrack CD
- Pawarumi Numbered Certificate

name: Paint Royale
summary: Paint Royale is a Paintball Co-op shooter in which you can play with your friends in many different game modes and maps, the game modes include the most famous game modes such as Battle Royale, but also completely new game directions.

name: Patience
summary: PATIENCE is a puzzle game that generates random, solvable puzzles based off of some complex rules. It's shamelessly inspired from a concept featured in a hit 2015 indie game.

name: Paths of the Sentinels
summary: Paths of the Sentinels is an Action Roguelike with Dungeon Crawler elements. Play as a lone warrior who is seeking to destroy the evil that lurks within the castle. Defeat all enemies that lie within the ever-changing Domains of the Sentinels.

name: Parkasaurus: Sea Monsters
summary: Don’t lose out on the opportunity to explore the wonderful world of aquatic reptiles and fish! Have you ever wanted to raise a Mosasaurus from a baby or create the perfect home for your ancient Archelon? Now you can. Use fluid water physics to construct aquatic exhibits for your new friends with walkways, heaters, and more.

name: Pasapalabra
summary:
The official Pasapalabra game, with the same format as the television program.

Face the same challenges as the program's contestants, you will have thousands of games on your mobile and you will be able to challenge players from all over the world.

name: Parking Swipe
summary:
We have all been there – stuck in a parking jam at a parking lot and no matter how many times you go back and forth, you are still jammed! Don’t let that happen on your phone. With Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam, you have full control over the parking jam. Use your brain and logical thinking to decide how to unblock the parking lot. Figure out which car needs to move first and in which direction to unblock other cars.
With amazing 3D graphics and hundreds of parking jam levels, Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam will surely keep you entertained for hours. Even if you bump into a car or two while trying to ‘unjam’ the jam, that’s no reason for concern in this car parking game unless you are playing a challenge where every move counts. Literally.

name: Paddock Note '95
summary: The game simulates building up a career for horse racing. As the manager, the player can choose the winning horse, the rider and how many meters racetrack, which is done by navigating multiple menus. In the Strand Yard office, the player has access to plenty of information for the available horses and riders before making decisions. Further learning can be done at the Horse Museum.

name: Painted Legend 2
summary: Welcome to a world where fantasies come to life! Painted Legend 2 is an adventure 2.5D platformer game made in the style of 80s cartoons, where you have to play for one of heroes with different characteristics and abilities.

name: Papiny Dochki
summary: A point'n'click quest based on a famous Russian TV series.

name: Parse Ally
summary: The ancient system, without waiting for help, was destroyed. You are next. Yes? You and the survivors, grouped to repel the onslaught of the intruders. Of course, not all people will support you: there are those who are more interested in continuing the existing conflicts.

name: Pale Moon Crisis
summary: 2D horror ACT+ADV.

name: Paw Paw Miaw
summary: Choose one of these fighting cats and let the brawl begin! Before you start playing, you should learn the moves. Both single-player and two-player modes are available.

name: Pac Rabbit
summary: Pac Rabbit is a Pac-Man clone where you take the role of a rabbit and you move about a maze eating all the dots to clear the maze. As you eat the dots you must avoid the hounds that are hunting you but you can eat magic carrots which enable you to eat the hounds for a short time. If you touch a hound then you lose one of ten lives. There are six mazes split into two parts, Rabbits Revenge and Run Rabbit Run and you can choose the speed of the game (0-9) with zero being the fastest.

name: Party Hard Go
summary: In Party Hard, you play as someone who is really tired of the neighbors having loud parties. Instead of calling the police, you decide it’s a better idea to kill everyone – using your faithful knife and the environment. The tactical strategy follows a series of killings at parties through-ought the USA.

name: Panzer Corps: Sea Lion
summary: Operation Sea Lion is a massive expansion of 30 scenarios, using features never attempted in Panzer Corps before.

name: Patterned
summary: Rebuild scrambled patterns that seamlessly repeat across the screen.

name: Pachi-Slot Land: Pachi-pachi Coin no Densetsu
summary: Pachi-Slot Land is a Miscellaneous game, developed by I.S.C. and published by Carrozzeria, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Parabellum Galaxia
summary: Prepare for war in this VR Space Strategy Simulator. Design your ships, complete your missions, defeat your enemy.

name: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist - Special Edition
summary: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist has you back in the painting smock of your favorite green painter as you try to make a name for yourself in the art community by selling out your personal works for art that you create using an MS paint style interface.

name: Passengers
summary: PASSENGERS is a game where you play a smuggler of migrants in Europe.

name: Panzerfaust
summary: An authentic, single and multiplayer armored combat simulation set in WW2 featuring numerous vehicles, infantry and support assets.

name: Panda Pop
summary: Puzzle game based on rescuing baby pandas.

name: Pawggle
summary: Pawggle is a physics puzzle game. Help poor-sighted adorable fur creatures by strategically positioning your pegs and immerse yourself in a joyous furry symphony.

name: Parachute
summary: Mario must catch Toads, Yoshis, and Donkey Kong Jrs. in his rowboat as they float down with their parachutes.

name: Pacif Warriors 2
summary: Pacific Warriors II: Dogfight! puts you in the seat of a classic fighter plane during the action-filled Pacific conflict between the Americans and the Japanese during World War II. The focus is on action, not true-to-life flight simulation, but an adrenaline rush as you roar through the skies to take out your next target. Choose your side – American or Japanese, and follow a historically based time flow through 25 missions in each campaign. Pacific Warriors II: Dogfight! for PlayStation 2 is based on the PC version developed by InterActive Vision Games in 2003/2004.

name: Past For Future
summary:
A man struggling to accept his current life and time discovers the story of a brilliant and eccentric woman who was able to travel through time to escape her present unhappiness.
As a player you travel to the beautiful coastal town of Taranto to uncover her real tragic story, track her down through time and maybe escape your own present.
This is a game about escaping an unhappy present and romanticising the past.
Past For Future has been produced by the National Archaelogical Museum of Taranto (MArTA).

name: Panic!
summary: Panic! is a top-down action puzzler for PlayStation Mobile that requires quick thinking and fast reflexes.

name: Payday 2: Crimewave Edition - GOAT Simulator Heists
summary: The Goat Simulator DLC is a collaboration between Coffee Stain Studios and OVERKILL. It's a heist that is unlike anything we've done before.

name: Papo Town: World
summary: Welcome to Papo Town World! With all your favorite apps like Papo Town Hospital, Papo Town Castle, Papo Town Apartment combined together, this is a perfect game to play house with friends, create your own life stories and explore different places and scenes to connect with your real life. Play and learn in Papo Town World!

name: Pazule & Breddo
summary: A simple puzzle game for the Satellaview.

name: Paparazi
summary: How would you like to be pursued relentlessly with no recourse -- chased without the ability to elude your stalkers? If your answer to this question is "yes" then we think you need serious counseling. Want to "test the waters" and get some idea of what it is like? Download Paparazi and find out for yourself!

name: Passage: A Job Interview Simulator!
summary: An intense visual novel adventure based on real-life experiences! Choices that matter, multiple endings, 3+ hours of gameplay, OST, real-life career advice based on comprehensive research!

name: Papo Town: Hospital
summary: Do you want to be a doctor? Start your internship at the Papo Town Hospital! Work as a doctor to treat the town residents! Do you know how to operate an x-ray machine? How about doing a dental check for Colin the Cat, or work as in the emergency center to cure the patients? Explore in the hospital and become an excellent doctor!

name: Papo Town: Travel

Which is your favorite place? The beautiful seaside of Aegean Ocean, the mysterious rain forest, the exotic Egypt or the South Pole? Let’s pack up your suitcase and head to the airport!

name: Pachinko Tetsujin: Shichiban Shoubu
summary: Pachinko Tetsujin: Shichiban Shoubu is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Graphic Research and published by Daikoku, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Papo Town: Skyscraper
summary: Papo Town now has the highest building! Before moving into the apartments, the residents of Papo Town need your help! As an interior design, everyone in town loves your brilliant décor ideas! So get creative! Use your talent to decorate and design the apartments!

name: Papo Town School Life
summary: What’s the school life like in Papo Town? Come and join the Papo Town friends to find out! Play and learn in classroom, playground, art room, laboratory and music room! Enjoy the exploration in each scene and find the hidden surprises!

name: Papo City Builder
summary: Welcome to Papo City Builder! Use your imagination and creativity to build your dream Utopia. Do you want to live in a city, a town, a village or a forest? Build your world with a blueprint or at your will. Let’s get started!

name: Papo World Cleaning Day
summary:
Have you ever offered a hand to your parents in house chores?
After a party with friends, the house is a mess. Help Purple Pink the Bunny to organize and clean up all rooms.

name: Papo Town Clinic
summary: Papo Town Clinic needs your help! With patients coming in constantly, we are short in hands! Start to work as an intern and help cure the town residents! Besides, the clinic is lacking wards and rooms to accept more patients. So we have to work harder and earn more coins to expand the clinic into a hospital building! Do you want to accept this challenge? Let’s go!

name: Papo Town Pet Life
summary:
Who doesn’t want a fluffy and furry animal friend? In Papo Town, You could live with not just one, but many of them! Every pet is unique! Playing with so many cute animals and taking good care of them will bring you infinite fun and happiness!
Adopt your favorite animal in Papo Town: Pet Life. Cats, dogs, horses, parrots and even lizards! You have lots of choices! Take your favorite animal to different scenes and explore the fun!

name: Papo Town Happy Kingdom
summary:
The Happy Kingdom Amusement Park in Papo Town is always full of laughter and happiness. Yet these days it was filled with darkness! Purple Pink the Bunny got a HELP letter from the circus of the amusement park, saying that some of her best friends were locked up and forced to perform in the circus. Purple decided to explore in the park and find out the dark secrets of the circus owner!
This is a great puzzle game and play house game for your little ones! Search and explore in each and every scene of the amusement park, find the hidden clues, resolve the puzzles, and rescue the Papo friends!

name: Payday 2: The Point Break Heists
summary: Crime Has No Limit.The Point Break Heists DLC is the 29th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and represents a dream come true collaboration for us developers in the OVERKILL crew. For those of you who've been playing PAYDAY games since the first one came out, you know Point Break was one of the heist movies that was the core inspiration for PAYDAY.

name: Papo Town Sports Meet
summary: What’s like to stand on the top of the stage as a sports champion and receive a gold medal in summer games? The annual Papo Town Sports Meet welcomes your participation! Sign up for the sports you are good at and strive for the gold medals!

name: Papo City: Hospital
summary: Welcome to Papo City: Hospital! – A unique blend of innovative city building and house role-playing game, where you can design and place your own hospital city map and enter the built rooms to play as doctors and patients, simulating hospital scenes and stories! In Papo City: Hospital, you can also interact with real-life friends, like and compete in your designs!

name: Papo Town: Underground City
summary: This is a play house game that parents and kids will both enjoy! It could enhance kids’ imagination and creativity by simulating different roles! At the same time, their language expression will be improved immensely through the creation of stories!

name: Papo Town: My Home
summary: Welcome to Papo Town: My Home! This is a simulated play house game which you could play together with your friends! You are welcome to visit and explore in this sweet home! Play with imagination! No rules!

name: Papo Town Castle
summary: The wicked witch was jealous of the beauty and elegance of the princess. So she cast an evil spell on the princess to make her fall asleep forever. Meanwhile, the prince was trapped in the dungeon and couldn’t come to the rescue. But the prince left some clues, hoping that someone who is intelligent and brave could solve the puzzles to release both the princess and himself.

name: Papo Town: Mall
summary:
Welcome to Papo Town! Here you could create the story of your own!
Have a shopping spree! Enjoy the fun of exploration and discovery! Craving for an ice cream? Hey make one by yourself! Feeling like changing dress style? Enter the clothes shop to try on everything! There are more to experience!

name: Papo Town Wedding Party
summary: Get ready for the grandest wedding party in Papo Town! This game is a perfect combination of play house game and puzzle game, which will bring you double fun!

name: Papo Town Apartment
summary: The Papo Town apartment has expanded! With four new rooms, we have new neighbors joining us!

name: Papo Town Farm
summary: Welcome to Papo Town farm! Did you even wonder how grains are grow and how milk is produced? What’s like living in the countryside and stay with the cute farm animals? Papo town farm is the perfect place for kids to get familiar with agricultural production and understand how our daily food comes out, and also get to know the farm animals.

name: Papo Town Pirate
summary: For those who love adventures! Welcome on board little pirates! Join Purple Pink for a great exploration in the aim of finding the mysterious treasure in the sea!

name: Papo Town Fairytales
summary: There is a mysterious fairytale world in Papo Town where all the popular fairytale characters live there! Join Purple Pink the Bunny and Steve the Lion to explore in the world of your favorite fairytales!

name: Paper Ghost Stories: 7PM
summary: Follow the shared experience of three children for a day during ghost-month and the arrival of a mysterious new neighbor. Things quickly take a dark turn as what was supposed to be an offer of friendship triggers a series of strange events.

name: Papo Town Preschool
summary: Papo Town: Preschool simulates the real kindergarten and preschool environment and scenes including classroom, dining room, playground, toy room, school infirmary, activity room, sleeping room and bathroom. It is important for kids to learn how to share toys with friends, have classes together, enjoy outdoor activities and different ways of exploration and discovery!

name: Papo Town Pop Star
summary: Do you want to be a superstar? As a beginner and nobody in the entertainment business, Purple Pink surely dreams big. She just moves into a new house in Papo Town, and needs to work and train hard to become an A-list celebrity, so she would have enough coins to decorate her new house.

name: Papo Town Space Explorer
summary: This is for the little scientist and astronauts who loves the stars and the universe! Let’s explore the mysterious universe and the solar system with Purple Pink the Bunny!

name: Papo Town Museum
summary:
Welcome to Papo Town Museum, where history is fun!
Purple Pink the Bunny will guide you back to different eras and history periods to visit the famous collections all over the world!

There are seven exhibition halls in Papo Town Museum, including the prehistoric creatures hall, stone age hall, ancient civilization, empire and knight, the Renaissance, the great exploration and industrial revolution exhibition hall! Each exhibition hall has collected and displayed the most classical and representative collections of that period and times.

name: Papo Town Build Stories
summary: In Papo Town, everyone is a city planner and an architect. You are granted with a large scale of land, where you could build your own dream city freely and start to create your own life stories!

name: Papo Town Seasons
summary: Papo World presents this cute educational app for young learners! Do you know the unique characteristics of spring, summer, autumn and winter? Let's play and learn in four seasons with Purple Pink!

name: Papo Town Spring Festival
summary: Welcome the Chinese Lunar New Year in Papo Town! The Spring Festival is the grandest traditional festival of the Chinese people! If you are interested in the activities and traditions of this festival, come and join us in Papo Town: Spring Festival!

name: Panther
summary:
Panther, a battle tank-driving simulation named after the Panther tank, was one of a handful of early first-person computer games developed by John Edo Haefeli and Nelson Bridwell in 1975 at Northwestern University. The game was developed for the multi-user interactive computer-based education PLATO system and programmed in the TUTOR programming language and utilized scalable vector graphics called linesets. A 1977 development of Panther, with more refined graphics, was named Panzer.

The game features team-based deathmatch. There are two teams, Squares and Triangles. The object of the game is to destroy the opposing team's base. Game play is straightforward; the player selects a pseudonym and a team, traverse the terrain looking for enemies to destroy on the way to their base. Perspective is maintained by the use of scalable vector graphics and visual interest is enhanced with special graphics for explosions using a custom character set to accomplish limited raster graphics animation.

When players enter the game their tanks are placed randomly in the playing arena near their bases and are temporarily camouflaged to allow time to orient themselves with the current map and state of play. The initial view of the game is in "on-board" mode, which is a first-person perspective of the arena. The other main view available is the map which shows the 5 mountains (Crag, Nixon, Og, Pathos, and Red) which vary in size and placement each time a new game is started. On the map view players can see all of their team members positions and can see enemies only when they are within range. Messaging between team members is available and broadcast-style messages (insults) to the opposing team are also allowed. Team coordination and cooperation is critical to winning in this game as each player has different skills, some players are better at hunting down and killing enemies (or at least engaging and distracting them), others are good at hiding and sneaking to the opposing base to begin bombardment. An interesting capability of the game is that players can donate ammunition and fuel to other players in order to facilitate their role in the game. Ammunition and fuel are loaded at the player's base.

name: Pachinko CR Daiku no Gen-san GB
summary: A pachinko game for Game Boy, based on the Hammerin' Harry series.

name: Pakacuda
summary: Underwater maze game

name: Paranormal Enteties
summary: This game was created in 10 days for the 2020 Scream Jam. All training and assets for this game were provided through the GameDevHQ Pro Membership. If you have ever wished to tell a story through video games, then stop by GameDevHQ.com and start your career as a video game developer.

name: Paradise Killer: Collector's Edition
summary:
Paradise Killer: Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- Lenticular Art Card
- Vinyl Sticker Sheet
- Soundtrack Download Card
- Padded Mousepad Featuring Crimson Acid
- Acrylic Charm Featuring Shinji
- 5 Acrylic Character Standees
- Collector's Edition Box

name: Painting VR: Cozy Cabin
summary: Discover the "Cozy Cabin", a tranquil art retreat with a twist! This cabin includes a "scenery-switcher" device. Embrace the changing landscapes and let your artistry flourish.

name: Pathogen Purge: Tower Defense
summary: Pathogen Purge is a thrilling microbiological tower defense game, combining strategy and action as players become Nanobot Guardians defending the human body against relentless germs and viruses.

name: Pandora's Box
summary: The evils of ancient times are loose and the player, armed with lightning bolts, has to destoy them in this action/shoot'em up game written by Bob Flanagan and Scott Miller.

name: Paintings
summary: A tiny memory.

name: Papa's Taco Mia HD
summary:
Have a flavor fiesta with seasonal tacos and daily specials in Papa's Taco Mia HD!

-- ABOUT THE GAME --

Hooray!! You've just won Papa Louie's taco-eating contest, so grab your spatula because you’re the proud owner of a brand new... JOB!?! You'll be busy in the taco shop as you unlock a wide array of ingredients for new seasonal tacos, and serve Special Recipes to your customers to earn a variety of big bonuses.

Each station in the taco shop is a hands-on process, and you'll have to multi-task between all of the different stations to keep up with your orders. Add pans of meat to the stove, and keep checking back on each pan to flip and cut the meat at the correct times. Pour meat into a variety of taco shells, and fill the tacos with piles of delicious toppings and sauces. Finish off the meal with a basket of crispy chips and a bowl of fresh salsa, and serve the food to your hungry customers!

-- GAME FEATURES --

Get ready to build some tasty tacos unlike any you've made before! As the seasons change outside the taco shop, your customers will order brand-new holiday tacos with a huge amount of new seasonal ingredients. You'll unlock new taco shells, meats, toppings, and sauces for each holiday of the year, and your customers will love thinking outside the box and ordering a creative new take on tacos. 

Customers will occasionally bring you unique Special Recipes, which you can serve as the Daily Special in the taco shop! Each Special also has a bonus you can earn for serving a prime example of that recipe. When you serve enough Specials to master that recipe, you'll also earn a special prize!

Papa's collection of Stickers are now arriving on your tablet! During the game, you'll be able to earn 90 colorful Stickers by completing a wide variety of tasks and achievements. Each customer in your shop also has a list of their three favorite Stickers: Earn all three of that customer's favorite stickers and you'll be rewarded with a brand-new outfit to give to that customer!

Play as Mitch or Maggie, or create your own custom character to work in the restaurant! You can also hire or create a Server to help with your shop's Dining Room, where customers can sit and enjoy their freshly-made tacos. Visit the Shop to find an extensive wardrobe of holiday clothing and accessories for your workers, which you can buy with your hard-earned tips. Earn even more clothing and other prizes by playing Foodini's Mini-Games after each workday!

The customizable lobby is back, with new themes of furniture and decorations for each holiday of the year! Decorate the restaurant with holiday decorations and your customers won't mind waiting even longer for their food. You can also change the wallpaper, flooring, countertop, and trim, which will change the decor in the Dining Room as well!

-- MORE FEATURES --

- Hands-on taco shop in the Papa Louie universe
- Updated and remastered for iPad
- Multi-tasking between cooking, building, and serving chips and dip
- Earn and master 40 unique Special Recipes
- 90 colorful Stickers to earn for completing tasks and achievements
- 12 separate holidays to unlock, each with their own ingredients
- Custom chefs and servers
- 7 exciting Mini-Games to play after each workday
- Tons of furniture and clothing items to decorate your shop and workers
- Purchase shop upgrades with your earned tips
- 101 customers to serve with unique orders
- Use stickers to unlock new outfits for your customers
- Over 100 ingredients to unlock

name: Paperboy
summary: A handheld port of Paperboy, released in 1988.

name: Paperboy 2
summary: A handheld port of Paperboy 2, released in 1988.

The most exciting thing is that you could seek for dinosaur eggs! There are many eggs hidden in the island. You could find them all and hatch the eggs. Given love and patience, the baby dinos will soon break the shells and meet with us!

name: Papo Town: Baby Nursery

You could play house and pretend to be any role you like: a teacher, a nurse or a cook and take care of our adorable babies, just like in a real kindergarten! Play and interact with cute little friends without any rules, fostering imagination and enhancing cognitive abilities in an interactive environment. Experience the joyful activities of a kindergarten and look forward to the real preschool life!

summary: This is the festival house in Papo Town! Enter different rooms to experience and enjoy each and every important festival with your Papo Town friends Purple Pink the Bunny and Steve the Lion!

We are about to explore the museum of China to admire tons of valuable and precious national treasures which unveil the marvelous history of China.

name: Pan's Survivor Chess
summary: This is a auto-battler & vampire-suvivor like game.

Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The tenth and final installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real golf!

summary: Dive deep into the ABYSS.

The original music video game.

Help Parappa rap with the best of the master rappers and straight into Sunny's heart.

Guaranteed you'll be singin' and dancin' along with Parappa and his pals to the most fun music mixes.

name: Partical City Guardians
summary:
Partical City Guardians SinglePlayer & Multiplayer, Open world low-poly game! 
You can use all vehicles, play multiplayer open world, AND MORE!

name: Paradise of Desire
summary: One day, the world as I know it changed... That even my existence was erased by the world... Until a beautiful girl with a halo and shackles appeared in front of me, demanding milk. While calling himself "God."And so the adventure began.

name: Party Poopers
summary: Tired of playing the same old boring drinking games? Then Party Poopers is for you! A quick and simple drinking game for 2-6 players where you compete in different mini games. Simple, casual and fun!

summary: Help Patchman rescue the Sheeple from enslavement by the Drone army! But... who is Patchman, and why shouldn't you be him? Find out in the game THEY don't want you to play!

name: Parkour Game 2

Begin as a humble ranger to become a lord, a business magnate, a benevolent healer, or maintain your noble spirit as a folk hero. Shape your destiny in a realm teeming with monsters and legends.

summary: Pachinko Ren Chan Tengoku is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Jorudan and published by Vap, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Parasol Stars: Rainbow Islands II
summary:
A port of "Parasol Stars: Rainbow Islands II" (also known as Bubble Bobble 3) for the NES was published by Ocean in 1992.

Get ready for some finger-searing action as Bub and Bob blast their way onto your computer screen. Use four kinds of elements - Fire, Water, Lightning and Star - to overcome wave upon wave of nasties bent on ending your quest to rid the universe of the evil mastermind Chaostikahn! Whether you play alone or with a friend, stay alert! Your only hope of reaching the final showdown is to unlock the secret of Parasol Stars!

name: Paradise Away
summary: Manage a group of survivals in this base building game set in a tropical island! Will you be able to escape from the island?

summary: Pax Nova: Beyond the Rift DLC introduces planetary effects, new factions, technologies, events, quests, and more, adding hours of new content to enjoy.

name: Pam's Room
summary: A cute little escape room game

name: Paint By Numbers: 8-Bit World Ep. 9

name: Particle Accelerator

name: Patalliro!

name: Pain Train PainPocalypse
summary: Pain Train Painpocalypse is a first person shooter game set in a murky horror environment. The man known as Pain Train is an elite mercenary with the ability to drain life from his victims as he kills them. The story Pain Train continues with the subways of New York once again under siege. Time for the Pain Train, all aboard!

summary: Another Pac-Man port for tiny LCD devices.

One day he receives a message that his friend Garcia has left for the Sea of Oblivion, and so he makes the decision to follow him there. Pantos brings nothing but his musical horn with him on his journey, ready to play music with anyone else he meets. This adventure game has a slow, chill pace, encouraging players to immerse themselves in its narrative.

name: Paddle Protectors

name: Pangea Survival
summary: Adapt. Survive. Thrive. In a world of ancient, prehistoric wonders you will have to learn to rely on your instincts as dinosaurs and poachers compete to SURVIVE PANGEA!

name: PainFighting
summary: 《Pain Fighting》, Good Business is a 2.5D horizontal board arcade fighting game. There are cute pixel characters and funny plot. Unlock skills and kills through directional command input. Join us now on this relaxing and enjoyable journey!

name: Pay for My Call with a Kiss
summary: You are working in a hostess club as a private escort. This is just a cover, however, to mask your true purpose --- hunting the murderer of your parents. But a man has spun your plan off its track. He might be poison. After all he is the best friend and partner of your bitter enemy. Can you resist his charms?!?

name: Palladium
summary: A classical FPS based on movement filled with metroidvania elements and power ups to find by exploring the interconnected levels.

name: Parking Attendant Simulator
summary: Inherit a run-down parking lot from a relative and turn it into a mass-transit hub for all classes of people. Extend and upgrade services to attract new customers and keep their precious vehicles safe.

name: Paper Puzzle
summary: Place all the pieces into the grid, and as long as they don't overlap, you can clear the level. Simple rules but a real challenge. Want to give it a try?

name: Parachute Drop
summary: Parachute Drop is a game where you drop your character and try to land on the center of the target! Set channel points cost to automatically create a drop redemption or type drop or your custom command into your channel chat.

name: Pac-Man Monsters
summary: Pac-Man Monsters is a combination RPG and matching puzzle game starring Pac-Man.

name: Party Party Time: Happy Happy Pack
summary: Guaranteed to further boost your joy! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Get ready for Happy Happy Pack, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand new minigames! Gather everyone and party happy, party on!

name: Pacula's Curse
summary: A Pac-man clone and Parody with elements of shooters. It is part of the pac-guy series, It can be seen as the second standalone disc in the series, but it is included in later editions of the first disc ''The pac-pack''. It is third ad final part in the Pac-Guy 2 sub series.

name: Paper Pinball
summary: Paper Pinball is a doodle-styled pinball game on a never ending pinball table. The paddles of the pinball table are controlled by tapping on the left or right side of the screen. The bottom part of the screen if a fixed, non-scrolling area where the flippers are shown at all times. There are two on each side. The larger, remaining part of the screen scrolls when a higher area is reached. The game ends when the player drops the ball. The game features an online high score taking in account both Android and iOS players.

name: Pastel Chime 3: Bind Seeker
summary:
One day, during a mission with a 0% danger probability, an A-class adventurer Kaitos comes across a mysterious witch and accidentally disrupts her ritual. As a result, many evil spirits called Binds are released into the world and Kaitos, being affected by the ritual too, doesn't have much choice but to start helping the witch in sealing the Binds that have been set free.

Enlisting the support from his friends both new and old, our hero sets out on a quest which ends up being much more complicated than a simple Bind hunt...

name: Paraiso Island: Disaster Relief
summary: Bring the playful Nacheline to your island! This expansion adds Nacheline, the raccoon to your island, with new quests. Help Nacheline provide some spirit to Paraiso Island as she builds a parade float! 100% of developer proceeds will be donated in support of disaster relief.

name: Pac-Man Connect & Play
summary: Features Pac-Man, Super Pac-Man, Pac & Pal, Pac-Man Plus, Galaga, Galaxian, Dig Dug, Mappy, Bosconian, Xevious, New Rally-X, and Pac-Man 256. Shaped like an 8-bit graphic of Pac-Man (or as a Blinky in the PAL version).

name: PainStation
summary: Painstation is an art object and arcade game based on Pong developed by the artists' group, "/////////fur//// art entertainment interfaces", with pain feedback.

name: Paska Battle Style!
summary: The time has finally come! All the most dangerous people in the world have reunited to show off their talents in the annual Paska Battle Style anniversary and you, yes, YOU, will have to shut their big egos off!

name: Palm Paradise Garden
summary: Cultivate and nurture your very own world of verdant exotic plant life in this tropical greenhouse gardening game.

name: Patient Zero
summary: Patient Zero is a randomly generated twin-stick shooter game with great emphasis on its roguelike elements. it takes its inspiration from 80s sci-fi and action movies. You play as one of the hazmat crew enlisted in a top-secret adventure to find Patient Zero and stop another deadly virus.

name: Pac-Man
summary: A port of Pac-Man for LCD Handheld.

name: Pandemic 2.5
summary: Choose between a virus, bacteria or a parasite and unleash your deadly disease upon the unsuspecting world. Strengthen it against the puny humans' various responses by upgrading its lethality, infectivity and drug resistance capabilities.

name: Paper.io 2
