name: Pacific Drive: Friendly Dumpster Customization Pack
summary: The Friendly Dumpster has always been there for you. Proudly display your gratitude by decorating your station wagon with a pack of in-game trash themed cosmetic items.

name: Paranormal VHS
summary: Paranormal VHS is a horror game that features a VHS tape-inspired aesthetic. The game's story revolves around a popular vlogger who spends a night in haunted locations in search of paranormal activity.

name: Pastures New
summary: Pastures New is a farming survival game based in a vast procedurally-generated world. Build, farm and explore the wilderness.

name: Paplion
summary: Fight along with your Papling through the worlds inside a mysterious book called Paplion! Explore unique biomas, befriend new Papling and make them stronger through evolution to defeat your enemies in this classic style monster-catcher RPG and 2D platforming adventure.

name: Paath-Z
summary: PAATH-Z is an intense third-person shooter blending tactical combat and survival horror. Play as a PHANTOM operative Dominic 'Shadow' Kane, infiltrating a secretive island to uncover dark experiments, battle mutated creatures, and dismantle a shadowy corporate conspiracy threatening humanity.

name: Pastopia
summary: Become a Memory Walker in Pastopia and restore the mystical lands of Talmanu. In this open-world adventure, team up with your Golem A.I companion to explore vast environments, solve puzzles, and unleash your creativity. Discover the lost memories of Pastopia and shape your own adventure!

name: Pale Cinder
summary: Death is not the end! Slash, dash, parkour and manipulate time in this 2d action plaformer.

name: Party Hard 2: Collector's Edition
summary: Welcome back to the extended Party Hard universe! Choose from hundreds of ways of dealing with noisy partygoers, incidentally destroy a drug syndicate, and save the Earth from an alien invasion. May the chickens be with you!

name: Paradroid 90
summary:
Paradroid 90 is a remake of the game Paradroid (released in 1985 for the Commodore 64) for slightly later systems.
A fleet of space freighters carry a cargo of battle and security robots to help in the defence of Basmyth. Alien ships were bombarding the freighters with disorienting beams which drove the robots crazy. The human officers were eliminated, leaving the ships open for occupation by alien forces. At this point the players mission starts...

name: Park Studio
summary: Park Studio is a next-generation park building and simulation game that lets you create the park of your dreams with intricate details and next-level quality! The only limit is your imagination!

name: Pang! 3
summary: Your character is locked inside an art museum and has to avoid bouncing balloons of various sizes, most of which split when hit. The player has the option of "normal" play with stages or "panic" mode in which balloons will appear continuously. In normal mode, watch out for characters like birds and dogs that will paralyze your character.

name: Path to Success
summary: Make your mark in a world full of opportunity with Path to Success, a rewarding journey to live out your fantasy. A brand new life is knocking as the big city opens its doors with the promise of opportunity. Step in and get the next phase of your life off to a rousing success as you start making the decisions that will determine your future.

name: Pajama Sam: Games to Play on Any Day
summary: Pajama Sam, star of award-winning adventure games, continues to challenge and inspire kids. Now your child can play all day, the superhero way, with a collection of 10 unique play experiences based on classic games and puzzles.

name: Path of Tengri
summary:
Join Bataar, a dashing young Mongol nomad and his trusty side-kick Burg the eagle as they embark on a journey toward self-discovery!

Battle desert fiends and build up your strength in your search for divine wisdom on the Mongolian plains. Featuring some much-loved JRPG wrestling and some sage life-advice, you're sure to be in for a life-changing adventure.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Kiev '43
summary: In Kiev '43, as the commander of the Russian 1st Ukrainian Front, you have several armies at your disposal to defeat the vaunted German Wehrmacht. As the German commander you will have at your disposal the powerful panzer forces able to wreck havoc upon their Soviet foes. Included are scenarios that let you recreate all four phases of the campaign from the battle in the Bukrin bridgehead to the final battle near Korosten where the Germans made one last attempt to destroy the Russian forces and roll on to victory. The stage is set! All that is lacking is for you to kick off one of the most whirlwind campaigns on the Eastern Front!

name: Path of Achra
summary: A turn-based roguelike with an emphasis on hero customization and powerful items. Fight through the dangerous lands of Achra to reach the horrors of the Obelisk, and discover what lies beyond...

name: Painter Blazer
summary: Painter Blazer is a mix between action, arcade, and light puzzle games. You are playing as Blazer, a bunny who likes to paint. He finds a new job as a painter but the company is no good trying to replace workers with robots. Your job is to paint and blow up the robots and to find who is behind all of this.

name: Paranormal Preparatory School
summary: This school for supernaturals isn't hell, but it is a hellmouth! Can you make peace between the vampires and werewolves, and close the portal to hell?

name: Pankapu: Episode 2
summary: Pankapu: the Last Aegis delves deeper into Djaha’rell’s dreams to find Faith, the Last Aegis.

name: Paper Toss
summary:
Have you ever been bored at work, crumpled up a piece of paper and counted how many times you can make it in a small trash can? Has your boss ever gone out for a quick bite while you and your co-workers see how far you can move the trash can away and still make the paper shot? Have you ever brought in electric fans to make the shot even harder? Backflip Studios is happy to announce that we have brought this amazing and hilarious experience to the Android.

This game is oddly satisfying . . . much like tossing a real ball of crumpled paper into a metal trash basket. So realistic, you will think you are stuck in an office killing time.

name: Passage
summary: An extremely challenging horror game where you solve puzzles to escape while being hunted and toyed with by monstrosities.

name: Paw Patrol World: Ultimate Rescue - Costume Pack
summary: Blaze a trail wearing the Ultimate Fire Rescue uniforms to give the PAW Patrol the fire-pup power to cool things down.

name: Palais de Carnaval
summary: A fandisc for Palais de Reine for PC.

name: Pandemonia
summary: Pandemonia is an arcade platform game developed by CRL Group PLC in 1983. The game is set in the year 2000, where planet Earth has been invaded by alien beings who control their domain from the top of the world's largest skyscraper. The player's task is to destroy the alien headquarters located in the skyscraper. The game features several challenging levels and gameplay mechanics.

name: Payday 2: Dragon Pack
summary: The Payday Gang is back with a new heist and new cosmetics, stealing a priceless gold dragon statue in Chinatown, San Francisco.

name: PawPrint
summary: A cloud cat simulation operation game. This is a game for people who have lost their cats in real life, in this game, players can DIY their own cat image.Players can run with cat,earn gold coins, buy cat food in the cat star scene, and continue to complete the fate of feeding and accompanying cats.

name: Pair a Dice
summary: Pair A Dice is a Co-Op Dice Roller where you harness the power of magic dice to create enemies, craft items, and defeat bosses!

name: Party Quest
summary: Party Quest is a 2D MMO platformer chalked full of mini games (Party Quests), secrets, and more! Each unique Party Quest that you find and unlock will challenge you and your fellow party members to accomplish various tasks in a set time limit.

name: Passing Shot
summary:
This is a conversion of the SEGA coin-op game of the same name, playing lawn tennis around the world. The player travels from France, to Australia, to the US and end up in England and get to listen to the national anthem of each country.

There are four difficulty levels to select the skill of the computer controlled player. One or two players may play but always against the computer. In a two player game, both players play as a doubles team.

The game starts off looking behind the player as the style of serve is chosen (top spin, curve, etc) and then it switches to a top down view for the rally.

name: Patchworld
summary: As in other Action RPGs, you have to save the world. But this time there is no need to look for a legendary spell or an artifact created by a great sorcerer of antiquity. You create the spells yourself, and it's up to you to decide what they will be.

name: Pathfinder Adventures
summary: Pathfinder Adventures translates the best-selling Pathfinder Adventure Card Game into an entirely new breed of digital card game, where players adventure cooperatively to battle monsters and villains, and acquire new feats, items, weapons, and allies.

name: Paw Patrol Academy
summary: PAW Patrol Academy is an early childhood education mobile game based on the popular PAW Patrol franchise. It contains a collection of themed minigames, heroic missions based on episodes of the PAW Patrol television show, and video clips from the show.

name: Payday 2: The Alesso Heist
summary: Gang! Listen up!The Alesso Heist DLC is the 23rd DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration with the DJ Alesso. Navigate through the Gensec arena, quiet or loud, and keep the show going while trying to crack Gensec's state of the art exhibition vaults containing loads of cash.

name: Payday 2: Yakuza Character Pack
summary: The Yakuza Character Pack is the 27th DLC for Payday 2. It allows heisters to play as Japanese heister Jiro, the Yakuza of the Payday gang. Other than Jiro himself, it includes the Yakuza perk deck, Jiro's mask, the Shinsakuto-Katana melee weapon and the Micro Uzi.

name: Paddington Bear
summary: Paddington Bear is a collection of mini games that allows the player to join Paddington Bear, the Brown family and Paddington's friend Mr Gruber as he floods the bathroom, gets lost on the London Underground, learns to ride a bike and finds himself chased by swarms of angry bees! It's sure to be Paddington Bear's most thrilling adventure yet!

name: Panic Porcupine
summary: Dr. Proventriculus is snatching up the Chickabirbs! Help Panic blast through over 50 stages of topsy-turvy, spike-laced, slime-drenched, buzzsaw-filled deathtraps to rescue them! And remember, there are no rings...

name: Partypit Games
summary: Play our games with friends and family using your personal mobile devices and a shared display. Have a blast in the same room or sync your screen to join a game from across the globe.

name: Parhelion
summary: This is a visual novel game. Players can obtain relevant information with npc and explore the maps on an island called Soraki to form their own understanding of this story. Can you continue to find the so-called truth by constantly trying to explore...

name: Panzer Battles: Battles of Normandy
summary:
The Battle of Normandy evokes so many emotions. It was the beginning of the 'Great Crusade' in Northern Europe by the Western Allies, yet was viewed as long overdue by the bloodied Soviets. Few realize that the casualties suffered in the three months of the summer of 1944 in Normandy rivaled the worst of the Eastern Front. The air and seaborne landings in Northern France were the largest the world has ever seen, with meticulous planning for D-Day, yet marked by a surfeit of clear goals once ashore. Both the bocage terrain and the dogged defense by the Germans resulted in the need for unexpected improvisation. Both sides had significant constraints; the British were nearing manpower exhaustion and would have to rely excessively on their armor arm, the United States had boundless resources but many of their divisions had never been in combat, while the Germans were short of everything and it was only through their ability to organize disparate troops into flexible kampfgruppen that they held the Allies for as long as they did. Ultimately, the Battle of Normandy resulted in the utter defeat of the Germans at Falaise with France and Belgium quickly liberated thereafter. The Allied advance would last till late September 1944, ending in the streets of Arnhem with Operation Market Garden. This second release in the Panzer Battles franchise is focused on many of the battles that occurred across the Calvados & Cotentin regions of Northern France. Fought across nearly three months from June 6th 1944 to August 20th 1944, actions from the D-Day landings, through the bocage fighting to the pursuit and destruction of the German forces at Falaise are included.

Battles of Normandy includes 93 Scenarios – covering all sizes and situations, including specialized versions for both head to head play and vs. the computer AI.

name: Papper and Carrot VN
summary: from Open Comic to Interactive Story (Visual Novel) an EXPERIMENT

name: Pair Horror
summary:
Nothing is scary when we work together!
Team up and complete a variety of games!

name: Parascientific Escape - Gear Detective
summary: Parascientific Escape～Gear Detective～ is a sequal to Parascientific Escape～Cruise in the distant seas～, where the player is required to find clues and solve puzzles to escape certain situation using PSI abilities.

name: Paganitzu
summary:
Journey into an Aztec pyramid and survive the adventure of a lifetime! No other game forces you to die in order to complete it! That's just one of many incredible plot twists in this excellent puzzle-oriented arcade-adventure game.

Guide Alabama Smith (Al) into a vast and dangerous Aztec pyramid. Confront traps of increasing perplexity and face unfathomable creatures in this innovative arcade game that tests your mind more than your finger speed.

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs - Lunar Animals Pac
summary: Show off your favorite Lunar Animal style with these cosmetic items as you eat to compete!

name: Paragon Pioneers 2: Turn the Orc Table
summary: Swaps all human graphics with orc graphics and vice versa. Support the development of indie games and kick some human butts!

name: Panzer Planet
summary: Fast-paced, twin sticker, top-down arena shooter with roguelite elements, where you pilot a powerful tank on spherical mini planets to fight hordes of zombies and monsters. Collect your bounty for killing your enemies to get new weapons and powerups to improve your skills.

name: Paranormal Syndrome: R Dolls Edition
summary: A remake of the chapter 1 of the game Paranormal Syndrome, with changed graphics, menus and even some changes in the game mechanics.

name: Payday 2: Sydney Character Pack
summary: Anarchy isn’t just a watered down symbol on a t-shirt...The Sydney Character Pack is the 34th DLC for PAYDAY 2. Heisters can now play as the furious Sydney. It also contains the Anarchist Perk Deck together with the Bootleg Assault Rifle and Wing Melee Knife.

name: Payday 2: The Overkill Pack
summary: Get ready to rock!The OVERKILL Pack is our 17th DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to use the Minigun and the Rocket Launcher weapons, the OVERKILL mask as well as a new OVERKILL Escape Van skin. There will be 3 weapon modifications for the Minigun as well as a total 10 extra achievements added.

name: Panzer Dragoon
summary: Panzer Dragoon is an LCD video game developed in the 1990s[1] by Tiger Electronics in two formats: a standalone handheld released as part of their Pocket Arcade line, and a cartridge for Tiger’s R-Zone handheld system.

name: Payday 2: Mega City Tailor Pack
summary: Look dashing in these Chinese inspired outfits and masks while you get revenge against the Golden Dagger Triad.

name: Payday 2: Gage Assault Pack
summary: When plan A is not an option.The Gage Assault Pack DLC is the tenth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an arsenal of assault weapons to the PAYDAY gang to control the chaos of the battlefield.Three new assault rifles, four new melee weapons, the return of the GL40 grenade launcher, a host of mods, four new masks, patterns and materials are...

name: Payday 2: Gage Sniper Pack
summary: The Gage Sniper Pack DLC is the seventh DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds powerful sniper rifles to the player's weapon arsenal. The bullets from a sniper rifle have armor penetration which means they can go through objects like walls. One bullet can even pierce several enemies.

name: Payday 2: Gage Shotgun Pack
summary: Finally shotguns get some love!The Gage Shotgun Pack DLC is the ninth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds Gage's favorite shotguns to the player's weapon arsenal. Depending on what kind of ammo type you use, the shotgun pellets you fire can have armor penetration or be explosive, stunning your opponents.

name: Payday 2: High Octane Tailor Pack
summary: The High Octane Tailor Pack contains everything you need to step into the shoes of a biker, literally! Check it out here.

name: Payloaders Strike!
summary: A fast-paced first person action game, with heavy emphasis on short range combat and gun combos. Free your coworkers and take down Concrete's reign!

name: Panzer Command: Ostfront
summary: The third game in the Panzer Command series which includes the content from Winter Storm and Kharkov in addition to 10 new campaigns and over 70 new scenarios.

name: Pac-Man: Special Color Edition
summary:
One of the most popular and influential games of the 1980's, Pac-Man stars a little, yellow dot-muncher who works his way around to clear a maze of the various dots and fruit which inhabit the board.

Pac-Man's goal is continually challenged by four ghosts: The shy blue ghost Bashful (Inky), the trailing red ghost Shadow (Blinky), the fast pink ghost Speedy (Pinky), and the forgetful orange ghost Pokey (Clyde). One touch from any of these ghosts means a loss of life for Pac-Man.

Pac-Man can turn the tables on his pursuers by eating of the four Energizers located within the maze. During this time, the ghosts turn blue, and Pac-Man can eat them for bonus points. This only lasts for a limited amount of time, as the ghost's eyes float back to their center box, and regenerate to chase after Pac-Man again.

Survive a few rounds of gameplay, and be treated to humorous intermissions between Pac-Man and the ghosts.

name: Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - City Critters
summary: In the latest DLC for Painkiller Hell & Damnation, players will be able to riot in a fresh urban environment. Be the Tarzan of doom in the concrete jungle surroundings.

name: Paper Bowser World
summary:
Paper Bowser World is an unofficial side-scroller platformer fan game.

Play as Bowser in an and outrageous adventure to "rescue" Princess Peach from Mario, or play as Kammy Koopa in an equally entertaining adventure to find her stolen wand!

This Super Mario Bros. parody game features more than sixteen levels and is based on the Bowser mini-stages from Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door.

name: Pandecrown
summary: Killomnia collapsed in 2019 after the virus escaped from the Medical Hospital in Laucthi City, which held the corporation liable for compensation in the Laucthi City Incident in 2019. The verdict led to bankruptcy, causing them and their subsidiaries to close for the year Following.

name: Party Killer
summary: DJ vs. Police - Who will win?

name: Payday 3: Gold Edition
summary:
Gold Edition Pre-Order includes:
Main Game
Play Early (3 Days)
Pre-order bonus
SEASON PASS (12 months)
Dark Sterling mask
Skull of Liberty Mask
Gold Slate Gloves

name: Party Party Time 3
summary:
It's time for a new and improved party time!
Compete or cooperate—there's no limit on the fun when everyone's together!

name: Parity
summary: Compete with up to 8 players in this local & online multiplayer game! Use skills to get the edge on the opposing team - parry their shots or bamboozle the enemy with a bold spin-shot! You can choose between different stages and game modes and hone your Parity skills in thrilling fast-paced matches.

name: Park Bound
summary: Park Bound is a massively multiplayer playground featuring player crafted parks. Each park contains a variety of worlds to explore, play, and meet other players. Every world presents goals and challenges to overcome with unique collectible treasures that can unlock special worlds in the park. Players can pick up jetpacks, soar the sky with hang-gliders, and even roll inside balls to complete objectives.

name: Pan Panda
summary: There are pandas. You rescue them and it's kinda like capture the flag I guess.

name: Pantsu Hunter: Back to the 90s
summary: Share a heart-to-heart talk, watch a movie together, take a bath, remove a computer virus, help a girl in a tough spot and—if you're lucky—find the love of your life using the color and pattern of her panties. This game tells the story about a guy looking for love renovated in a nostalgic 80s and 90s anime style.

name: Party Pirates
summary: Party Pirates is a couch co-op game where players become clumsy pirates traveling from port to port, taking on dangerous foes and sea monsters along the way. Gather your crew, don an eyepatch, and do everything to keep your ship afloat!

name: Pageant
summary: An interactive story about a girl who joins a beauty pageant to improve her college applications.

name: Panda Roll
summary: With a puzzle mechanic controlling both heroes at the same time, guide Pandara and Mulatta on an adventure of challenges and friendship, to find the mighty Sun Bamboo, and cure the Mulatta's mother.

name: Panic House
summary: Panic House is a horror game that is sure to give players a thrilling and heart-pumping experience. As the player enters the game, they are immediately transported to an eerie and foreboding atmosphere. The visuals are dark and gloomy, with shadows lurking in every corner, and the sound effects are designed to keep the player on edge.

name: Panic Road
summary: Try to reach home through the streams of people trying not to feel panic, your complexes and thoughts will prevent you from going through all this social horror, but you can easily help the main character just by closing the bad thought through the cross! If only this could be done in real life...

name: Paratroopers Raid
summary: In this exciting shooting game, highly trained paratroopers are sent off in waves to destroy your base. Evolve your base and weapons with each turn to fight stronger enemies. Control your weapons, adjust your aim, clear the sky of enemies, evolve and have fun.

name: Pacewar
summary:
Pacewar is a relatively simple fighting game between two teams of space ships. A team wins the round when all ships of the other team are destroyed, and a certain number of victories more than the other player is needed to win the game. But there's a catch: as a team gets closer to winning, it loses ships, so you need to be better than the other team to succeed.

Human players take over one ship at a time from their respective teams. If a human player's ship is destroyed, that human player takes over an AI ship from their team randomly. This ensures that the human players are always in the game.

name: Pako Caravan
summary: Build you caravan as long as possible! Complete missions in colourful and fun levels that have their own little twists. There is lawn to be mowed, teleports to be used, risky jumps, UFOs, laboratory experiments and many other things waiting!

name: Paragraph 78
summary: A first-person shooter based on the movie of the same name.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Cloud Version
summary:
Cloud Version of "Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous" for Nintendo Switch.

Embark on a journey to a realm overrun by demons in a new epic RPG.

Embark on a journey to a realm overrun by demons in a new epic RPG from the creators of the critically acclaimed Pathfinder: Kingmaker. Explore the nature of good and evil, learn the true cost of power, and rise as a Mythic Hero capable of deeds beyond mortal expectations.

Discover the Story
Your path will lead you to the Worldwound, where the opening of a rift to the Abyss has unleashed all-consuming terror across the land. For over a century, the neighboring nations have fought fearlessly, trying to drive the enemy back — but to little avail.

name: Paper Enchantress
summary: Paper Enchantress - это романтическое приключение полное магии, судьбоносных решений и прекрасных принцев. Что откроется за таинственной дверью?

name: Pat Riley Basketball
summary: Pat Riley Basketball is a video game which was released for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. Pat Riley was the coach of the Los Angeles Lakers at the time of the game's release. There are two modes and eight different teams to choose from.

name: Pals Go Only Up!
summary: Welcome to Pals Go Only Up! Get ready for a wild ride up the mountainside. It's not your average climbing game; here, precision is everything. Brace yourself for some real nail-biting moments as you navigate through challenging cliffs and obstacles.

name: Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light
summary: Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light is an ARPG that plays alone. Explore the Oriental World! Gwang, who lost his mind in the fight against Laijin, the god of lightning, is rescued by the chief of the village. He will lose Inner Qi in the fight against Laijin and must regain his strength.

name: Paint by Pixel 3
summary: Unleash your creativity and paint your way pixel by pixel!

name: Pac-Mania
summary: Pac-Mania is a variation on the game Pac-Man. You need to guide Pac-Man around a maze and eat all of the dots on the board to proceed on to the next round. Numerous, multi-colored ghosts also roam the maze trying to stop you. If you eat one of the power pellets in the maze, the ghosts will temporarily turn blue and run from you. Pac-Man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now shown in isometric perspective and is larger than the screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man can now jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid-air collision!

name: Packet Queen #
summary: Divide up quickly and precisely the packets flowing one after another. Aim to get a higher score by putting them together in poker-style hands! This is a competitive-type active solitaire game. Includes VS Mode where you can compete against other players over the Internet.

name: Panda?
summary: This is a game where you select two panels and match the same pictures. Let's compete for the best time without getting confused by small differences.

name: Parahcuy
summary: Andi and his friends' adventure in eradicating injustice and bullying in their school environment.

name: Party Party Time + Premium Pack Set
summary: Party hearty with the Party Fever Pack, Party Harder Pack, Party Even Harder Pack, and Excitement Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time! Let's party till we drop!

name: Paradox Lost
summary:
Abby crashes her plane, but stumbles upon a gun that shoots time travel! A metroidvania across three time periods.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Paradigm
summary:
"Paradigm is a surreal adventure game set in the strange and post apocalyptic Eastern European country of Krusz.

Play as the handsome mutant, Paradigm, who's past comes back to haunt him in the form of a genetically engineered sloth that vomits candy."

name: Panda Go
summary: This is a turn-based puzzle board game where you need to cleverly navigate your character through guards and various obstacles to reach the endpoint! Additionally, you can use the level editor to create your own levels and share them with the community or download levels created by other players!

name: Parasol Stars: The Story of Bubble Bobble III
summary: A retro arcade game featuring the bubble dragons Bub and Bob in human form. Swing parasols to stun enemies, collect fruits and play solo or co-op with a friend.

name: Path of Sin: Greed
summary: It was supposed to be a simple suicide case – a quick inspection and lots of boring paperwork. But the more you delve into this secluded island and the twisted family relations of the owners, the more complicated and unclear this case becomes.

name: Patapon 2 Remastered
summary: Patapon 2 sees the return of the beloved and innovative, rhythm-based 2D action game remastered in 1080p and dynamic 4K* resolution. In Patapon 2, a follow-up to the original that received critical acclaim, players are tasked with leading the colorful Patapons, a brave and noble tribe now in an unfamiliar land, through a series of epic battles against the opposing army and gigantic monsters. In a distinct gameplay twist, action and rhythm are intertwined as players utilize drumbeats to march, attack, and defend, ultimately leading the Patapon tribe to victory.

name: Paper Dolls
summary:
Paper Dolls is a first-person VR horror game with oriental features.
Explore the ancient ruins of the late Qing dynasty and search for your daughter .
A complete story line goes through the whole game，which lasts approximately 15 hours.
...A century-old hidden truth awaits your discovery!
developers: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.
publishers: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

name: Paper Beast: Folded Edition
summary: An exploration and adventure game about wildlife sprung from the depths of the internet. An unknown power seems to upset its balance. Join forces with exotic creatures to unravel the mysteries of this universe.

name: Pac-Man
summary: A fan made port of the original Namco game, a staple of 2000s-era gaming portals.

name: Pac-Man
summary: The ZX Spectrum port of Pac-Man. The game was previously released as a bootleg game under the name of Z-Man.

name: Parcel Packing Simulator
summary: A Cozy parcel-packing game where you use your brains to Pack parcels in as small packages as possible! Pack random orders to train yourself and try to break high scores from the order list!

name: Party Pigs: Farmyard Games
summary:
The Wildest Pig Contest in Town!

The Annual Party Pigs Track & Field competition is about to begin! Dust off your cleats and get ready to compete in zany versions of seven different track & field events. Choose your favorite pig athlete and take on hurdles, swimming, long jump and more. Progress through the tournament or challenge your friends to see who is the greatest athlete at the farm!

name: Pacer
summary: Pacer (formely known as Formula Fusion) is an anti-gravity racing game which pits your racing pedigree up against the rest of the world. Tackle the single player campaign and become the best pilot against the AI over leagues and championships, or play against the world in multiplayer and compete in a sports league where you can take either yourself or your team to the top step.

name: Party Party Time
summary:
It's time to get this party started!
Endless fun in a bash everyone can join!

name: Palm Reading Premium
summary: Palm Reading Premium is the most luxury and professional palmistry and chirology software out there developed by crazysoft.

name: Paw Patrol To The Rescue! Learning Video Game
summary: Drive, fly and run through games like a big kid to avoid obstacles and solve problems with Chase, Skye and Marshall. Search for the right shape to repair vehicles with Rocky and Tracker and match Rubble's dance moves with his outfits. Pick up Pup Treats in every mission to earn gold stars. Collect all the gold stars to become an honorary member of Paw Patrol!

name: Parkour Jump Adventure
summary: Enter in this wonderful game world of jump and parkour. Your only competitor in this game is you, because you you have to surpass yourself every time with the highest possible results!

name: Paranoia 2: Savior
summary:
Paranoia 2: Savior is the standalone sequel to the Half-Life mod Paranoia, which was ported to the Xash3D engine as Paranoia: The Game. Paranoia 2: Savior takes place shortly after the first game, putting the player back in the shoes of Major Alexander Kalashnikov as he continues his descent into the abandoned KROT-1 laboratory. The deeper Alex descends, the more he learns about the experiments that took place there, discovering that the monsters within must be eradicated at any cost.

Like the first game, Paranoia 2 is a horror-oriented linear first-person shooter. The player's arsenal consists solely of realistic military weapons, such as pistols, rifles, and machine guns, which can be refilled with ammo found around the environment or scavenged from enemies. First aid kits and painkillers can be used to restore lost health points, but only painkillers are light enough to be carried and saved for later. The player is also outfitted with a retractable helmet which can be used to reduce incoming damage to the head and a gas mask which is vital for traversing areas contaminated with toxic gas.

name: Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat
summary: Developed in a top secret lab over the course of the past eighteen months, RGCD.DEV's Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat is a rhythm-synchronised, old-school, score-chasing arcade game that plays like some alien coin-op from another dimension. Grab your Conganoid and join the Elder Gods in the competitive ceremonial slaughter of annoyingly happy (yet extremely deadly) geometric, pan-dimensional critters!

name: Panic Bomber
summary: Panic Bomber is a dropping-piece puzzle game in the Bomberman series.

name: Paw Patrol: Grand Prix - Complete Edition
summary:
No track is too big, no racer too small!

Join your favorite PAW Patrol pups, and up-to 4 players at once, in their fastest paced adventure yet! Including every track from the original game and all the PUPtastic features from the DLC packs - RACE IN BARKINGBURG and PUP TREAT ARENA!

name: Panel de Pon Event '98
summary:
Panel de Pon Event '98 is a modified special event version of Panel de Pon that was broadcast between December 28, 1997 and January 31, 1998 for the Satellaview Super Famicom peripheral.
This game only has 1P Stage Clear mode (five stages only, which only skips Lip's Stage) and the 2P Vs. mode with no background characters.

name: Parasomnum
summary: Minimalist horror experience that offers 25-90 minutes of suspenseful gameplay as you try to escape from this unnerving reality.

name: Pac-Man
summary: The NES port of the arcade classic.

name: Parasite Pack
summary: Flea! and Tapeworm Disco Puzzle team up for nostalgia and challenge

name: Paraside: Duality Unbound
summary: In the wake of an apocalypse, lead Earth’s remnants to combat extraplanar threats in a double-sided world of cosmic horror and desperate struggle. Explore unknown territories. Evolve your task force. Manipulate space and minds ingeniously to reignite hope in this new strategic RPG.

name: Patrician 1+2
summary:
In this bundle you can have two great trade games, predecessors to Patrician 3, in the price of just one! Set against the historical backdrop of maritime trade at the time of the Hanseatic League, the Patrician series sees the player take the role of a citizen of a medieval hanseatic town in Northern Europe, between London and Novgorod, with the aim being to rise from the status of an ordinary, unimportant trader to that of a major business tycoon and governor of your hometown.

To achieve this goal, the player must gain the respect and recognition of other inhabitants and try to make a profit through maritime trade, the production of goods and the completion of missions. The player can raise his profile by both improving the city and through diplomacy, or by raising money for his treasury by means of piracy and smuggling - but watch out, others want easy money too, so you would do wise to arm your ships!
